69 #ifdef BUILD_AHBOT
70 #include "AuctionHouseBot/AuctionHouseBot.h"
71 
72 bool ChatHandler::HandleAHBotRebuildCommand(char* args)
73 {
74  bool all = false;
75  if (*args)
76  {
77  if (!ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "all"))
78  return false;
79  all = true;
80  }
81 
82  sAuctionHouseBot.Rebuild(all);
83  return true;
84 }
85 
86 bool ChatHandler::HandleAHBotReloadCommand(char* /*args*/)
87 {
88  if (sAuctionHouseBot.ReloadAllConfig())
89  {
90  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_RELOAD_OK);
91  return true;
92  }
93  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_RELOAD_FAIL);
94  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
95  return false;
96 }
97 
98 bool ChatHandler::HandleAHBotStatusCommand(char* /*args*/)
99 {
100  AuctionHouseBotStatusInfo statusInfo;
101  sAuctionHouseBot.PrepareStatusInfos(statusInfo);
102 
103  if (!m_session)
104  {
105  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_BAR_CONSOLE);
106  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_TITLE1_CONSOLE);
107  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_MIDBAR_CONSOLE);
108  }
109  else
110  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_TITLE1_CHAT);
111 
112  uint32 fmtId = m_session ? LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_FORMAT_CHAT : LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_FORMAT_CONSOLE;
113 
114  PSendSysMessage(fmtId, GetMangosString(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_ITEM_COUNT),
115  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_ALLIANCE].ItemsCount,
116  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_HORDE].ItemsCount,
117  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_NEUTRAL].ItemsCount,
118  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_ALLIANCE].ItemsCount +
119  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_HORDE].ItemsCount +
120  statusInfo[AUCTION_HOUSE_NEUTRAL].ItemsCount);
121 
122  if (!m_session)
123  SendSysMessage(LANG_AHBOT_STATUS_BAR_CONSOLE);
124 
125  return true;
126 }
127 
128 bool ChatHandler::HandleAHBotItemCommand(char* args)
129 {
130  // .ahbot item #itemid [$itemvalue [$addchance [$minstack [$maxstack]]]] [reset]
131  char* cId = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hitem");
132  if (!cId)
133  return false;
134 
135  uint32 itemId = 0;
136  if (!ExtractUInt32(&cId, itemId)) // [name] manual form
137  {
138  std::string itemName = cId;
139  WorldDatabase.escape_string(itemName);
140  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT entry FROM item_template WHERE name = '%s'", itemName.c_str());
141  if (!result)
142  {
143  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_COULDNOTFIND, cId);
144  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
145  return false;
146  }
147  itemId = result->Fetch()->GetUInt16();
148  delete result;
149  }
150  ItemPrototype const* proto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(itemId);
151  if (!proto)
152  {
153  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_COULDNOTFIND, cId);
154  return false;
155  }
156 
157  AuctionHouseBotItemData itemData;
158  bool reset = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "reset") != nullptr;
159  bool setItemData = true;
160  if (!reset && !ExtractUInt32(&args, itemData.Value))
161  {
162  // only item id specified, show item data to player
163  itemData = sAuctionHouseBot.GetItemData(itemId);
164  setItemData = false;
165  }
166  else if (!reset && ExtractUInt32(&args, itemData.AddChance) && ExtractUInt32(&args, itemData.MinAmount))
167  ExtractUInt32(&args, itemData.MaxAmount);
168  if (setItemData)
169  sAuctionHouseBot.SetItemData(itemId, itemData, reset);
170 
171  std::stringstream ss;
172  ss << itemData.Value / 10000 << "g, " << itemData.Value / 100 % 100 << "s, " << itemData.Value % 100 << "c. ";
173  if (itemData.MinAmount == 0)
174  ss << "Item data is not overridden by user.";
175  else if (itemData.AddChance == 0)
176  ss << "Item will be added using normal sources.";
177  else
178  ss << "Add chance: " << itemData.AddChance << "%, Min/Max amount: " << itemData.MinAmount << "/" << itemData.MaxAmount;
179  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_LIST_CHAT, itemId, itemId, proto->Name1, ss.str().c_str());
180  return true;
181 }
182 #endif
183 
184 // reload commands
185 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllCommand(char* /*args*/)
186 {
187  HandleReloadSkillFishingBaseLevelCommand((char*)"");
188 
189  HandleReloadAllAchievementCommand((char*)"");
190  HandleReloadAllAreaCommand((char*)"");
191  HandleReloadAllEventAICommand((char*)"");
192  HandleReloadAllLootCommand((char*)"");
193  HandleReloadAllNpcCommand((char*)"");
194  HandleReloadAllQuestCommand((char*)"");
195  HandleReloadAllSpellCommand((char*)"");
196  HandleReloadAllItemCommand((char*)"");
197  HandleReloadAllGossipsCommand((char*)"");
198  HandleReloadAllLocalesCommand((char*)"");
199 
200  HandleReloadMailLevelRewardCommand((char*)"");
201  HandleReloadCommandCommand((char*)"");
202  HandleReloadReservedNameCommand((char*)"");
203  HandleReloadMangosStringCommand((char*)"");
204  HandleReloadGameTeleCommand((char*)"");
205  return true;
206 }
207 
208 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllAchievementCommand(char* /*args*/)
209 {
210  HandleReloadAchievementCriteriaRequirementCommand((char*)"");
211  HandleReloadAchievementRewardCommand((char*)"");
212  return true;
213 }
214 
215 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllAreaCommand(char* /*args*/)
216 {
217  // HandleReloadQuestAreaTriggersCommand((char*)""); -- reloaded in HandleReloadAllQuestCommand
218  HandleReloadAreaTriggerTeleportCommand((char*)"");
219  HandleReloadAreaTriggerTavernCommand((char*)"");
220  HandleReloadGameGraveyardZoneCommand((char*)"");
221  HandleReloadTaxiShortcuts((char*)"");
222  return true;
223 }
224 
225 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllLootCommand(char* /*args*/)
226 {
227  sLog.outString("Re-Loading Loot Tables...");
228  LootIdSet ids_set;
229  LoadLootTables(ids_set);
230  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB tables `*_loot_template` reloaded.");
231  return true;
232 }
233 
234 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllNpcCommand(char* args)
235 {
236  if (*args != 'a') // will be reloaded from all_gossips
237  HandleReloadNpcGossipCommand((char*)"a");
238  HandleReloadNpcTrainerCommand((char*)"a");
239  HandleReloadNpcVendorCommand((char*)"a");
240  HandleReloadPointsOfInterestCommand((char*)"a");
241  HandleReloadSpellClickSpellsCommand((char*)"a");
242  return true;
243 }
244 
245 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadAllQuestCommand(char* /*args*/)
246 {
247  HandleReloadQuestAreaTriggersCommand((char*)"a");
248  HandleReloadQuestPOICommand((char*)"a");
249  HandleReloadQuestTemplateCommand((char*)"a");
250 
251  sLog.outString("Re-Loading Quests Relations...");
252  sObjectMgr.LoadQuestRelations();
253  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB tables `*_questrelation` and `*_involvedrelation` reloaded.");
254  return true;
255 }
256

261  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnGoUseCommand((char*)"a");
262  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnGossipCommand((char*)"a");
263  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnEventCommand((char*)"a");
264  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnQuestEndCommand((char*)"a");
265  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnQuestStartCommand((char*)"a");
266  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnSpellCommand((char*)"a");
267  HandleReloadDBScriptsOnRelayCommand((char*)"a");
268  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB tables `*_scripts` reloaded.");
269  return true;
270 }

303  HandleReloadPointsOfInterestCommand((char*)"a");
304  return true;

329 
330 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadConfigCommand(char* /*args*/)
331 {
332  sLog.outString("Re-Loading config settings...");
333  sWorld.LoadConfigSettings(true);
334  sMapMgr.InitializeVisibilityDistanceInfo();
335 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
336  metric::metric::instance().reload_config();
337 #endif
338  PacketLog::instance()->Reinitialize();
339  SendGlobalSysMessage("World config settings reloaded.");
340  return true;
341 }
342

346  sAchievementMgr.LoadAchievementCriteriaRequirements();
347  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB table `achievement_criteria_requirement` reloaded.");
348  return true;
349 }

376 {
377  load_command_table = true;
378  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB table `command` will be reloaded at next chat command use.");
379  return true;
380 }

605 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadNpcTextCommand(char* /*args*/)

862 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadEventAIScriptsCommand(char* /*args*/)
863 {
864  sLog.outString("Re-Loading Scripts from `creature_ai_scripts`...");
865  sEventAIMgr.LoadCreatureEventAI_Scripts();
866  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB table `creature_ai_scripts` reloaded.");
867  auto containerEntry = sEventAIMgr.GetCreatureEventEntryAIMap();
868  auto containerGuid = sEventAIMgr.GetCreatureEventGuidAIMap();
869  auto containerComputed = sEventAIMgr.GetEAIComputedDataMap();
870  sMapMgr.DoForAllMaps([containerEntry, containerGuid, containerComputed](Map* map)
871  {
872  map->GetMessager().AddMessage([containerEntry, containerGuid, containerComputed](Map* map)
873  {
874  map->GetMapDataContainer().SetEventAIContainers(containerEntry, containerGuid, containerComputed);
875  });
876  });
877  return true;
878 }

886 
887  if (*args != 'a')
888  SendGlobalSysMessage("DB table `dbscripts_on_gossip` reloaded.");
889 
890  return true;
891 }

1111 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadCreatureSpellLists(char* /*args*/)
1112 {
1113  sLog.outString("Reloading creature spell lists...");
1114  auto conditionsAndExpressions = sObjectMgr.LoadConditionsAndExpressions();
1115  auto result = sObjectMgr.LoadCreatureSpellLists();
1116  sObjectMgr.LoadCreatureTemplateSpells(result);
1117  auto [unitConditions, worldstateExpressions, combatConditions] = conditionsAndExpressions;
1118  SendGlobalSysMessage("Reloaded creature spell lists.");
1119  if (result)
1120  {
1121  sMapMgr.DoForAllMaps([result](Map* map)
1122  {
1123  map->GetMessager().AddMessage([result](Map* map)
1124  {
1125  map->GetMapDataContainer().SetCreatureSpellListContainer(result);
1126  });
1127  });
1128  }
1129  return true;
1130 }
1131 
1132 bool ChatHandler::HandleReloadSpawnGroupsCommand(char* /*args*/)
1133 {
1134  sLog.outString("Reloading spawn groups...");
1135  sObjectMgr.LoadSpawnGroups();
1136  SendGlobalSysMessage("Reloaded spawn groups.");
1137  return true;
1138 }
1139 
1140 bool ChatHandler::HandleLoadScriptsCommand(char* args)
1141 {
1142  return *args != 0;
1143 }
1144 
1145 bool ChatHandler::HandleAccountSetGmLevelCommand(char* args)
1146 {
1147  char* accountStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
1148 
1149  std::string targetAccountName;
1150  Player* targetPlayer = nullptr;
1151  uint32 targetAccountId = ExtractAccountId(&accountStr, &targetAccountName, &targetPlayer);
1152  if (!targetAccountId)
1153  return false;
1154 
1156  if (GetAccountId() == targetAccountId)
1157  return false;
1158 
1159  int32 gm;
1160  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, gm))
1161  return false;
1162 
1163  if (gm < SEC_PLAYER || gm > SEC_ADMINISTRATOR)
1164  {
1165  SendSysMessage(LANG_BAD_VALUE);
1166  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1167  return false;
1168  }
1169 
1172  if (HasLowerSecurityAccount(nullptr, targetAccountId, true))
1173  return false;
1174 
1176  AccountTypes plSecurity = GetAccessLevel();
1177  if (AccountTypes(gm) >= plSecurity)
1178  {
1179  SendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_SECURITY_IS_LOW);
1180  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1181  return false;
1182  }
1183 
1184  if (targetPlayer)
1185  {
1186  ChatHandler(targetPlayer).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_SECURITY_CHANGED, GetNameLink().c_str(), gm);
1187  targetPlayer->GetSession()->SetSecurity(AccountTypes(gm));
1188  }
1189 
1190  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_CHANGE_SECURITY, targetAccountName.c_str(), gm);
1191  LoginDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE account SET gmlevel = '%i' WHERE id = '%u'", gm, targetAccountId);
1192 
1193  return true;
1194 }
1195 
1197 bool ChatHandler::HandleAccountSetPasswordCommand(char* args)
1198 {
1200  std::string account_name;
1201  uint32 targetAccountId = ExtractAccountId(&args, &account_name);
1202  if (!targetAccountId)
1203  return false;
1204 
1205  // allow or quoted string with possible spaces or literal without spaces
1206  char* szPassword1 = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
1207  char* szPassword2 = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
1208  if (!szPassword1 || !szPassword2)
1209  return false;
1210 
1213  if (HasLowerSecurityAccount(nullptr, targetAccountId, true))
1214  return false;
1215 
1216  if (strcmp(szPassword1, szPassword2))
1217  {
1218  SendSysMessage(LANG_NEW_PASSWORDS_NOT_MATCH);
1219  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1220  return false;
1221  }
1222 
1223  AccountOpResult result = sAccountMgr.ChangePassword(targetAccountId, szPassword1);
1224 
1225  switch (result)
1226  {
1227  case AOR_OK:
1228  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_PASSWORD);
1229  break;
1230  case AOR_NAME_NOT_EXIST:
1231  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST, account_name.c_str());
1232  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1233  return false;
1234  case AOR_PASS_TOO_LONG:
1235  SendSysMessage(LANG_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG);
1236  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1237  return false;
1238  default:
1239  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTCHANGEPASSWORD);
1240  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1241  return false;
1242  }
1243 
1244  // OK, but avoid normal report for hide passwords, but log use command for anyone
1245  char msg[100];
1246  snprintf(msg, 100, ".account set password %s *** ***", account_name.c_str());
1247  LogCommand(msg);
1248  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1249  return false;
1250 }
1251 
1252 void ChatHandler::ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criEntry, AchievementEntry const* achEntry, LocaleConstant loc, Player* target /*= nullptr*/)
1253 {
1254  std::ostringstream ss;
1255  if (m_session)
1256  {
1257  ss << criEntry->ID << " - |cffffffff|Hachievement_criteria:" << criEntry->ID << "|h[" << criEntry->name[loc] << " " << localeNames[loc] << "]|h|r";
1258  }
1259  else
1260  ss << criEntry->ID << " - " << criEntry->name[loc] << " " << localeNames[loc];
1261 
1262  if (target)
1263  ss << " = " << target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCriteriaProgressCounter(criEntry);
1264 
1265  if (achEntry->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER)
1266  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_COUNTER);
1267  else
1268  {
1269  ss << " [" << AchievementMgr::GetCriteriaProgressMaxCounter(criEntry, achEntry) << "]";
1270 
1271  if (target && target->GetAchievementMgr().IsCompletedCriteria(criEntry, achEntry))
1272  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_COMPLETE);
1273  }
1274 
1275  SendSysMessage(ss.str().c_str());
1276 }
1277 
1278 bool ChatHandler::HandleAchievementCommand(char* args)
1279 {
1280  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
1281 
1282  Player* target = nullptr;
1283 
1284  if (nameStr)
1285  {
1286  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target))
1287  return false;
1288  }
1289  else
1290  target = getSelectedPlayer();
1291 
1292  uint32 achId;
1293  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement", achId))
1294  return false;
1295 
1296  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(achId);
1297  if (!achEntry)
1298  {
1299  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACHIEVEMENT_NOT_EXIST, achId);
1300  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1301  return false;
1302  }
1303 
1304  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1305 
1306  CompletedAchievementData const* completed = target ? target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCompleteData(achId) : nullptr;
1307 
1308  ShowAchievementListHelper(achEntry, loc, completed ? &completed->date : nullptr, target);
1309 
1310  if (AchievementCriteriaEntryList const* criteriaList = sAchievementMgr.GetAchievementCriteriaByAchievement(achEntry->ID))
1311  {
1312  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA);
1313  for (auto itr : *criteriaList)
1314  ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(itr, achEntry, loc, target);
1315  }
1316 
1317  return true;
1318 }
1319 
1320 bool ChatHandler::HandleAchievementAddCommand(char* args)
1321 {
1322  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
1323 
1324  Player* target;
1325  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target))
1326  return false;
1327 
1328  uint32 achId;
1329  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement", achId))
1330  return false;
1331 
1332  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(achId);
1333  if (!achEntry || achEntry->flags & ACHIEVEMENT_FLAG_COUNTER)
1334  {
1335  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACHIEVEMENT_NOT_EXIST, achId);
1336  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1337  return false;
1338  }
1339 
1340  AchievementMgr& mgr = target->GetAchievementMgr();
1341 
1342  if (AchievementCriteriaEntryList const* criteriaList = sAchievementMgr.GetAchievementCriteriaByAchievement(achEntry->ID))
1343  {
1344  for (auto itr : *criteriaList)
1345  {
1346  if (mgr.IsCompletedCriteria(itr, achEntry))
1347  continue;
1348 
1349  uint32 maxValue = AchievementMgr::GetCriteriaProgressMaxCounter(itr, achEntry);
1350  if (maxValue == std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max())
1351  maxValue = 1; // Exception for counter like achievements, set them only to 1
1352  mgr.SetCriteriaProgress(itr, achEntry, maxValue, AchievementMgr::PROGRESS_SET);
1353  }
1354  }
1355 
1356  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1357  CompletedAchievementData const* completed = target ? target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCompleteData(achId) : nullptr;
1358  ShowAchievementListHelper(achEntry, loc, completed ? &completed->date : nullptr, target);
1359  return true;
1360 }
1361 
1362 bool ChatHandler::HandleAchievementRemoveCommand(char* args)
1363 {
1364  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
1365 
1366  Player* target;
1367  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target))
1368  return false;
1369 
1370  uint32 achId;
1371  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement", achId))
1372  return false;
1373 
1374  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(achId);
1375  if (!achEntry)
1376  {
1377  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACHIEVEMENT_NOT_EXIST, achId);
1378  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1379  return false;
1380  }
1381 
1382  AchievementMgr& mgr = target->GetAchievementMgr();
1383 
1384  if (AchievementCriteriaEntryList const* criteriaList = sAchievementMgr.GetAchievementCriteriaByAchievement(achEntry->ID))
1385  for (auto itr : *criteriaList)
1386  mgr.SetCriteriaProgress(itr, achEntry, 0, AchievementMgr::PROGRESS_SET);
1387 
1388  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1389  CompletedAchievementData const* completed = target ? target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCompleteData(achId) : nullptr;
1390  ShowAchievementListHelper(achEntry, loc, completed ? &completed->date : nullptr, target);
1391  return true;
1392 }
1393 
1394 bool ChatHandler::HandleAchievementCriteriaAddCommand(char* args)
1395 {
1396  Player* target;
1397  uint32 criId;
1398 
1399  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement_criteria", criId))
1400  {
1401  // maybe player first
1402  char* nameStr = ExtractArg(&args);
1403  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target))
1404  return false;
1405 
1406  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement_criteria", criId))
1407  return false;
1408  }
1409  else
1410  target = getSelectedPlayer();
1411 
1412  AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criEntry = sAchievementCriteriaStore.LookupEntry(criId);
1413  if (!criEntry)
1414  {
1415  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_NOT_EXIST, criId);
1416  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1417  return false;
1418  }
1419 
1420  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(criEntry->referredAchievement);
1421  if (!achEntry)
1422  return false;
1423 
1424  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1425 
1426  uint32 maxValue = AchievementMgr::GetCriteriaProgressMaxCounter(criEntry, achEntry);
1427  if (maxValue == std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max())
1428  maxValue = 1; // Exception for counter like achievements, set them only to 1
1429 
1430  AchievementMgr& mgr = target->GetAchievementMgr();
1431 
1432  // nothing do if completed
1433  if (mgr.IsCompletedCriteria(criEntry, achEntry))
1434  {
1435  ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(criEntry, achEntry, loc, target);
1436  return true;
1437  }
1438 
1439  uint32 progress = mgr.GetCriteriaProgressCounter(criEntry);
1440 
1441  uint32 val;
1442  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, val, maxValue ? maxValue : 1))
1443  return false;
1444 
1445  uint32 new_val;
1446 
1447  if (maxValue)
1448  new_val = progress < maxValue && maxValue - progress > val ? progress + val : maxValue;
1449  else
1450  {
1451  uint32 max_int = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max();
1452  new_val = progress < max_int && max_int - progress > val ? progress + val : max_int;
1453  }
1454 
1455  mgr.SetCriteriaProgress(criEntry, achEntry, new_val, AchievementMgr::PROGRESS_SET);
1456 
1457  ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(criEntry, achEntry, loc, target);
1458  return true;
1459 }
1460 
1461 bool ChatHandler::HandleAchievementCriteriaRemoveCommand(char* args)
1462 {
1463  Player* target;
1464  uint32 criId;
1465 
1466  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement_criteria", criId))
1467  {
1468  // maybe player first
1469  char* nameStr = ExtractArg(&args);
1470  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target))
1471  return false;
1472 
1473  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hachievement_criteria", criId))
1474  return false;
1475  }
1476  else
1477  target = getSelectedPlayer();
1478 
1479  AchievementCriteriaEntry const* criEntry = sAchievementCriteriaStore.LookupEntry(criId);
1480  if (!criEntry)
1481  {
1482  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_NOT_EXIST, criId);
1483  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1484  return false;
1485  }
1486 
1487  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(criEntry->referredAchievement);
1488  if (!achEntry)
1489  return false;
1490 
1491  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1492 
1493  uint32 maxValue = AchievementMgr::GetCriteriaProgressMaxCounter(criEntry, achEntry);
1494  if (maxValue == std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max())
1495  maxValue = 1; // Exception for counter like achievements, set them only to 1
1496 
1497  AchievementMgr& mgr = target->GetAchievementMgr();
1498 
1499  uint32 progress = mgr.GetCriteriaProgressCounter(criEntry);
1500 
1501  // nothing do if not started
1502  if (progress == 0)
1503  {
1504  ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(criEntry, achEntry, loc, target);
1505  return true;
1506  }
1507 
1508  uint32 change;
1509  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, change, maxValue ? maxValue : 1))
1510  return false;
1511 
1512  uint32 newval = change < progress ? progress - change : 0;
1513 
1514  mgr.SetCriteriaProgress(criEntry, achEntry, newval, AchievementMgr::PROGRESS_SET);
1515 
1516  ShowAchievementCriteriaListHelper(criEntry, achEntry, loc, target);
1517  return true;
1518 }
1519 
1520 bool ChatHandler::HandleMaxSkillCommand(char* /*args*/)
1521 {
1522  Player* SelectedPlayer = getSelectedPlayer();
1523  if (!SelectedPlayer)
1524  {
1525  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
1526  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1527  return false;
1528  }
1529 
1530  // each skills that have max skill value dependent from level seted to current level max skill value
1531  SelectedPlayer->UpdateSkillsForLevel(true);
1532  return true;
1533 }
1534 
1535 bool ChatHandler::HandleSetSkillCommand(char* args)
1536 {
1537  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1538  if (!target)
1539  {
1540  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
1541  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1542  return false;
1543  }
1544 
1545  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hskill:skill_id|h[name]|h|r
1546  char* skill_p = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hskill");
1547  if (!skill_p)
1548  return false;
1549 
1550  int32 skill;
1551  if (!ExtractInt32(&skill_p, skill))
1552  return false;
1553 
1554  int32 level;
1555  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, level))
1556  return false;
1557 
1558  int32 maxskill;
1559  if (!ExtractOptInt32(&args, maxskill, target->GetSkillMaxPure(skill)))
1560  return false;
1561 
1562  if (skill <= 0)
1563  {
1564  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_SKILL_ID, skill);
1565  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1566  return false;
1567  }
1568 
1569  SkillLineEntry const* sl = sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(skill);
1570  if (!sl)
1571  {
1572  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_SKILL_ID, skill);
1573  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1574  return false;
1575  }
1576 
1577  std::string tNameLink = GetNameLink(target);
1578 
1579  if (!target->GetSkillValue(skill))
1580  {
1581  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SET_SKILL_ERROR, tNameLink.c_str(), skill, sl->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()]);
1582  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1583  return false;
1584  }
1585 
1586  if (level <= 0 || level > maxskill || maxskill <= 0)
1587  return false;
1588 
1589  target->SetSkill(skill, level, maxskill);
1590  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SET_SKILL, skill, sl->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], tNameLink.c_str(), level, maxskill);
1591 
1592  return true;
1593 }
1594 
1595 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnLearnCommand(char* args)
1596 {
1597  if (!*args)
1598  return false;
1599 
1600  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r
1601  uint32 spell_id = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
1602  if (!spell_id)
1603  return false;
1604 
1605  bool allRanks = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "all") != nullptr;
1606  if (!allRanks && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
1607  return false;
1608 
1609  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1610  if (!target)
1611  {
1612  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
1613  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1614  return false;
1615  }
1616 
1617  if (allRanks)
1618  spell_id = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spell_id);
1619 
1620  if (target->HasSpell(spell_id))
1621  target->removeSpell(spell_id, false, !allRanks);
1622  else
1623  SendSysMessage(LANG_FORGET_SPELL);
1624 
1625  if (GetTalentSpellCost(spell_id))
1626  target->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
1627 
1628  return true;
1629 }
1630 
1631 bool ChatHandler::HandleCooldownListCommand(char* /*args*/)
1632 {
1633  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
1634  if (!target)
1635  {
1636  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
1637  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1638  return false;
1639  }
1640 
1641 
1642  target->PrintCooldownList(*this);
1643  return true;
1644 }
1645 
1646 bool ChatHandler::HandleCooldownClearCommand(char* args)
1647 {
1648  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
1649  if (!target)
1650  {
1651  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
1652  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1653  return false;
1654  }
1655 
1656  std::string tNameLink = "Unknown";
1657  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1658  tNameLink = GetNameLink(static_cast<Player*>(target));
1659  else
1660  tNameLink = target->GetNameStr();
1661 
1662  if (!*args)
1663  {
1664  target->RemoveAllCooldowns();
1665  PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEALL_COOLDOWN, tNameLink.c_str());
1666  }
1667  else
1668  {
1669  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
1670  uint32 spell_id = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
1671  if (!spell_id)
1672  return false;
1673 
1674  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell_id);
1675  if (!spellEntry)
1676  {
1677  PSendSysMessage(LANG_UNKNOWN_SPELL, target == m_session->GetPlayer() ? GetMangosString(LANG_YOU) : tNameLink.c_str());
1678  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1679  return false;
1680  }
1681 
1682  target->RemoveSpellCooldown(*spellEntry);
1683  PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVE_COOLDOWN, spell_id, target == m_session->GetPlayer() ? GetMangosString(LANG_YOU) : tNameLink.c_str());
1684  }
1685  return true;
1686 }
1687 
1688 bool ChatHandler::HandleCooldownClearClientSideCommand(char*)
1689 {
1690  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1691  if (!target)
1692  {
1693  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1694  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1695  return false;
1696  }
1697 
1698  std::string tNameLink = GetNameLink(target);
1699 
1700  target->RemoveAllCooldowns(true);
1701  PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEALL_COOLDOWN, tNameLink.c_str());
1702  return true;
1703 }
1704 
1705 bool ChatHandler::HandleCooldownClearArenaCommand(char*)
1706 {
1707  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1708  if (!target)
1709  {
1710  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1711  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1712  return false;
1713  }
1714 
1715  std::string tNameLink = GetNameLink(target);
1716 
1717  target->RemoveArenaSpellCooldowns();
1718  PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEALL_COOLDOWN, tNameLink.c_str());
1719  return true;
1720 }
1721 
1722 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllCommand(char* /*args*/)
1723 {
1724  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
1725  if (!player)
1726  {
1727  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1728  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1729  return false;
1730  }
1731 
1732  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sSpellTemplate.GetMaxEntry(); i++)
1733  {
1734  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(i);
1735  if (!spellInfo)
1736  continue;
1737 
1738  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; j++)
1739  {
1740  if ((spellInfo->Effect[j] == SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL) &&
1741  (spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[j] == TARGET_NONE))
1742  {
1743  uint32 spellId = spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[j];
1744  SpellEntry const* newSpell = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
1745 
1746  // skip broken spells
1747  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(newSpell, player, false))
1748  continue;
1749 
1750  // skip spells with first rank learned as talent (and all talents then also)
1751  uint32 firstRankId = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spellId);
1752  if (GetTalentSpellCost(firstRankId) > 0)
1753  continue;
1754 
1755  if (!IsSpellHaveEffect(newSpell, SPELL_EFFECT_PROFICIENCY))
1756  {
1757  // only class spells
1758  if (!newSpell->SpellFamilyName)
1759  continue;
1760 
1761  // skip passives
1762  if (newSpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_PASSIVE) ||
1763  newSpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_DISPLAY) ||
1764  newSpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_USE_SHAPESHIFT_BAR))
1765  continue;
1766  }
1767 
1768  player->learnSpell(spellId, false);
1769  }
1770  }
1771  }
1772 
1773  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_MANY_SPELLS);
1774 
1775  return true;
1776 }
1777 
1778 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllGMCommand(char* /*args*/)
1779 {
1780  static uint32 gmSpellList[] =
1781  {
1782  11, // Frostbolt of Ages 1000 damage, no cooldown
1783  13, // Swim Speed (TEST)
1784  26, // Bind Self (TEST) sets hearthstone to current location
1785  47, // Sprint (TEST)
1786  260, // Charm (TEST)
1787  265, // Area Death (TEST)
1788  530, // Charm (Possess)
1789  1908, // Uber Heal Over Time
1790  2583, // Debug Spell Reflection (Debug)
1791  2650, // Tame Pet (TEST)
1792  2653, // Damage 100 (TEST)
1793  2654, // Summon Tamed (TEST)
1794  5259, // Disarm (TEST)
1795  5696, // Charge (TEST)
1796  9454, // Freeze permanent stun, useful for holding misbehaving players
1797  10032, // Uber Stealth
1798  18800, // Light Test
1799  18209, // Test Grow
1800  18210, // Test Shrink
1801  23452, // Invisibility
1802  23775, // Stun Forever
1803  24199, // Knockback 35
1804  35182, // Banish
1805  35874, // Master Buff (Physical) 525 AP, +14 all stats, 10% to all stats
1806  35912, // Master Buff (Magical) 54 Int, 49 mp/5, 10% to all stats
1807  38505, // Shackle
1808  38734, // Master Ranged Buff 220 Ranged AP, +18 all stats, 10% to all stats
1809  39258, // Automation Root Spell (QAE) AoE permanent root
1810  40678, // Super Jump
1811  40733, // Divine Shield infinite duration bubble
1812  43097, // Summon All Players
1813  45590, // QA DoT Debug 1000 1000 damage per tick for 30 seconds, stackable
1814  45813, // QA Debug Instant Cast Buff
1815  46876, // QAE Drunk Effect
1816  0
1817  };
1818 
1819  for (uint32 spell : gmSpellList)
1820  {
1821  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
1822  if (!spellInfo || !SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, m_session->GetPlayer()))
1823  {
1824  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spell);
1825  continue;
1826  }
1827 
1828  m_session->GetPlayer()->learnSpell(spell, false);
1829  }
1830 
1831  SendSysMessage(LANG_LEARNING_GM_SKILLS);
1832  return true;
1833 }
1834 
1835 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllMyClassCommand(char* /*args*/)
1836 {
1837  HandleLearnAllMySpellsCommand((char*)"");
1838  HandleLearnAllMyTalentsCommand((char*)"");
1839  return true;
1840 }
1841 
1842 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllMySpellsCommand(char* /*args*/)
1843 {
1844  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
1845  ChrClassesEntry const* clsEntry = sChrClassesStore.LookupEntry(player->getClass());
1846  if (!clsEntry)
1847  return true;
1848  uint32 family = clsEntry->spellfamily;
1849 
1850  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sSkillLineAbilityStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
1851  {
1852  SkillLineAbilityEntry const* entry = sSkillLineAbilityStore.LookupEntry(i);
1853  if (!entry)
1854  continue;
1855 
1856  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(entry->spellId);
1857  if (!spellInfo)
1858  continue;
1859 
1860  // skip server-side/triggered spells
1861  if (spellInfo->spellLevel == 0)
1862  continue;
1863 
1864  // skip wrong class/race skills
1865  if (!player->IsSpellFitByClassAndRace(spellInfo->Id))
1866  continue;
1867 
1868  // skip other spell families
1869  if (spellInfo->SpellFamilyName != family)
1870  continue;
1871 
1872  // skip spells with first rank learned as talent (and all talents then also)
1873  uint32 first_rank = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spellInfo->Id);
1874  if (GetTalentSpellCost(first_rank) > 0)
1875  continue;
1876 
1877  // skip broken spells
1878  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, player, false))
1879  continue;
1880 
1881  player->learnSpell(spellInfo->Id, false);
1882  }
1883 
1884  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_CLASS_SPELLS);
1885  return true;
1886 }
1887 
1888 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllMyTalentsCommand(char* /*args*/)
1889 {
1890  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
1891  uint32 classMask = player->getClassMask();
1892 
1893  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sTalentStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
1894  {
1895  TalentEntry const* talentInfo = sTalentStore.LookupEntry(i);
1896  if (!talentInfo)
1897  continue;
1898 
1899  TalentTabEntry const* talentTabInfo = sTalentTabStore.LookupEntry(talentInfo->TalentTab);
1900  if (!talentTabInfo)
1901  continue;
1902 
1903  if ((classMask & talentTabInfo->ClassMask) == 0)
1904  continue;
1905 
1906  // search highest talent rank
1907  uint32 spellid = 0;
1908 
1909  for (int rank = MAX_TALENT_RANK - 1; rank >= 0; --rank)
1910  {
1911  if (talentInfo->RankID[rank] != 0)
1912  {
1913  spellid = talentInfo->RankID[rank];
1914  break;
1915  }
1916  }
1917 
1918  if (!spellid) // ??? none spells in talent
1919  continue;
1920 
1921  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellid);
1922  if (!spellInfo || !SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, player, false))
1923  continue;
1924 
1925  // learn highest rank of talent and learn all non-talent spell ranks (recursive by tree)
1926  player->learnSpellHighRank(spellid);
1927  }
1928 
1929  player->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
1930 
1931  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_CLASS_TALENTS);
1932  return true;
1933 }
1934 
1935 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllMyPetTalentsCommand(char* /*args*/)
1936 {
1937  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
1938 
1939  Pet* pet = player->GetPet();
1940  if (!pet)
1941  {
1942  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_PET_FOUND);
1943  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1944  return false;
1945  }
1946 
1947  CreatureInfo const* ci = pet->GetCreatureInfo();
1948  if (!ci)
1949  {
1950  SendSysMessage(LANG_WRONG_PET_TYPE);
1951  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1952  return false;
1953  }
1954 
1955  CreatureFamilyEntry const* pet_family = sCreatureFamilyStore.LookupEntry(ci->Family);
1956  if (!pet_family)
1957  {
1958  SendSysMessage(LANG_WRONG_PET_TYPE);
1959  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1960  return false;
1961  }
1962 
1963  if (pet_family->petTalentType < 0) // not hunter pet
1964  {
1965  SendSysMessage(LANG_WRONG_PET_TYPE);
1966  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1967  return false;
1968  }
1969 
1970  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sTalentStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
1971  {
1972  TalentEntry const* talentInfo = sTalentStore.LookupEntry(i);
1973  if (!talentInfo)
1974  continue;
1975 
1976  TalentTabEntry const* talentTabInfo = sTalentTabStore.LookupEntry(talentInfo->TalentTab);
1977  if (!talentTabInfo)
1978  continue;
1979 
1980  // prevent learn talent for different family (cheating)
1981  if (((1 << pet_family->petTalentType) & talentTabInfo->petTalentMask) == 0)
1982  continue;
1983 
1984  // search highest talent rank
1985  uint32 spellid = 0;
1986 
1987  for (int rank = MAX_TALENT_RANK - 1; rank >= 0; --rank)
1988  {
1989  if (talentInfo->RankID[rank] != 0)
1990  {
1991  spellid = talentInfo->RankID[rank];
1992  break;
1993  }
1994  }
1995 
1996  if (!spellid) // ??? none spells in talent
1997  continue;
1998 
1999  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellid);
2000  if (!spellInfo || !SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, player, false))
2001  continue;
2002 
2003  // learn highest rank of talent and learn all non-talent spell ranks (recursive by tree)
2004  pet->learnSpellHighRank(spellid);
2005  }
2006 
2007  player->SendTalentsInfoData(true);
2008 
2009  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_PET_TALENTS);
2010  return true;
2011 }
2012 
2013 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllLangCommand(char* /*args*/)
2014 {
2015  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
2016 
2017  // skipping UNIVERSAL language (0)
2018  for (int i = 1; i < LANGUAGES_COUNT; ++i)
2019  player->learnSpell(lang_description[i].spell_id, false);
2020 
2021  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_ALL_LANG);
2022  return true;
2023 }
2024 
2025 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllDefaultCommand(char* args)
2026 {
2027  Player* target;
2028  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target))
2029  return false;
2030 
2031  target->LearnDefaultSkills();
2032  target->learnDefaultSpells();
2033  target->learnQuestRewardedSpells();
2034 
2035  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_ALL_DEFAULT_AND_QUEST, GetNameLink(target).c_str());
2036  return true;
2037 }
2038 
2039 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnCommand(char* args)
2040 {
2041  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
2042  Player* targetPlayer = getSelectedPlayer();
2043 
2044  if (!targetPlayer)
2045  {
2046  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
2047  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2048  return false;
2049  }
2050 
2051  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
2052  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
2053  if (!spell || !sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell))
2054  return false;
2055 
2056  bool allRanks = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "all") != nullptr;
2057  if (!allRanks && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
2058  return false;
2059 
2060  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
2061  if (!spellInfo || !SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, player))
2062  {
2063  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spell);
2064  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2065  return false;
2066  }
2067 
2068  if (!allRanks && targetPlayer->HasSpell(spell))
2069  {
2070  if (targetPlayer == player)
2071  SendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_KNOWN_SPELL);
2072  else
2073  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TARGET_KNOWN_SPELL, GetNameLink(targetPlayer).c_str());
2074  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2075  return false;
2076  }
2077 
2078  if (allRanks)
2079  targetPlayer->learnSpellHighRank(spell);
2080  else
2081  targetPlayer->learnSpell(spell, false);
2082 
2083  uint32 first_spell = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spell);
2084  if (GetTalentSpellCost(first_spell))
2085  targetPlayer->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
2086 
2087  return true;
2088 }
2089 
2090 bool ChatHandler::HandleAddItemCommand(char* args)
2091 {
2092  char* cId = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hitem");
2093  if (!cId)
2094  return false;
2095 
2096  uint32 itemId = 0;
2097  if (!ExtractUInt32(&cId, itemId)) // [name] manual form
2098  {
2099  std::string itemName = cId;
2100  WorldDatabase.escape_string(itemName);
2101  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT entry FROM item_template WHERE name = '%s'", itemName.c_str());
2102  if (!result)
2103  {
2104  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_COULDNOTFIND, cId);
2105  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2106  return false;
2107  }
2108  itemId = result->Fetch()->GetUInt16();
2109  delete result;
2110  }
2111 
2112  int32 count;
2113  if (!ExtractOptInt32(&args, count, 1))
2114  return false;
2115 
2116  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
2117  Player* plTarget = getSelectedPlayer();
2118  if (!plTarget)
2119  plTarget = pl;
2120 
2121  DETAIL_LOG(GetMangosString(LANG_ADDITEM), itemId, count);
2122 
2123  ItemPrototype const* pProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(itemId);
2124  if (!pProto)
2125  {
2126  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, itemId);
2127  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2128  return false;
2129  }
2130 
2131  // Subtract
2132  if (count < 0)
2133  {
2134  plTarget->DestroyItemCount(itemId, -count, true, true);
2135  PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEITEM, itemId, -count, GetNameLink(plTarget).c_str());
2136  return true;
2137  }
2138 
2139  // Adding items
2140  uint32 noSpaceForCount = 0;
2141 
2142  // check space and find places
2143  ItemPosCountVec dest;
2144  uint8 msg = plTarget->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, itemId, count, &noSpaceForCount);
2145  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK) // convert to possible store amount
2146  count -= noSpaceForCount;
2147 
2148  if (count == 0 || dest.empty()) // can't add any
2149  {
2150  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, itemId, noSpaceForCount);
2151  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2152  return false;
2153  }
2154 
2155  Item* item = plTarget->StoreNewItem(dest, itemId, true, Item::GenerateItemRandomPropertyId(itemId));
2156 
2157  // remove binding (let GM give it to another player later)
2158  if (pl == plTarget)
2159  for (ItemPosCountVec::const_iterator itr = dest.begin(); itr != dest.end(); ++itr)
2160  if (Item* item1 = pl->GetItemByPos(itr->pos))
2161  item1->SetBinding(false);
2162 
2163  if (count > 0 && item)
2164  {
2165  pl->SendNewItem(item, count, false, true);
2166  if (pl != plTarget)
2167  plTarget->SendNewItem(item, count, true, false);
2168  }
2169 
2170  if (noSpaceForCount > 0)
2171  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, itemId, noSpaceForCount);
2172 
2173  return true;
2174 }
2175 
2176 bool ChatHandler::HandleAddItemSetCommand(char* args)
2177 {
2178  uint32 itemsetId;
2179  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hitemset", itemsetId))
2180  return false;
2181 
2182  // prevent generation all items with itemset field value '0'
2183  if (itemsetId == 0)
2184  {
2185  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_ITEMS_FROM_ITEMSET_FOUND, itemsetId);
2186  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2187  return false;
2188  }
2189 
2190  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
2191  Player* plTarget = getSelectedPlayer();
2192  if (!plTarget)
2193  plTarget = pl;
2194 
2195  DETAIL_LOG(GetMangosString(LANG_ADDITEMSET), itemsetId);
2196 
2197  bool found = false;
2198  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sItemStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++id)
2199  {
2200  ItemPrototype const* pProto = sItemStorage.LookupEntry<ItemPrototype>(id);
2201  if (!pProto)
2202  continue;
2203 
2204  if (pProto->ItemSet == itemsetId)
2205  {
2206  found = true;
2207  ItemPosCountVec dest;
2208  InventoryResult msg = plTarget->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, pProto->ItemId, 1);
2209  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK)
2210  {
2211  Item* item = plTarget->StoreNewItem(dest, pProto->ItemId, true);
2212 
2213  // remove binding (let GM give it to another player later)
2214  if (pl == plTarget)
2215  item->SetBinding(false);
2216 
2217  pl->SendNewItem(item, 1, false, true);
2218  if (pl != plTarget)
2219  plTarget->SendNewItem(item, 1, true, false);
2220  }
2221  else
2222  {
2223  pl->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, pProto->ItemId);
2224  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, pProto->ItemId, 1);
2225  }
2226  }
2227  }
2228 
2229  if (!found)
2230  {
2231  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_ITEMS_FROM_ITEMSET_FOUND, itemsetId);
2232 
2233  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2234  return false;
2235  }
2236 
2237  return true;
2238 }
2239 
2240 bool ChatHandler::HandleListItemCommand(char* args)
2241 {
2242  uint32 item_id;
2243  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hitem", item_id))
2244  return false;
2245 
2246  if (!item_id)
2247  {
2248  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
2249  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2250  return false;
2251  }
2252 
2253  ItemPrototype const* itemProto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(item_id);
2254  if (!itemProto)
2255  {
2256  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
2257  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2258  return false;
2259  }
2260 
2261  uint32 count;
2262  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, count, 10))
2263  return false;
2264 
2265  // inventory case
2266  uint32 inv_count = 0;
2267  QueryResult* result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT COUNT(item_template) FROM character_inventory WHERE item_template='%u'", item_id);
2268  if (result)
2269  {
2270  inv_count = (*result)[0].GetUInt32();
2271  delete result;
2272  }
2273 
2274  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery(
2275  // 0 1 2 3 4 5
2276  "SELECT ci.item, cibag.slot AS bag, ci.slot, ci.guid, characters.account,characters.name "
2277  "FROM character_inventory AS ci LEFT JOIN character_inventory AS cibag ON (cibag.item=ci.bag),characters "
2278  "WHERE ci.item_template='%u' AND ci.guid = characters.guid LIMIT %u ",
2279  item_id, uint32(count));
2280 
2281  if (result)
2282  {
2283  do
2284  {
2285  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2286  uint32 item_guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2287  uint32 item_bag = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2288  uint32 item_slot = fields[2].GetUInt32();
2289  uint32 owner_guid = fields[3].GetUInt32();
2290  uint32 owner_acc = fields[4].GetUInt32();
2291  std::string owner_name = fields[5].GetCppString();
2292 
2293  char const* item_pos;
2294  if (Player::IsEquipmentPos(item_bag, item_slot))
2295  item_pos = "[equipped]";
2296  else if (Player::IsInventoryPos(item_bag, item_slot))
2297  item_pos = "[in inventory]";
2298  else if (Player::IsBankPos(item_bag, item_slot))
2299  item_pos = "[in bank]";
2300  else
2301  item_pos = "";
2302 
2303  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMLIST_SLOT,
2304  item_guid, owner_name.c_str(), owner_guid, owner_acc, item_pos);
2305  }
2306  while (result->NextRow());
2307 
2308  uint32 res_count = uint32(result->GetRowCount());
2309 
2310  delete result;
2311 
2312  if (count > res_count)
2313  count -= res_count;
2314  else if (count)
2315  count = 0;
2316  }
2317 
2318  // mail case
2319  uint32 mail_count = 0;
2320  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT COUNT(item_template) FROM mail_items WHERE item_template='%u'", item_id);
2321  if (result)
2322  {
2323  mail_count = (*result)[0].GetUInt32();
2324  delete result;
2325  }
2326 
2327  if (count > 0)
2328  {
2329  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery(
2330  // 0 1 2 3 4 5 6
2331  "SELECT mail_items.item_guid, mail.sender, mail.receiver, char_s.account, char_s.name, char_r.account, char_r.name "
2332  "FROM mail,mail_items,characters as char_s,characters as char_r "
2333  "WHERE mail_items.item_template='%u' AND char_s.guid = mail.sender AND char_r.guid = mail.receiver AND mail.id=mail_items.mail_id LIMIT %u",
2334  item_id, uint32(count));
2335  }
2336  else
2337  result = nullptr;
2338 
2339  if (result)
2340  {
2341  do
2342  {
2343  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2344  uint32 item_guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2345  uint32 item_s = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2346  uint32 item_r = fields[2].GetUInt32();
2347  uint32 item_s_acc = fields[3].GetUInt32();
2348  std::string item_s_name = fields[4].GetCppString();
2349  uint32 item_r_acc = fields[5].GetUInt32();
2350  std::string item_r_name = fields[6].GetCppString();
2351 
2352  char const* item_pos = "[in mail]";
2353 
2354  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMLIST_MAIL,
2355  item_guid, item_s_name.c_str(), item_s, item_s_acc, item_r_name.c_str(), item_r, item_r_acc, item_pos);
2356  }
2357  while (result->NextRow());
2358 
2359  uint32 res_count = uint32(result->GetRowCount());
2360 
2361  delete result;
2362 
2363  if (count > res_count)
2364  count -= res_count;
2365  else if (count)
2366  count = 0;
2367  }
2368 
2369  // auction case
2370  uint32 auc_count = 0;
2371  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT COUNT(item_template) FROM auction WHERE item_template='%u'", item_id);
2372  if (result)
2373  {
2374  auc_count = (*result)[0].GetUInt32();
2375  delete result;
2376  }
2377 
2378  if (count > 0)
2379  {
2380  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery(
2381  // 0 1 2 3
2382  "SELECT auction.itemguid, auction.itemowner, characters.account, characters.name "
2383  "FROM auction,characters WHERE auction.item_template='%u' AND characters.guid = auction.itemowner LIMIT %u",
2384  item_id, uint32(count));
2385  }
2386  else
2387  result = nullptr;
2388 
2389  if (result)
2390  {
2391  do
2392  {
2393  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2394  uint32 item_guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2395  uint32 owner = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2396  uint32 owner_acc = fields[2].GetUInt32();
2397  std::string owner_name = fields[3].GetCppString();
2398 
2399  char const* item_pos = "[in auction]";
2400 
2401  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMLIST_AUCTION, item_guid, owner_name.c_str(), owner, owner_acc, item_pos);
2402  }
2403  while (result->NextRow());
2404 
2405  delete result;
2406  }
2407 
2408  // guild bank case
2409  uint32 guild_count = 0;
2410  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT COUNT(item_entry) FROM guild_bank_item WHERE item_entry='%u'", item_id);
2411  if (result)
2412  {
2413  guild_count = (*result)[0].GetUInt32();
2414  delete result;
2415  }
2416 
2417  result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery(
2418  // 0 1 2
2419  "SELECT gi.item_guid, gi.guildid, guild.name "
2420  "FROM guild_bank_item AS gi, guild WHERE gi.item_entry='%u' AND gi.guildid = guild.guildid LIMIT %u ",
2421  item_id, uint32(count));
2422 
2423  if (result)
2424  {
2425  do
2426  {
2427  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2428  uint32 item_guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2429  uint32 guild_guid = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2430  std::string guild_name = fields[2].GetCppString();
2431 
2432  char const* item_pos = "[in guild bank]";
2433 
2434  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMLIST_GUILD, item_guid, guild_name.c_str(), guild_guid, item_pos);
2435  }
2436  while (result->NextRow());
2437 
2438  uint32 res_count = uint32(result->GetRowCount());
2439 
2440  delete result;
2441 
2442  if (count > res_count)
2443  count -= res_count;
2444  else if (count)
2445  count = 0;
2446  }
2447 
2448  if (inv_count + mail_count + auc_count + guild_count == 0)
2449  {
2450  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOITEMFOUND);
2451  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2452  return false;
2453  }
2454 
2455  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LISTITEMMESSAGE, item_id, inv_count + mail_count + auc_count + guild_count, inv_count, mail_count, auc_count, guild_count);
2456 
2457  return true;
2458 }
2459 
2460 bool ChatHandler::HandleListObjectCommand(char* args)
2461 {
2462  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject_entry:go_id|h[name]|h|r
2463  uint32 go_id;
2464  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject_entry", go_id))
2465  return false;
2466 
2467  if (!go_id)
2468  {
2469  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LISTOBJINVALIDID, go_id);
2470  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2471  return false;
2472  }
2473 
2474  GameObjectInfo const* gInfo = ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(go_id);
2475  if (!gInfo)
2476  {
2477  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LISTOBJINVALIDID, go_id);
2478  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2479  return false;
2480  }
2481 
2482  Player* player = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
2483 
2484  static const uint32 MaxResult = 200; // guessed value for maximum result
2485 
2486  uint32 count = MaxResult;
2487 
2488  bool restrictZone = false;
2489  bool restrictArea = false;
2490  bool restrictMap = false;
2491  bool noRestriction = false;
2492  uint32 playerZoneId = 0;
2493  uint32 playerAreaId = 0;
2494 
2495  char* prevArgs = args;
2496 
2497  char const* za = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
2498  if (za == nullptr || za[0] == 'w' || za[0] == 'W')
2499  noRestriction = true;
2500  else
2501  {
2502  if (za[0] == 'a' || za[0] == 'A') // area filter
2503  {
2504  restrictArea = true;
2505  }
2506  else if (za[0] == 'z' || za[0] == 'Z') // zone filter
2507  {
2508  restrictZone = true;
2509  }
2510  else if (za[0] == 'm' || za[0] == 'M') // map filter
2511  {
2512  restrictMap = true;
2513  }
2514  else
2515  {
2516  restrictZone = true;
2517  args = prevArgs;
2518  }
2519  }
2520 
2521  if (za != nullptr)
2522  ExtractOptUInt32(&args, count, MaxResult);
2523 
2524  if (player)
2525  player->GetTerrain()->GetZoneAndAreaId(playerZoneId, playerAreaId, player->GetPositionX(), player->GetPositionY(), player->GetPositionZ());
2526 
2527  static const std::string QueryTablesName[] = {
2528  "gameobject",
2529  "gameobject_spawn_entry",
2530  "spawn_group_entry"
2531  };
2532 
2533  // temporary struct to hold gameobject data
2534  struct TempGobData
2535  {
2536  uint32 guid;
2537  float x;
2538  float y;
2539  float z;
2540  int mapid;
2541  float dist;
2542  uint32 originTable;
2543  bool operator < (const TempGobData& other) const { return dist < other.dist; }
2544  };
2545 
2546  std::set<TempGobData> tempData;
2547  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result;
2548  uint32 counter = 0;
2549  uint32 worldCounter = 0;
2550  uint32 zoneCounter = 0;
2551  uint32 areaCounter = 0;
2552  uint32 mapCounter = 0;
2553  uint32 queryTableNameIndex = 0;
2554 
2555  // this lambda just fill tempData with request data (expect guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map) in that order!
2556  // it will handle zone, area, map and sort result by distance from player
2557  auto AddPlayerData = [&]()
2558  {
2559  do
2560  {
2561  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2562  TempGobData data;
2563  data.guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2564  data.x = fields[1].GetFloat();
2565  data.y = fields[2].GetFloat();
2566  data.z = fields[3].GetFloat();
2567  data.mapid = fields[4].GetUInt16();
2568  data.originTable = queryTableNameIndex;
2569  data.dist = std::pow(data.x - player->GetPositionX(), 2) + std::pow(data.y - player->GetPositionY(), 2) + std::pow(data.z - player->GetPositionZ(), 2);
2570 
2571  uint32 objZoneId = 0;
2572  uint32 objAreaId = 0;
2573  player->GetTerrain()->GetZoneAndAreaId(objZoneId, objAreaId, data.x, data.y, data.z);
2574  if (player->GetMapId() == data.mapid)
2575  {
2576  if (objZoneId == playerZoneId)
2577  {
2578  zoneCounter++;
2579  if (restrictZone)
2580  tempData.emplace(data);
2581  }
2582 
2583  if (objAreaId == playerAreaId)
2584  {
2585  areaCounter++;
2586  if (restrictArea)
2587  tempData.emplace(data);
2588  }
2589 
2590  mapCounter++;
2591  if (restrictMap)
2592  tempData.emplace(data);
2593  }
2594 
2595  if (noRestriction)
2596  tempData.emplace(data);
2597 
2598  worldCounter++;
2599  } while (result->NextRow());
2600  };
2601 
2602  // this lambda just fill tempData with request data (expect guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map) in that order!
2603  // handle only list of the object in the world as no session and command is pretty limited to add wanted map/zone/area id
2604  auto AddSimpleData = [&]()
2605  {
2606  do
2607  {
2608  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2609  TempGobData data;
2610  data.guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2611  data.x = fields[1].GetFloat();
2612  data.y = fields[2].GetFloat();
2613  data.z = fields[3].GetFloat();
2614  data.mapid = fields[4].GetUInt16();
2615  data.originTable = queryTableNameIndex;
2616  data.dist = counter++;
2617 
2618  worldCounter++;
2619  tempData.emplace(data);
2620 
2621  } while (result->NextRow());
2622  };
2623 
2624  // query gameobject
2625  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2626  "SELECT guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map "
2627  "FROM gameobject "
2628  "WHERE id = '%u'",
2629  go_id));
2630 
2631  if (result)
2632  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2633 
2634  // query gameobject_spawn_entry
2635  queryTableNameIndex = 1;
2636  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2637  "SELECT a.guid, b.position_x, b.position_y, b.position_z, b.map "
2638  "FROM gameobject_spawn_entry a LEFT JOIN gameobject b ON a.guid = b.guid "
2639  "WHERE a.entry = '%u'",
2640  go_id));
2641 
2642  if (result)
2643  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2644 
2645  // query spawn_group_entry
2646  queryTableNameIndex = 2;
2647  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2648  "SELECT d.guid, d.position_x, d.position_y, d.position_z, d.map "
2649  "FROM spawn_group_entry a LEFT JOIN spawn_group b ON a.Id = b.Id LEFT JOIN spawn_group_spawn c ON a.ID = c.Id LEFT JOIN gameobject d ON c.Guid = d.guid "
2650  "WHERE a.Entry = '%u' AND b.Type = 1",
2651  go_id));
2652 
2653  if (result)
2654  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2655 
2656  // send result to client
2657  if (tempData.empty())
2658  PSendSysMessage("Object not found!");
2659  else
2660  {
2661  uint32 counter = 0;
2662  for (auto const& gob : tempData)
2663  {
2664  std::string info = " - From `" + QueryTablesName[gob.originTable];
2665  info += "`";
2666  info += PrepareStringNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<GameObject>(gob.guid);
2667  if (player)
2668  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_LIST_CHAT, gob.guid, info.c_str(),
2669  gob.guid, gInfo->name, gob.x, gob.y, gob.z, gob.mapid);
2670  else
2671  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_LIST_CONSOLE, gob.guid, info.c_str(),
2672  gInfo->name, gob.x, gob.y, gob.z, gob.mapid);
2673  ++counter;
2674  if (counter >= count)
2675  break;
2676  }
2677  if (player)
2678  {
2679  PSendSysMessage("%u object[%u] found in the world!", worldCounter, go_id);
2680  PSendSysMessage("Total in your map : %u", mapCounter);
2681  PSendSysMessage("Total in your zone : %u", zoneCounter);
2682  PSendSysMessage("Total in your area : %u", areaCounter);
2683  }
2684  else
2685  PSendSysMessage("%u object[%u] found in the world!", worldCounter, go_id);
2686  }
2687  return true;
2688 }
2689 
2690 bool ChatHandler::HandleListCreatureCommand(char* args)
2691 {
2692  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hcreature_entry:creature_id|h[name]|h|r
2693  uint32 cr_id;
2694  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hcreature_entry", cr_id))
2695  return false;
2696 
2697  if (!cr_id)
2698  {
2699  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALIDCREATUREID, cr_id);
2700  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2701  return false;
2702  }
2703 
2704  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(cr_id);
2705  if (!cInfo)
2706  {
2707  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALIDCREATUREID, cr_id);
2708  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2709  return false;
2710  }
2711 
2712  Player* player = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
2713 
2714  static const uint32 MaxResult = 200; // guessed value for maximum result
2715 
2716  uint32 count = MaxResult;
2717 
2718  bool restrictZone = false;
2719  bool restrictArea = false;
2720  bool restrictMap = false;
2721  bool noRestriction = false;
2722  uint32 playerZoneId = 0;
2723  uint32 playerAreaId = 0;
2724 
2725  char* prevArgs = args;
2726 
2727  char const* za = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
2728  if (za == nullptr || za[0] == 'w' || za[0] == 'W')
2729  noRestriction = true;
2730  else
2731  {
2732  if (za[0] == 'a' || za[0] == 'A') // area filter
2733  {
2734  restrictArea = true;
2735  }
2736  else if (za[0] == 'z' || za[0] == 'Z') // zone filter
2737  {
2738  restrictZone = true;
2739  }
2740  else if (za[0] == 'm' || za[0] == 'M') // map filter
2741  {
2742  restrictMap = true;
2743  }
2744  else
2745  {
2746  restrictZone = true;
2747  args = prevArgs;
2748  }
2749  }
2750 
2751  if (za != nullptr)
2752  ExtractOptUInt32(&args, count, MaxResult);
2753 
2754  if (player)
2755  player->GetTerrain()->GetZoneAndAreaId(playerZoneId, playerAreaId, player->GetPositionX(), player->GetPositionY(), player->GetPositionZ());
2756 
2757  static const std::string QueryTablesName[] = {
2758  "creature",
2759  "creature_spawn_entry",
2760  "spawn_group_entry"
2761  };
2762 
2763  // temporary struct to hold creatures data
2764  struct TempCreatureData
2765  {
2766  uint32 guid;
2767  float x;
2768  float y;
2769  float z;
2770  int mapid;
2771  float dist;
2772  uint32 originTable;
2773  bool operator < (const TempCreatureData& other) const { return dist < other.dist; }
2774  };
2775 
2776  std::set<TempCreatureData> tempData;
2777  std::unique_ptr<QueryResult> result;
2778  uint32 counter = 0;
2779  uint32 worldCounter = 0;
2780  uint32 zoneCounter = 0;
2781  uint32 areaCounter = 0;
2782  uint32 mapCounter = 0;
2783  uint32 queryTableNameIndex = 0;
2784 
2785  // this lambda just fill tempData with request data (expect guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map) in that order!
2786  // it will handle zone, area, map and sort result by distance from player
2787  auto AddPlayerData = [&]()
2788  {
2789  do
2790  {
2791  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2792  TempCreatureData data;
2793  data.guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2794  data.x = fields[1].GetFloat();
2795  data.y = fields[2].GetFloat();
2796  data.z = fields[3].GetFloat();
2797  data.mapid = fields[4].GetUInt16();
2798  data.originTable = queryTableNameIndex;
2799  data.dist = std::pow(data.x - player->GetPositionX(), 2) + std::pow(data.y - player->GetPositionY(), 2) + std::pow(data.z - player->GetPositionZ(), 2);
2800 
2801  uint32 objZoneId = 0;
2802  uint32 objAreaId = 0;
2803  player->GetTerrain()->GetZoneAndAreaId(objZoneId, objAreaId, data.x, data.y, data.z);
2804  if (player->GetMapId() == data.mapid)
2805  {
2806  if (objZoneId == playerZoneId)
2807  {
2808  zoneCounter++;
2809  if (restrictZone)
2810  tempData.emplace(data);
2811  }
2812 
2813  if (objAreaId == playerAreaId)
2814  {
2815  areaCounter++;
2816  if (restrictArea)
2817  tempData.emplace(data);
2818  }
2819 
2820  mapCounter++;
2821  if (restrictMap)
2822  tempData.emplace(data);
2823  }
2824 
2825  if (noRestriction)
2826  tempData.emplace(data);
2827 
2828  worldCounter++;
2829  } while (result->NextRow());
2830  };
2831 
2832  // this lambda just fill tempData with request data (expect guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map) in that order!
2833  // handle only list of the object in the world as no session and command is pretty limited to add wanted map/zone/area id
2834  auto AddSimpleData = [&]()
2835  {
2836  do
2837  {
2838  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2839  TempCreatureData data;
2840  data.guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2841  data.x = fields[1].GetFloat();
2842  data.y = fields[2].GetFloat();
2843  data.z = fields[3].GetFloat();
2844  data.mapid = fields[4].GetUInt16();
2845  data.originTable = queryTableNameIndex;
2846  data.dist = counter++;
2847 
2848  worldCounter++;
2849  tempData.emplace(data);
2850 
2851  } while (result->NextRow());
2852  };
2853 
2854  // query creature
2855  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2856  "SELECT guid, position_x, position_y, position_z, map "
2857  "FROM creature "
2858  "WHERE id = '%u'",
2859  cr_id));
2860 
2861  if (result)
2862  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2863 
2864  // query gameobject_spawn_entry
2865  queryTableNameIndex = 1;
2866  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2867  "SELECT a.guid, b.position_x, b.position_y, b.position_z, b.map "
2868  "FROM creature_spawn_entry a LEFT JOIN creature b ON a.guid = b.guid "
2869  "WHERE a.entry = '%u'",
2870  cr_id));
2871 
2872  if (result)
2873  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2874 
2875  // query spawn_group_entry
2876  queryTableNameIndex = 2;
2877  result.reset(WorldDatabase.PQuery(
2878  "SELECT d.guid, d.position_x, d.position_y, d.position_z, d.map "
2879  "FROM spawn_group_entry a LEFT JOIN spawn_group b ON a.Id = b.Id LEFT JOIN spawn_group_spawn c ON a.ID = c.Id LEFT JOIN creature d ON c.Guid = d.guid "
2880  "WHERE a.Entry = '%u' AND b.Type = 0",
2881  cr_id));
2882 
2883  if (result)
2884  player ? AddPlayerData() : AddSimpleData();
2885 
2886  // send result to client
2887  if (tempData.empty())
2888  PSendSysMessage("Creature not found!");
2889  else
2890  {
2891  uint32 counter = 0;
2892  for (auto const& crData : tempData)
2893  {
2894  std::string info = " - From `" + QueryTablesName[crData.originTable];
2895  info += "`";
2896  info += PrepareStringNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<GameObject>(crData.guid);
2897  if (player)
2898  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_LIST_CHAT, crData.guid, info.c_str(),
2899  crData.guid, cInfo->Name, crData.x, crData.y, crData.z, crData.mapid);
2900  else
2901  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_LIST_CONSOLE, crData.guid, info.c_str(),
2902  cInfo->Name, crData.x, crData.y, crData.z, crData.mapid);
2903  ++counter;
2904  if (counter >= count)
2905  break;
2906  }
2907  if (player)
2908  {
2909  PSendSysMessage("%u creature[%u] found in the world!", worldCounter, cr_id);
2910  PSendSysMessage("Total in your map : %u", mapCounter);
2911  PSendSysMessage("Total in your zone : %u", zoneCounter);
2912  PSendSysMessage("Total in your area : %u", areaCounter);
2913  }
2914  else
2915  PSendSysMessage("%u creature[%u] found in the world!", worldCounter, cr_id);
2916  }
2917  return true;
2918 }
2919 
2920 void ChatHandler::ShowItemListHelper(uint32 itemId, int loc_idx, Player* target /*=nullptr*/)
2921 {
2922  ItemPrototype const* itemProto = sItemStorage.LookupEntry<ItemPrototype >(itemId);
2923  if (!itemProto)
2924  return;
2925 
2926  std::string name = itemProto->Name1;
2927  sObjectMgr.GetItemLocaleStrings(itemProto->ItemId, loc_idx, &name);
2928 
2929  char const* usableStr = "";
2930 
2931  if (target)
2932  {
2933  if (target->CanUseItem(itemProto))
2934  usableStr = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_ITEM_USABLE);
2935  }
2936 
2937  if (m_session)
2938  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_LIST_CHAT, itemId, itemId, name.c_str(), usableStr);
2939  else
2940  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_LIST_CONSOLE, itemId, name.c_str(), usableStr);
2941 }
2942 
2943 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupItemCommand(char* args)
2944 {
2945  if (!*args)
2946  return false;
2947 
2948  std::string namepart = args;
2949  std::wstring wnamepart;
2950 
2951  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
2952  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
2953  return false;
2954 
2955  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
2956 
2957  Player* pl = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
2958 
2959  uint32 counter = 0;
2960 
2961  // Search in `item_template`
2962  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sItemStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++id)
2963  {
2964  ItemPrototype const* pProto = sItemStorage.LookupEntry<ItemPrototype >(id);
2965  if (!pProto)
2966  continue;
2967 
2968  int loc_idx = GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
2969 
2970  std::string name; // "" for let later only single time check default locale name directly
2971  sObjectMgr.GetItemLocaleStrings(id, loc_idx, &name);
2972  if ((name.empty() || !Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart)) && !Utf8FitTo(pProto->Name1, wnamepart))
2973  continue;
2974 
2975  ShowItemListHelper(id, loc_idx, pl);
2976  ++counter;
2977  }
2978 
2979  if (counter == 0)
2980  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOITEMFOUND);
2981 
2982  return true;
2983 }
2984 
2985 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupItemSetCommand(char* args)
2986 {
2987  if (!*args)
2988  return false;
2989 
2990  std::string namepart = args;
2991  std::wstring wnamepart;
2992 
2993  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
2994  return false;
2995 
2996  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
2997  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
2998 
2999  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
3000 
3001  // Search in ItemSet.dbc
3002  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sItemSetStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
3003  {
3004  ItemSetEntry const* set = sItemSetStore.LookupEntry(id);
3005  if (set)
3006  {
3007  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
3008  std::string name = set->name[loc];
3009  if (name.empty())
3010  continue;
3011 
3012  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3013  {
3014  loc = 0;
3015  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
3016  {
3017  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
3018  continue;
3019 
3020  name = set->name[loc];
3021  if (name.empty())
3022  continue;
3023 
3024  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3025  break;
3026  }
3027  }
3028 
3029  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
3030  {
3031  // send item set in "id - [namedlink locale]" format
3032  if (m_session)
3033  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMSET_LIST_CHAT, id, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc]);
3034  else
3035  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEMSET_LIST_CONSOLE, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc]);
3036  ++counter;
3037  }
3038  }
3039  }
3040  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
3041  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOITEMSETFOUND);
3042  return true;
3043 }
3044 
3045 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupSkillCommand(char* args)
3046 {
3047  if (!*args)
3048  return false;
3049 
3050  // can be nullptr in console call
3051  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
3052 
3053  std::string namepart = args;
3054  std::wstring wnamepart;
3055 
3056  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3057  return false;
3058 
3059  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3060  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3061 
3062  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
3063 
3064  // Search in SkillLine.dbc
3065  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sSkillLineStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
3066  {
3067  SkillLineEntry const* skillInfo = sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(id);
3068  if (skillInfo)
3069  {
3070  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
3071  std::string name = skillInfo->name[loc];
3072  if (name.empty())
3073  continue;
3074 
3075  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3076  {
3077  loc = 0;
3078  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
3079  {
3080  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
3081  continue;
3082 
3083  name = skillInfo->name[loc];
3084  if (name.empty())
3085  continue;
3086 
3087  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3088  break;
3089  }
3090  }
3091 
3092  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
3093  {
3094  char valStr[50] = "";
3095  char const* knownStr = "";
3096  if (target && target->HasSkill(id))
3097  {
3098  knownStr = GetMangosString(LANG_KNOWN);
3099  uint32 curValue = target->GetSkillValuePure(id);
3100  uint32 maxValue = target->GetSkillMaxPure(id);
3101  uint32 permValue = target->GetSkillBonusPermanent(id);
3102  uint32 tempValue = target->GetSkillBonusTemporary(id);
3103 
3104  char const* valFormat = GetMangosString(LANG_SKILL_VALUES);
3105  snprintf(valStr, 50, valFormat, curValue, maxValue, permValue, tempValue);
3106  }
3107 
3108  // send skill in "id - [namedlink locale]" format
3109  if (m_session)
3110  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SKILL_LIST_CHAT, id, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc], knownStr, valStr);
3111  else
3112  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SKILL_LIST_CONSOLE, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc], knownStr, valStr);
3113 
3114  ++counter;
3115  }
3116  }
3117  }
3118  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
3119  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOSKILLFOUND);
3120  return true;
3121 }
3122 
3123 void ChatHandler::ShowSpellListHelper(Player* target, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, LocaleConstant loc)
3124 {
3125  uint32 id = spellInfo->Id;
3126 
3127  bool known = target && target->HasSpell(id);
3128  bool learn = (spellInfo->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL);
3129 
3130  uint32 talentCost = GetTalentSpellCost(id);
3131 
3132  bool talent = (talentCost > 0);
3133  bool passive = IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo);
3134  bool active = target && target->HasAura(id);
3135 
3136  // unit32 used to prevent interpreting uint8 as char at output
3137  // find rank of learned spell for learning spell, or talent rank
3138  uint32 rank = talentCost ? talentCost : sSpellMgr.GetSpellRank(learn ? spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[EFFECT_INDEX_0] : id);
3139 
3140  // send spell in "id - [name, rank N] [talent] [passive] [learn] [known]" format
3141  std::ostringstream ss;
3142  if (m_session)
3143  ss << id << " - |cffffffff|Hspell:" << id << "|h[" << spellInfo->SpellName[loc];
3144  else
3145  ss << id << " - " << spellInfo->SpellName[loc];
3146 
3147  // include rank in link name
3148  if (rank)
3149  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_SPELL_RANK) << rank;
3150 
3151  if (m_session)
3152  ss << " " << localeNames[loc] << "]|h|r";
3153  else
3154  ss << " " << localeNames[loc];
3155 
3156  if (talent)
3157  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_TALENT);
3158  if (passive)
3159  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_PASSIVE);
3160  if (learn)
3161  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_LEARN);
3162  if (known)
3163  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_KNOWN);
3164  if (active)
3165  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE);
3166 
3167  SendSysMessage(ss.str().c_str());
3168 }
3169 
3170 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupSpellCommand(char* args)
3171 {
3172  if (!*args)
3173  return false;
3174 
3175  // can be nullptr at console call
3176  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
3177 
3178  std::string namepart = args;
3179  std::wstring wnamepart;
3180 
3181  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3182  return false;
3183 
3184  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3185  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3186 
3187  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
3188 
3189  // Search in Spell.dbc
3190  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sSpellTemplate.GetMaxEntry(); ++id)
3191  {
3192  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(id);
3193  if (spellInfo)
3194  {
3195  int loc = int(DEFAULT_LOCALE);
3196  std::string name = spellInfo->SpellName[loc];
3197  if (name.empty())
3198  continue;
3199 
3200  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3201  {
3202  loc = 0;
3203  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
3204  {
3205  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
3206  continue;
3207 
3208  name = spellInfo->SpellName[loc];
3209  if (name.empty())
3210  continue;
3211 
3212  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3213  break;
3214  }
3215  }
3216 
3217  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
3218  {
3219  ShowSpellListHelper(target, spellInfo, LocaleConstant(loc));
3220  ++counter;
3221  }
3222  }
3223  }
3224  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
3225  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOSPELLFOUND);
3226  return true;
3227 }
3228 
3229 void ChatHandler::ShowQuestListHelper(uint32 questId, int32 loc_idx, Player* target /*= nullptr*/)
3230 {
3231  Quest const* qinfo = sObjectMgr.GetQuestTemplate(questId);
3232  if (!qinfo)
3233  return;
3234 
3235  std::string title = qinfo->GetTitle();
3236  sObjectMgr.GetQuestLocaleStrings(questId, loc_idx, &title);
3237 
3238  char const* statusStr = "";
3239 
3240  if (target)
3241  {
3242  QuestStatus status = target->GetQuestStatus(qinfo->GetQuestId());
3243 
3244  if (status == QUEST_STATUS_COMPLETE)
3245  {
3246  if (target->GetQuestRewardStatus(qinfo->GetQuestId()))
3247  statusStr = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_REWARDED);
3248  else
3249  statusStr = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_COMPLETE);
3250  }
3251  else if (status == QUEST_STATUS_INCOMPLETE)
3252  statusStr = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_ACTIVE);
3253  }
3254 
3255  if (m_session)
3256  PSendSysMessage(LANG_QUEST_LIST_CHAT, qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetQuestLevel(), title.c_str(), statusStr);
3257  else
3258  PSendSysMessage(LANG_QUEST_LIST_CONSOLE, qinfo->GetQuestId(), title.c_str(), statusStr);
3259 }
3260 
3261 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupQuestCommand(char* args)
3262 {
3263  if (!*args)
3264  return false;
3265 
3266  // can be nullptr at console call
3267  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
3268 
3269  std::string namepart = args;
3270  std::wstring wnamepart;
3271 
3272  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3273  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3274  return false;
3275 
3276  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3277 
3278  uint32 counter = 0 ;
3279 
3280  int loc_idx = GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
3281 
3282  ObjectMgr::QuestMap const& qTemplates = sObjectMgr.GetQuestTemplates();
3283  for (const auto& qTemplate : qTemplates)
3284  {
3285  Quest* qinfo = qTemplate.second;
3286 
3287  std::string title; // "" for avoid repeating check default locale
3288  sObjectMgr.GetQuestLocaleStrings(qinfo->GetQuestId(), loc_idx, &title);
3289 
3290  if ((title.empty() || !Utf8FitTo(title, wnamepart)) && !Utf8FitTo(qinfo->GetTitle(), wnamepart))
3291  continue;
3292 
3293  ShowQuestListHelper(qinfo->GetQuestId(), loc_idx, target);
3294  ++counter;
3295  }
3296 
3297  if (counter == 0)
3298  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOQUESTFOUND);
3299 
3300  return true;
3301 }
3302 
3303 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupCreatureCommand(char* args)
3304 {
3305  if (!*args)
3306  return false;
3307 
3308  std::string namepart = args;
3309  std::wstring wnamepart;
3310 
3311  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3312  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3313  return false;
3314 
3315  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3316 
3317  uint32 counter = 0;
3318 
3319  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sCreatureStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++id)
3320  {
3321  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = sCreatureStorage.LookupEntry<CreatureInfo> (id);
3322  if (!cInfo)
3323  continue;
3324 
3325  int loc_idx = GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
3326 
3327  char const* name = ""; // "" for avoid repeating check for default locale
3328  sObjectMgr.GetCreatureLocaleStrings(id, loc_idx, &name);
3329  if (!*name || !Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3330  {
3331  name = cInfo->Name;
3332  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3333  continue;
3334  }
3335 
3336  if (m_session)
3337  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, id, id, name);
3338  else
3339  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, id, name);
3340 
3341  ++counter;
3342  }
3343 
3344  if (counter == 0)
3345  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOCREATUREFOUND);
3346 
3347  return true;
3348 }
3349 
3350 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupObjectCommand(char* args)
3351 {
3352  if (!*args)
3353  return false;
3354 
3355  std::string namepart = args;
3356  std::wstring wnamepart;
3357 
3358  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3359  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3360  return false;
3361 
3362  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3363 
3364  uint32 counter = 0;
3365 
3366  for (SQLStorageBase::SQLSIterator<GameObjectInfo> itr = sGOStorage.getDataBegin<GameObjectInfo>(); itr < sGOStorage.getDataEnd<GameObjectInfo>(); ++itr)
3367  {
3368  int loc_idx = GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
3369  if (loc_idx >= 0)
3370  {
3371  GameObjectLocale const* gl = sObjectMgr.GetGameObjectLocale(itr->id);
3372  if (gl)
3373  {
3374  if ((int32)gl->Name.size() > loc_idx && !gl->Name[loc_idx].empty())
3375  {
3376  std::string name = gl->Name[loc_idx];
3377 
3378  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3379  {
3380  if (m_session)
3381  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, itr->id, itr->id, name.c_str());
3382  else
3383  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, itr->id, name.c_str());
3384  ++counter;
3385  continue;
3386  }
3387  }
3388  }
3389  }
3390 
3391  std::string name = itr->name;
3392  if (name.empty())
3393  continue;
3394 
3395  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3396  {
3397  if (m_session)
3398  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, itr->id, itr->id, name.c_str());
3399  else
3400  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, itr->id, name.c_str());
3401  ++counter;
3402  }
3403  }
3404 
3405  if (counter == 0)
3406  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOGAMEOBJECTFOUND);
3407 
3408  return true;
3409 }
3410 
3411 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupTaxiNodeCommand(char* args)
3412 {
3413  if (!*args)
3414  return false;
3415 
3416  std::string namepart = args;
3417  std::wstring wnamepart;
3418 
3419  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3420  return false;
3421 
3422  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3423  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3424 
3425  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
3426 
3427  // Search in TaxiNodes.dbc
3428  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sTaxiNodesStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
3429  {
3430  TaxiNodesEntry const* nodeEntry = sTaxiNodesStore.LookupEntry(id);
3431  if (nodeEntry)
3432  {
3433  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
3434  std::string name = nodeEntry->name[loc];
3435  if (name.empty())
3436  continue;
3437 
3438  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3439  {
3440  loc = 0;
3441  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
3442  {
3443  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
3444  continue;
3445 
3446  name = nodeEntry->name[loc];
3447  if (name.empty())
3448  continue;
3449 
3450  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
3451  break;
3452  }
3453  }
3454 
3455  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
3456  {
3457  // send taxinode in "id - [name] (Map:m X:x Y:y Z:z)" format
3458  if (m_session)
3459  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TAXINODE_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, id, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc],
