3460  nodeEntry->map_id, nodeEntry->x, nodeEntry->y, nodeEntry->z);
3461  else
3462  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TAXINODE_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, id, name.c_str(), localeNames[loc],
3463  nodeEntry->map_id, nodeEntry->x, nodeEntry->y, nodeEntry->z);
3464  ++counter;
3465  }
3466  }
3467  }
3468  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
3469  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTAXINODEFOUND);
3470  return true;
3471 }
3472 
3481 bool ChatHandler::HandleGuildCreateCommand(char* args)
3482 {
3483  // guildmaster name optional
3484  char* guildMasterStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
3485 
3486  Player* target;
3487  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&guildMasterStr, &target))
3488  return false;
3489 
3490  char* guildStr = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
3491  if (!guildStr)
3492  return false;
3493 
3494  std::string guildname = guildStr;
3495 
3496  if (target->GetGuildId())
3497  {
3498  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_IN_GUILD);
3499  return true;
3500  }
3501 
3502  Guild* guild = new Guild;
3503  if (!guild->Create(target, guildname))
3504  {
3505  delete guild;
3506  SendSysMessage(LANG_GUILD_NOT_CREATED);
3507  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3508  return false;
3509  }
3510 
3511  sGuildMgr.AddGuild(guild);
3512  return true;
3513 }
3514 
3515 bool ChatHandler::HandleGuildInviteCommand(char* args)
3516 {
3517  // player name optional
3518  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
3519 
3520  // if not guild name only (in "") then player name
3521  ObjectGuid target_guid;
3522  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, nullptr, &target_guid))
3523  return false;
3524 
3525  char* guildStr = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
3526  if (!guildStr)
3527  return false;
3528 
3529  std::string glName = guildStr;
3530  Guild* targetGuild = sGuildMgr.GetGuildByName(glName);
3531  if (!targetGuild)
3532  return false;
3533 
3534  // player's guild membership checked in AddMember before add
3535  if (!targetGuild->AddMember(target_guid, targetGuild->GetLowestRank()))
3536  return false;
3537 
3538  return true;
3539 }
3540 
3541 bool ChatHandler::HandleGuildUninviteCommand(char* args)
3542 {
3543  Player* target;
3544  ObjectGuid target_guid;
3545  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid))
3546  return false;
3547 
3548  uint32 glId = target ? target->GetGuildId() : Player::GetGuildIdFromDB(target_guid);
3549  if (!glId)
3550  return false;
3551 
3552  Guild* targetGuild = sGuildMgr.GetGuildById(glId);
3553  if (!targetGuild)
3554  return false;
3555 
3556  if (targetGuild->DelMember(target_guid))
3557  {
3558  targetGuild->Disband();
3559  delete targetGuild;
3560  }
3561 
3562  return true;
3563 }
3564 
3565 bool ChatHandler::HandleGuildRankCommand(char* args)
3566 {
3567  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
3568 
3569  Player* target;
3570  ObjectGuid target_guid;
3571  std::string target_name;
3572  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
3573  return false;
3574 
3575  uint32 glId = target ? target->GetGuildId() : Player::GetGuildIdFromDB(target_guid);
3576  if (!glId)
3577  return false;
3578 
3579  Guild* targetGuild = sGuildMgr.GetGuildById(glId);
3580  if (!targetGuild)
3581  return false;
3582 
3583  uint32 newrank;
3584  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, newrank))
3585  return false;
3586 
3587  if (newrank > targetGuild->GetLowestRank())
3588  return false;
3589 
3590  MemberSlot* slot = targetGuild->GetMemberSlot(target_guid);
3591  if (!slot)
3592  return false;
3593 
3594  if (newrank == GR_GUILDMASTER)
3595  {
3596  MemberSlot* leaderSlot = targetGuild->GetMemberSlot(targetGuild->GetLeaderGuid());
3597  if (!leaderSlot)
3598  return false;
3599 
3600  leaderSlot->ChangeRank(GR_OFFICER);
3601  targetGuild->SetLeader(target_guid);
3602  }
3603  else
3604  slot->ChangeRank(newrank);
3605 
3606  return true;
3607 }
3608 
3609 bool ChatHandler::HandleGuildDeleteCommand(char* args)
3610 {
3611  if (!*args)
3612  return false;
3613 
3614  char* guildStr = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
3615  if (!guildStr)
3616  return false;
3617 
3618  std::string gld = guildStr;
3619 
3620  Guild* targetGuild = sGuildMgr.GetGuildByName(gld);
3621  if (!targetGuild)
3622  return false;
3623 
3624  targetGuild->Disband();
3625  delete targetGuild;
3626 
3627  return true;
3628 }
3629 
3630 bool ChatHandler::HandleGetDistanceCommand(char* args)
3631 {
3632  WorldObject* obj = nullptr;
3633 
3634  if (*args)
3635  {
3636  if (ObjectGuid guid = ExtractGuidFromLink(&args))
3637  obj = (WorldObject*)m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectByTypeMask(guid, TYPEMASK_CREATURE_OR_GAMEOBJECT);
3638 
3639  if (!obj)
3640  {
3641  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
3642  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3643  return false;
3644  }
3645  }
3646  else
3647  {
3648  obj = getSelectedUnit();
3649 
3650  if (!obj)
3651  {
3652  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3653  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3654  return false;
3655  }
3656  }
3657 
3658  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
3659 
3660  PSendSysMessage("Raw distance: %.2f", sqrt(player->GetDistance(obj, true, DIST_CALC_NONE)));
3661 
3662  PSendSysMessage("P -> T Combat distance: %.2f", player->GetDistance(obj, true, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH));
3663  PSendSysMessage("P -> T Bounding distance: %.2f", player->GetDistance(obj, true, DIST_CALC_BOUNDING_RADIUS));
3664  PSendSysMessage("T -> P Combat distance: %.2f", obj->GetDistance(player, true, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH));
3665  PSendSysMessage("T -> P Bounding distance: %.2f", obj->GetDistance(player, true, DIST_CALC_BOUNDING_RADIUS));
3666 
3667  Unit* target = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(obj);
3668  PSendSysMessage("P -> T Attack distance: %.2f", player->GetAttackDistance(target));
3669  PSendSysMessage("P -> T Visible distance: %.2f", player->GetVisibilityData().GetStealthVisibilityDistance(target));
3670  PSendSysMessage("P -> T Visible distance (Alert): %.2f", player->GetVisibilityData().GetStealthVisibilityDistance(target, true));
3671  PSendSysMessage("T -> P Attack distance: %.2f", target->GetAttackDistance(player));
3672  PSendSysMessage("T -> P Visible distance: %.2f", target->GetVisibilityData().GetStealthVisibilityDistance(player));
3673  PSendSysMessage("T -> P Visible distance (Alert): %.2f", target->GetVisibilityData().GetStealthVisibilityDistance(player, true));
3674 
3675  return true;
3676 }
3677 
3678 bool ChatHandler::HandleGetLosCommand(char* /*args*/)
3679 {
3680  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
3681  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
3682  if (!target)
3683  {
3684  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3685  return false;
3686  }
3687 
3688  float x, y, z;
3689  target->GetPosition(x, y, z);
3690  bool normalLos = player->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + player->GetCollisionHeight(), false);
3691  bool m2Los = player->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + player->GetCollisionHeight(), true);
3692  PSendSysMessage("Los check: Normal: %s M2: %s", normalLos ? "true" : "false", m2Los ? "true" : "false");
3693  return true;
3694 }
3695 
3696 bool ChatHandler::HandleDieCommand(char* args)
3697 {
3698  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
3699  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
3700 
3701  if (!target || !player->GetSelectionGuid())
3702  {
3703  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3704  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3705  return false;
3706  }
3707 
3708  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3709  {
3710  if (HasLowerSecurity((Player*)target, ObjectGuid(), false))
3711  return false;
3712  }
3713 
3714  uint32 param;
3715  ExtractOptUInt32(&args, param, 0);
3716  if (param != 0)
3717  {
3718  if (target->IsAlive())
3719  {
3720  DamageEffectType damageType = DIRECT_DAMAGE;
3721  uint32 absorb = 0;
3722  uint32 damage = target->GetHealth();
3723  Unit::DealDamageMods(player, target, damage, &absorb, damageType);
3724  Unit::DealDamage(player, target, damage, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
3725  }
3726  }
3727  else
3728  {
3729  if (target->IsAlive())
3730  Unit::DealDamage(player, target, target->GetHealth(), nullptr, INSTAKILL, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
3731  }
3732 
3733  return true;
3734 }
3735 
3736 bool ChatHandler::HandleDamageCommand(char* args)
3737 {
3738  if (!*args)
3739  return false;
3740 
3741  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
3742  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
3743 
3744  if (!target || !player->GetSelectionGuid())
3745  {
3746  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3747  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3748  return false;
3749  }
3750 
3751  if (!target->IsAlive())
3752  return true;
3753 
3754  int32 damage_int;
3755  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, damage_int))
3756  return false;
3757 
3758  if (damage_int <= 0)
3759  return true;
3760 
3761  uint32 damage = uint32(damage_int);
3762 
3763  // flat melee damage without resistance/etc reduction
3764  if (!*args)
3765  {
3766  uint32 absorb = 0;
3767  Unit::DealDamageMods(player, target, damage, &absorb, DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3768  Unit::DealDamage(player, target, damage, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
3769  if (target != player)
3770  player->SendAttackStateUpdate(HITINFO_NORMALSWING2, target, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, damage, 0, 0, VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL, 0);
3771  return true;
3772  }
3773 
3774  uint32 school;
3775  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, school))
3776  return false;
3777 
3778  if (school >= MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL)
3779  return false;
3780 
3781  SpellSchoolMask schoolmask = SpellSchoolMask(1 << school);
3782 
3783  if (schoolmask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
3784  damage = Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage(player, target, damage);
3785 
3786  // melee damage by specific school
3787  if (!*args)
3788  {
3789  uint32 absorb = 0;
3790  int32 resist = 0;
3791 
3792  target->CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(player, schoolmask, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, damage, &absorb, &resist);
3793 
3794  const uint32 bonus = (resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(resist)) : 0);
3795  damage += bonus;
3796  const uint32 malus = (resist > 0 ? (absorb + uint32(resist)) : absorb);
3797 
3798  if (damage <= malus)
3799  return true;
3800 
3801  damage -= malus;
3802 
3803  Unit::DealDamageMods(player, target, damage, &absorb, DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3804  Unit::DealDamage(player, target, damage, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, schoolmask, nullptr, false);
3805  player->SendAttackStateUpdate(HITINFO_NORMALSWING2, target, schoolmask, damage, absorb, resist, VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL, 0);
3806  return true;
3807  }
3808 
3809  // non-melee damage
3810 
3811  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
3812  uint32 spellid = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
3813  if (!spellid || !sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellid))
3814  return false;
3815 
3816  player->SpellNonMeleeDamageLog(target, spellid, damage);
3817  return true;
3818 }
3819 
3820 bool ChatHandler::HandleModifyArenaCommand(char* args)
3821 {
3822  if (!*args)
3823  return false;
3824 
3825  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
3826  if (!target)
3827  {
3828  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
3829  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3830  return false;
3831  }
3832 
3833  int32 amount = (int32)atoi(args);
3834 
3835  target->ModifyArenaPoints(amount);
3836 
3837  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MODIFY_ARENA, GetNameLink(target).c_str(), target->GetArenaPoints());
3838 
3839  return true;
3840 }
3841 
3842 bool ChatHandler::HandleReviveCommand(char* args)
3843 {
3844  Player* target;
3845  ObjectGuid target_guid;
3846  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid))
3847  return false;
3848 
3849  if (target)
3850  {
3851  target->ResurrectPlayer(1.0f);
3852  target->SpawnCorpseBones();
3853  }
3854  else
3855  // will resurrected at login without corpse
3856  sObjectAccessor.ConvertCorpseForPlayer(target_guid);
3857 
3858  return true;
3859 }
3860 
3861 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuraCommand(char* args)
3862 {
3863  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
3864  if (!target)
3865  {
3866  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3867  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3868  return false;
3869  }
3870 
3871  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
3872  uint32 spellID = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
3873 
3874  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellID);
3875  if (!spellInfo)
3876  return false;
3877 
3878  if (!IsSpellAppliesAura(spellInfo) &&
3879  !IsSpellHaveEffect(spellInfo, SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA))
3880  {
3881  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SPELL_NO_HAVE_AURAS, spellID);
3882  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3883  return false;
3884  }
3885 
3886  SpellAuraHolder* holder = CreateSpellAuraHolder(spellInfo, target, m_session->GetPlayer());
3887 
3888  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
3889  {
3890  uint8 eff = spellInfo->Effect[i];
3891  if (eff >= MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS)
3892  continue;
3893  if (IsAreaAuraEffect(eff) ||
3894  eff == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA ||
3895  eff == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA)
3896  {
3897  int32 basePoints = spellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(SpellEffectIndex(i));
3898  int32 damage = basePoints;
3899  Aura* aur = CreateAura(spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i), &damage, &basePoints, holder, target);
3900  holder->AddAura(aur, SpellEffectIndex(i));
3901  }
3902  }
3903  if (!target->AddSpellAuraHolder(holder))
3904  delete holder;
3905  else
3906  holder->SetState(SPELLAURAHOLDER_STATE_READY);
3907 
3908  return true;
3909 }
3910 
3911 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnAuraCommand(char* args)
3912 {
3913  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
3914  if (!target)
3915  {
3916  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
3917  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3918  return false;
3919  }
3920 
3921  std::string argstr = args;
3922  if (argstr == "all")
3923  {
3924  target->RemoveAllAuras();
3925  return true;
3926  }
3927 
3928  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
3929  uint32 spellID = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
3930  if (!spellID)
3931  return false;
3932 
3933  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellID);
3934 
3935  return true;
3936 }
3937 
3938 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkGraveCommand(char* args)
3939 {
3940  uint32 g_id;
3941  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, g_id))
3942  return false;
3943 
3944  char* teamStr = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
3945 
3946  Team g_team;
3947  if (!teamStr)
3948  g_team = TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED;
3949  else if (strncmp(teamStr, "horde", strlen(teamStr)) == 0)
3950  g_team = HORDE;
3951  else if (strncmp(teamStr, "alliance", strlen(teamStr)) == 0)
3952  g_team = ALLIANCE;
3953  else
3954  return false;
3955 
3956  WorldSafeLocsEntry const* graveyard = sWorldSafeLocsStore.LookupEntry<WorldSafeLocsEntry>(g_id);
3957  if (!graveyard)
3958  {
3959  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDNOEXIST, g_id);
3960  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3961  return false;
3962  }
3963 
3964  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
3965 
3966  uint32 zoneId = player->GetZoneId();
3967 
3968  AreaTableEntry const* areaEntry = GetAreaEntryByAreaID(zoneId);
3969  if (!areaEntry || areaEntry->zone != 0)
3970  {
3971  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDWRONGZONE, g_id, zoneId);
3972  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3973  return false;
3974  }
3975 
3976  if (player->GetMap()->GetGraveyardManager().AddGraveYardLink(g_id, zoneId, GRAVEYARD_AREALINK, g_team))
3977  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDLINKED, g_id, zoneId);
3978  else
3979  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDALRLINKED, g_id, zoneId);
3980 
3981  return true;
3982 }
3983 
3984 bool ChatHandler::HandleNearGraveCommand(char* args)
3985 {
3986  Team g_team;
3987 
3988  size_t argslen = strlen(args);
3989 
3990  if (!*args)
3991  g_team = TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED;
3992  else if (strncmp(args, "horde", argslen) == 0)
3993  g_team = HORDE;
3994  else if (strncmp(args, "alliance", argslen) == 0)
3995  g_team = ALLIANCE;
3996  else
3997  return false;
3998 
3999  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
4000  uint32 zone_id = player->GetZoneId();
4001  uint32 area_id = player->GetAreaId();
4002 
4003  WorldSafeLocsEntry const* graveyard = player->GetMap()->GetGraveyardManager().GetClosestGraveYard(player->GetPositionX(), player->GetPositionY(), player->GetPositionZ(), player->GetMapId(), g_team);
4004 
4005  if (graveyard)
4006  {
4007  uint32 g_id = graveyard->ID;
4008 
4009  GraveYardData const* data = player->GetMap()->GetGraveyardManager().FindGraveYardData(g_id, area_id);
4010  if (!data || (g_team != TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED && data->team != g_team && data->team != TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED))
4011  data = player->GetMap()->GetGraveyardManager().FindGraveYardData(g_id, zone_id);
4012 
4013  if (!data)
4014  {
4015  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDERROR, g_id);
4016  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4017  return false;
4018  }
4019 
4020  std::string team_name;
4021 
4022  if (data->team == TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED)
4023  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_ANY);
4024  else if (data->team == HORDE)
4025  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_HORDE);
4026  else if (data->team == ALLIANCE)
4027  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_ALLIANCE);
4028  else // Actually, this case cannot happen
4029  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_NOTEAM);
4030 
4031  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARDNEAREST, g_id, team_name.c_str(), zone_id);
4032  }
4033  else
4034  {
4035  std::string team_name;
4036 
4037  if (g_team == TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED)
4038  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_ANY);
4039  else if (g_team == HORDE)
4040  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_HORDE);
4041  else if (g_team == ALLIANCE)
4042  team_name = GetMangosString(LANG_COMMAND_GRAVEYARD_ALLIANCE);
4043 
4044  if (g_team == TEAM_BOTH_ALLOWED)
4045  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ZONENOGRAVEYARDS, zone_id);
4046  else
4047  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ZONENOGRAFACTION, zone_id, team_name.c_str());
4048  }
4049 
4050  return true;
4051 }
4052 
4053 //-----------------------Npc Commands-----------------------
4054 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcAllowMovementCommand(char* /*args*/)
4055 {
4056  if (sWorld.getAllowMovement())
4057  {
4058  sWorld.SetAllowMovement(false);
4059  SendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_MOVE_DISABLED);
4060  }
4061  else
4062  {
4063  sWorld.SetAllowMovement(true);
4064  SendSysMessage(LANG_CREATURE_MOVE_ENABLED);
4065  }
4066  return true;
4067 }
4068 
4069 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcChangeEntryCommand(char* args)
4070 {
4071  if (!*args)
4072  return false;
4073 
4074  uint32 newEntryNum = atoi(args);
4075  if (!newEntryNum)
4076  return false;
4077 
4078  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
4079  if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
4080  {
4081  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
4082  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4083  return false;
4084  }
4085  Creature* creature = (Creature*)unit;
4086  if (creature->UpdateEntry(newEntryNum))
4087  SendSysMessage(LANG_DONE);
4088  else
4089  SendSysMessage(LANG_ERROR);
4090  return true;
4091 }
4092 
4093 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcInfoCommand(char* /*args*/)
4094 {
4095  Creature* target = getSelectedCreature();
4096 
4097  if (!target)
4098  {
4099  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
4100  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4101  return false;
4102  }
4103 
4104  uint32 faction = target->GetFaction();
4105  uint32 npcflags = target->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS);
4106  uint32 displayid = target->GetDisplayId();
4107  uint32 nativeid = target->GetNativeDisplayId();
4108  uint32 Entry = target->GetEntry();
4109  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = target->GetCreatureInfo();
4110 
4111  time_t curRespawnDelay = target->GetRespawnTimeEx() - time(nullptr);
4112  if (curRespawnDelay < 0)
4113  curRespawnDelay = 0;
4114  std::string curRespawnDelayStr = secsToTimeString(curRespawnDelay, true);
4115  std::string defRespawnDelayStr = secsToTimeString(target->GetRespawnDelay(), true);
4116  std::string curCorpseDecayStr = secsToTimeString(std::chrono::system_clock::to_time_t(target->GetCorpseDecayTimer()), true);
4117 
4118  // Send information dependend on difficulty mode
4119  CreatureInfo const* baseInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
4120  uint32 diff = 1;
4121  for (; diff < MAX_DIFFICULTY; ++diff)
4122  if (baseInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1] == target->GetCreatureInfo()->Entry)
4123  break;
4124 
4125  if (diff < MAX_DIFFICULTY)
4126  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_CHAR_DIFFICULTY, target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), faction, npcflags,
4127  Entry, target->GetCreatureInfo()->Entry, diff,
4128  displayid, nativeid);
4129  else
4130  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_CHAR, target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), faction, npcflags, Entry, displayid, nativeid);
4131 
4132  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_LEVEL, target->GetLevel());
4133  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_PHASEMASK, target->GetPhaseMask());
4134  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_HEALTH, target->GetCreateHealth(), target->GetMaxHealth(), target->GetHealth());
4135  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_FLAGS, target->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS), target->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS), target->GetCreatureInfo()->ExtraFlags);
4136  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_RAWPAWNTIMES, defRespawnDelayStr.c_str(), curRespawnDelayStr.c_str());
4137  PSendSysMessage("Corpse decay remaining time: %s", curCorpseDecayStr.c_str());
4138  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_LOOT, cInfo->LootId, cInfo->PickpocketLootId, cInfo->SkinningLootId);
4139  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_DUNGEON_ID, target->GetInstanceId());
4140  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_POSITION, float(target->GetPositionX()), float(target->GetPositionY()), float(target->GetPositionZ()));
4141  PSendSysMessage("Combat timer: %u", target->GetCombatManager().GetCombatTimer());
4142  PSendSysMessage("Is in evade mode: %s", target->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode() ? "true" : "false");
4143 
4144  PSendSysMessage("UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0: %d : %d : %d : %d", target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 0), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 1),
4145  target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 2), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 3));
4146 
4147  PSendSysMessage("UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1: %d : %d : %d : %d", target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, 0), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, 1),
4148  target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, 2), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, 3));
4149 
4150  PSendSysMessage("UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2: %d : %d : %d : %d", target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 0), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1),
4151  target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2), target->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3));
4152 
4153  auto& spellList = target->GetSpellList();
4154  PSendSysMessage("Spell Lists %s ID %u", spellList.Disabled ? "disabled" : "enabled", spellList.Id);
4155 
4156  PSendSysMessage("Combat Timer: %u Leashing disabled: %s", target->GetCombatManager().GetCombatTimer(), target->GetCombatManager().IsLeashingDisabled() ? "true" : "false");
4157 
4158  PSendSysMessage("Combat Script: %s", target->AI()->GetCombatScriptStatus() ? "true" : "false");
4159  PSendSysMessage("Movementflags: %u", target->m_movementInfo.moveFlags);
4160 
4161  if (CreatureGroup* group = target->GetCreatureGroup())
4162  PSendSysMessage("Creature group: %u", group->GetGroupEntry().Id);
4163 
4164  if (auto vector = sObjectMgr.GetAllRandomCreatureEntries(target->GetGUIDLow()))
4165  {
4166  std::string output;
4167  for (uint32 entry : *vector)
4168  output += std::to_string(entry) + ",";
4169  PSendSysMessage("NPC is part of creature_spawn_entry: %s", output.data());
4170  }
4171 
4172  if ((npcflags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR))
4173  {
4174  SendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_VENDOR);
4175  }
4176  if ((npcflags & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER))
4177  {
4178  SendSysMessage(LANG_NPCINFO_TRAINER);
4179  }
4180 
4181  ShowNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<Creature>(target->GetGUIDLow());
4182  return true;
4183 }
4184 
4185 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcThreatCommand(char* /*args*/)
4186 {
4187  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
4188 
4189  if (!target)
4190  {
4191  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
4192  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4193  return false;
4194  }
4195 
4196  // Showing threat for %s [Entry %u]
4197  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPC_THREAT_SELECTED_CREATURE, target->GetName(), target->GetEntry());
4198 
4199  ThreatList const& tList = target->getThreatManager().getThreatList();
4200  for (auto itr : tList)
4201  {
4202  Unit* unit = itr->getTarget();
4203 
4204  if (unit)
4205  // Player |cffff0000%s|r [GUID: %u] has |cffff0000%f|r threat, taunt state %u and hostile state %u
4206  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NPC_THREAT_PLAYER, unit->GetName(), unit->GetGUIDLow(), target->getThreatManager().getThreat(unit), itr->GetTauntState(), itr->GetHostileState());
4207  }
4208 
4209  return true;
4210 }

4213 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcPlayEmoteCommand(char* args)
4214 {
4215  uint32 emote = atoi(args);
4216 
4217  Creature* target = getSelectedCreature();
4218  if (!target)
4219  {
4220  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
4221  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4222  return false;
4223  }
4224 
4225  target->HandleEmote(emote);
4226 
4227  return true;
4228 }

4285  break;

4287

4289  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_ADDED_TO_SLOT,ItemID,tmpItem->Name1,SlotID);
4290  }
4291  else
4292  {
4293  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_NOT_FOUND,ItemID);
4294  return true;
4295  }
4296  */
4297  return true;
4298 }
4299 //----------------------------------------------------------
4300 
4301 bool ChatHandler::HandleExploreCheatCommand(char* args)
4302 {
4303  if (!*args)
4304  return false;
4305 
4306  int flag = atoi(args);
4307 
4308  Player* chr = getSelectedPlayer();
4309  if (chr == nullptr)
4310  {
4311  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
4312  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4313  return false;
4314  }
4315 
4316  if (flag != 0)
4317  {
4318  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_SET_EXPLORE_ALL, GetNameLink(chr).c_str());
4319  if (needReportToTarget(chr))
4320  ChatHandler(chr).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_EXPLORE_SET_ALL, GetNameLink().c_str());
4321  }
4322  else
4323  {
4324  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_SET_EXPLORE_NOTHING, GetNameLink(chr).c_str());
4325  if (needReportToTarget(chr))
4326  ChatHandler(chr).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_EXPLORE_SET_NOTHING, GetNameLink().c_str());
4327  }
4328 
4329  for (uint8 i = 0; i < PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_SIZE; ++i)
4330  {
4331  if (flag != 0)
4332  {
4333  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetFlag(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + i, 0xFFFFFFFF);
4334  }
4335  else
4336  {
4337  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetFlag(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + i, 0);
4338  }
4339  }
4340 
4341  return true;
4342 }
4343 
4344 void ChatHandler::HandleCharacterLevel(Player* player, ObjectGuid player_guid, uint32 oldlevel, uint32 newlevel)
4345 {
4346  if (player)
4347  {
4348  player->GiveLevel(newlevel);
4349  player->InitTalentForLevel();
4350  player->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_XP, 0);
4351 
4352  if (needReportToTarget(player))
4353  {
4354  if (oldlevel == newlevel)
4355  ChatHandler(player).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_LEVEL_PROGRESS_RESET, GetNameLink().c_str());
4356  else if (oldlevel < newlevel)
4357  ChatHandler(player).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_LEVEL_UP, GetNameLink().c_str(), newlevel);
4358  else // if(oldlevel > newlevel)
4359  ChatHandler(player).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOURS_LEVEL_DOWN, GetNameLink().c_str(), newlevel);
4360  }
4361  }
4362  else
4363  {
4364  // update level and XP at level, all other will be updated at loading
4365  CharacterDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE characters SET level = '%u', xp = 0 WHERE guid = '%u'", newlevel, player_guid.GetCounter());
4366  }
4367 }
4368 
4369 bool ChatHandler::HandleCharacterLevelCommand(char* args)
4370 {
4371  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
4372 
4373  int32 newlevel;
4374  bool nolevel = false;
4375  // exception opt second arg: .character level $name
4376  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, newlevel))
4377  {
4378  if (!nameStr)
4379  {
4380  nameStr = ExtractArg(&args);
4381  if (!nameStr)
4382  return false;
4383 
4384  nolevel = true;
4385  }
4386  else
4387  return false;
4388  }
4389 
4390  Player* target;
4391  ObjectGuid target_guid;
4392  std::string target_name;
4393  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
4394  return false;
4395 
4396  int32 oldlevel = target ? target->GetLevel() : Player::GetLevelFromDB(target_guid);
4397  if (nolevel)
4398  newlevel = oldlevel;
4399 
4400  if (newlevel < 1)
4401  return false; // invalid level
4402 
4403  if (newlevel > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL) // hardcoded maximum level
4404  newlevel = STRONG_MAX_LEVEL;
4405 
4406  HandleCharacterLevel(target, target_guid, oldlevel, newlevel);
4407 
4408  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target) // including player==nullptr
4409  {
4410  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
4411  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_CHANGE_LVL, nameLink.c_str(), newlevel);
4412  }
4413 
4414  return true;
4415 }
4416 
4417 bool ChatHandler::HandleLevelUpCommand(char* args)
4418 {
4419  int32 addlevel = 1;
4420  char* nameStr = nullptr;
4421 
4422  if (*args)
4423  {
4424  nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
4425 
4426  // exception opt second arg: .levelup $name
4427  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, addlevel))
4428  {
4429  if (!nameStr)
4430  nameStr = ExtractArg(&args);
4431  else
4432  return false;
4433  }
4434  }
4435 
4436  ObjectGuid target_guid;
4437  std::string target_name;
4438 
4439  //add pet to levelup command
4440  if (m_session)
4441  {
4442  Creature* creatureTarget = getSelectedCreature();
4443  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
4444  if (creatureTarget && creatureTarget->IsPet() && creatureTarget->GetOwner() && creatureTarget->GetOwner()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4445  {
4446  Pet* petTarget = (Pet*)creatureTarget;
4447 
4448  if (petTarget->getPetType() == HUNTER_PET)
4449  {
4450  uint32 newPetLevel = petTarget->GetLevel() + addlevel;
4451 
4452  if (newPetLevel <= player->GetLevel())
4453  {
4454  petTarget->GivePetLevel(newPetLevel);
4455 
4456  std::string nameLink = petLink(petTarget->GetName());
4457  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_CHANGE_LVL, nameLink.c_str(), newPetLevel);
4458  return true;
4459  }
4460  }
4461 
4462  return false;
4463  }
4464  }
4465 
4466  Player* target;
4467  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
4468  return false;
4469 
4470  int32 oldlevel = target ? target->GetLevel() : Player::GetLevelFromDB(target_guid);
4471  int32 newlevel = oldlevel + addlevel;
4472 
4473  if (newlevel < 1)
4474  newlevel = 1;
4475 
4476  if (newlevel > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL) // hardcoded maximum level
4477  newlevel = STRONG_MAX_LEVEL;
4478 
4479  HandleCharacterLevel(target, target_guid, oldlevel, newlevel);
4480 
4481  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target) // including chr==nullptr
4482  {
4483  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
4484  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_CHANGE_LVL, nameLink.c_str(), newlevel);
4485  }
4486 
4487  return true;
4488 }
4489 
4490 bool ChatHandler::HandleShowAreaCommand(char* args)
4491 {
4492  if (!*args)
4493  return false;
4494 
4495  Player* chr = getSelectedPlayer();
4496  if (chr == nullptr)
4497  {
4498  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
4499  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4500  return false;
4501  }
4502 
4503  int area = GetAreaFlagByAreaID(atoi(args));
4504  int offset = area / 32;
4505  uint32 val = (uint32)(1 << (area % 32));
4506 
4507  if (area < 0 || offset >= PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_SIZE)
4508  {
4509  SendSysMessage(LANG_BAD_VALUE);
4510  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4511  return false;
4512  }
4513 
4514  uint32 currFields = chr->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset);
4515  chr->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset, (uint32)(currFields | val));
4516 
4517  SendSysMessage(LANG_EXPLORE_AREA);
4518  return true;
4519 }
4520 
4521 bool ChatHandler::HandleHideAreaCommand(char* args)
4522 {
4523  if (!*args)
4524  return false;
4525 
4526  Player* chr = getSelectedPlayer();
4527  if (chr == nullptr)
4528  {
4529  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
4530  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4531  return false;
4532  }
4533 
4534  int area = GetAreaFlagByAreaID(atoi(args));
4535  int offset = area / 32;
4536  uint32 val = (uint32)(1 << (area % 32));
4537 
4538  if (area < 0 || offset >= PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_SIZE)
4539  {
4540  SendSysMessage(LANG_BAD_VALUE);
4541  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4542  return false;
4543  }
4544 
4545  uint32 currFields = chr->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset);
4546  chr->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset, (uint32)(currFields ^ val));
4547 
4548  SendSysMessage(LANG_UNEXPLORE_AREA);
4549  return true;
4550 }
4551 
4552 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuctionAllianceCommand(char* /*args*/)
4553 {
4554  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetAuctionAccessMode(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetTeam() != ALLIANCE ? -1 : 0);
4555  m_session->SendAuctionHello(m_session->GetPlayer());
4556  return true;
4557 }
4558 
4559 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuctionHordeCommand(char* /*args*/)
4560 {
4561  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetAuctionAccessMode(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetTeam() != HORDE ? -1 : 0);
4562  m_session->SendAuctionHello(m_session->GetPlayer());
4563  return true;
4564 }
4565 
4566 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuctionGoblinCommand(char* /*args*/)
4567 {
4568  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetAuctionAccessMode(1);
4569  m_session->SendAuctionHello(m_session->GetPlayer());
4570  return true;
4571 }
4572 
4573 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuctionCommand(char* /*args*/)
4574 {
4575  m_session->GetPlayer()->SetAuctionAccessMode(0);
4576  m_session->SendAuctionHello(m_session->GetPlayer());
4577 
4578  return true;
4579 }
4580 
4581 bool ChatHandler::HandleAuctionItemCommand(char* args)
4582 {
4583  // format: (alliance|horde|goblin) item[:count] price [buyout] [short|long|verylong]
4584  char* typeStr = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
4585  if (!typeStr)
4586  return false;
4587 
4588  uint32 houseid;
4589  if (strncmp(typeStr, "alliance", strlen(typeStr)) == 0)
4590  houseid = 1;
4591  else if (strncmp(typeStr, "horde", strlen(typeStr)) == 0)
4592  houseid = 6;
4593  else if (strncmp(typeStr, "goblin", strlen(typeStr)) == 0)
4594  houseid = 7;
4595  else
4596  return false;
4597 
4598  // parse item str
4599  char* itemStr = ExtractArg(&args);
4600  if (!itemStr)
4601  return false;
4602 
4603  uint32 item_id = 0;
4604  uint32 item_count = 1;
4605  if (sscanf(itemStr, "%u:%u", &item_id, &item_count) != 2)
4606  if (sscanf(itemStr, "%u", &item_id) != 1)
4607  return false;
4608 
4609  uint32 price;
4610  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, price))
4611  return false;
4612 
4613  uint32 buyout;
4614  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, buyout, 0))
4615  return false;
4616 
4617  uint32 etime = 4 * MIN_AUCTION_TIME;
4618  if (char* timeStr = ExtractLiteralArg(&args))
4619  {
4620  if (strncmp(timeStr, "short", strlen(timeStr)) == 0)
4621  etime = 1 * MIN_AUCTION_TIME;
4622  else if (strncmp(timeStr, "long", strlen(timeStr)) == 0)
4623  etime = 2 * MIN_AUCTION_TIME;
4624  else if (strncmp(timeStr, "verylong", strlen(timeStr)) == 0)
4625  etime = 4 * MIN_AUCTION_TIME;
4626  else
4627  return false;
4628  }
4629 
4630  AuctionHouseEntry const* auctionHouseEntry = sAuctionHouseStore.LookupEntry(houseid);
4631  AuctionHouseObject* auctionHouse = sAuctionMgr.GetAuctionsMap(auctionHouseEntry);
4632 
4633  if (!item_id)
4634  {
4635  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
4636  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4637  return false;
4638  }
4639 
4640  ItemPrototype const* item_proto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(item_id);
4641  if (!item_proto)
4642  {
4643  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
4644  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4645  return false;
4646  }
4647 
4648  if (item_count < 1 || (item_proto->MaxCount > 0 && item_count > uint32(item_proto->MaxCount)))
4649  {
4650  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALID_ITEM_COUNT, item_count, item_id);
4651  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4652  return false;
4653  }
4654 
4655  do
4656  {
4657  uint32 item_stack = item_count > item_proto->GetMaxStackSize() ? item_proto->GetMaxStackSize() : item_count;
4658  item_count -= item_stack;
4659 
4660  Item* newItem = Item::CreateItem(item_id, item_stack);
4661  MANGOS_ASSERT(newItem);
4662 
4663  auctionHouse->AddAuction(auctionHouseEntry, newItem, etime, price, buyout);
4664  }
4665  while (item_count);
4666 
4667  return true;
4668 }
4669 
4670 bool ChatHandler::HandleBankCommand(char* /*args*/)
4671 {
4672  m_session->SendShowBank(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid());
4673 
4674  return true;
4675 }
4676 
4677 bool ChatHandler::HandleMailBoxCommand(char* /*args*/)
4678 {
4679  m_session->SendShowMailBox(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid());
4680  return true;
4681 }
4682 
4683 bool ChatHandler::HandleStableCommand(char* /*args*/)
4684 {
4685  m_session->SendStablePet(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid());
4686 
4687  return true;
4688 }
4689 
4690 bool ChatHandler::HandleChangeWeatherCommand(char* args)
4691 {
4692  // Weather is OFF
4693  if (!sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_WEATHER))
4694  {
4695  SendSysMessage(LANG_WEATHER_DISABLED);
4696  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4697  return false;
4698  }
4699 
4700  uint32 type;
4701  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, type))
4702  return false;
4703 
4704  // see enum WeatherType
4705  if (!Weather::IsValidWeatherType(type))
4706  return false;
4707 
4708  float grade;
4709  if (!ExtractFloat(&args, grade))
4710  return false;
4711 
4712  // clamp grade from 0 to 1
4713  if (grade < 0.0f)
4714  grade = 0.0f;
4715  else if (grade > 1.0f)
4716  grade = 1.0f;
4717 
4718  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
4719  uint32 zoneId = player->GetZoneId();
4720  if (!sWeatherMgr.GetWeatherChances(zoneId))
4721  {
4722  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_WEATHER);
4723  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4724  }
4725  player->GetMap()->SetWeather(zoneId, (WeatherType)type, grade, false);
4726 
4727  return true;
4728 }
4729 
4730 bool ChatHandler::HandleTeleAddCommand(char* args)
4731 {
4732  if (!*args)
4733  return false;
4734 
4735  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
4736  if (!player)
4737  return false;
4738 
4739  std::string name = args;
4740 
4741  if (sObjectMgr.GetGameTele(name))
4742  {
4743  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TP_ALREADYEXIST);
4744  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4745  return false;
4746  }
4747 
4748  GameTele tele;
4749  tele.position_x = player->GetPositionX();
4750  tele.position_y = player->GetPositionY();
4751  tele.position_z = player->GetPositionZ();
4752  tele.orientation = player->GetOrientation();
4753  tele.mapId = player->GetMapId();
4754  tele.name = name;
4755 
4756  if (sObjectMgr.AddGameTele(tele))
4757  {
4758  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TP_ADDED);
4759  }
4760  else
4761  {
4762  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TP_ADDEDERR);
4763  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4764  return false;
4765  }
4766 
4767  return true;
4768 }
4769 
4770 bool ChatHandler::HandleTeleDelCommand(char* args)
4771 {
4772  if (!*args)
4773  return false;
4774 
4775  std::string name = args;
4776 
4777  if (!sObjectMgr.DeleteGameTele(name))
4778  {
4779  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TELE_NOTFOUND);
4780  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4781  return false;
4782  }
4783 
4784  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TP_DELETED);
4785  return true;
4786 }
4787 
4788 bool ChatHandler::HandleListAreaTriggerCommand(char* /*args*/)
4789 {
4790  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
4791  if (!player)
4792  return false;
4793 
4794  uint32 counter = 0;
4795  uint32 playerMap = player->GetMap()->GetId();
4796 
4797  if (player->GetMap()->IsContinent())
4798  {
4799  // Get areatriggers in the same area as the player
4800  uint32 playerArea = player->GetAreaId();
4801  AreaTableEntry const* areaEntry = GetAreaEntryByAreaID(playerArea);
4802  PSendSysMessage(LANG_AREATRIGGER_LIST, "area", areaEntry ? areaEntry->area_name[GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<unknown>");
4803 
4804  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
4805  {
4806  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
4807  if (!atEntry)
4808  continue;
4809 
4810  if (atEntry->mapid != playerMap)
4811  continue;
4812 
4813  uint32 areaTriggerArea = player->GetTerrain()->GetAreaId(atEntry->x, atEntry->y, atEntry->z);
4814  if (areaTriggerArea != playerArea)
4815  continue;
4816 
4817  ShowTriggerListHelper(atEntry);
4818  ++counter;
4819  }
4820  }
4821  else
4822  {
4823  // Get areatriggers in the same map as the player
4824  PSendSysMessage(LANG_AREATRIGGER_LIST, "map", player->GetMap()->GetMapName());
4825 
4826  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
4827  {
4828  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
4829  if (!atEntry)
4830  continue;
4831 
4832  if (atEntry->mapid != playerMap)
4833  continue;
4834 
4835  ShowTriggerListHelper(atEntry);
4836  ++counter;
4837  }
4838  }
4839 
4840  if (counter == 0)
4841  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTRIGGERFOUND);
4842  return true;
4843 }
4844 
4845 bool ChatHandler::HandleListAurasCommand(char* args)
4846 {
4847  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
4848  if (!unit)
4849  {
4850  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
4851  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4852  return false;
4853  }
4854 
4855  uint32 auraNameId;
4856  ExtractOptUInt32(&args, auraNameId, 0);
4857  if (auraNameId >= TOTAL_AURAS)
4858  {
4859  PSendSysMessage("Need to use aura name id below %u.", TOTAL_AURAS);
4860  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4861  return false;
4862  }
4863 
4864  char const* talentStr = GetMangosString(LANG_TALENT);
4865  char const* passiveStr = GetMangosString(LANG_PASSIVE);
4866 
4867  if (!auraNameId)
4868  {
4869  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& uAuras = unit->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
4870  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_LISTAURAS, uAuras.size());
4871  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator itr = uAuras.begin(); itr != uAuras.end(); ++itr)
4872  {
4873  bool talent = GetTalentSpellCost(itr->second->GetId()) > 0;
4874 
4875  SpellAuraHolder* holder = itr->second;
4876  char const* name = holder->GetSpellProto()->SpellName[GetSessionDbcLocale()];
4877 
4878  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
4879  {
4880  Aura* aur = holder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i));
4881  if (!aur)
4882  continue;
4883 
4884  if (m_session)
4885  {
4886  std::ostringstream ss_name;
4887  ss_name << "|cffffffff|Hspell:" << itr->second->GetId() << "|h[" << name << "]|h|r";
4888 
4889  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_AURADETAIL, holder->GetId(), aur->GetEffIndex(),
4890  aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname, aur->GetAuraDuration(), aur->GetAuraMaxDuration(),
4891  ss_name.str().c_str(),
4892  (holder->IsPassive() ? passiveStr : ""), (talent ? talentStr : ""),
4893  holder->GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), holder->GetStackAmount());
4894  }
4895  else
4896  {
4897  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_AURADETAIL, holder->GetId(), aur->GetEffIndex(),
4898  aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname, aur->GetAuraDuration(), aur->GetAuraMaxDuration(),
4899  name,
4900  (holder->IsPassive() ? passiveStr : ""), (talent ? talentStr : ""),
4901  holder->GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), holder->GetStackAmount());
4902  }
4903  }
4904  }
4905  }
4906 
4907  uint32 i = auraNameId ? auraNameId : 0;
4908  uint32 max = auraNameId ? auraNameId + 1 : TOTAL_AURAS;
4909  for (; i < max; ++i)
4910  {
4911  Unit::AuraList const& uAuraList = unit->GetAurasByType(AuraType(i));
4912  if (uAuraList.empty()) continue;
4913  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_LISTAURATYPE, uAuraList.size(), i);
4914  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator itr = uAuraList.begin(); itr != uAuraList.end(); ++itr)
4915  {
4916  bool talent = GetTalentSpellCost((*itr)->GetId()) > 0;
4917 
4918  char const* name = (*itr)->GetSpellProto()->SpellName[GetSessionDbcLocale()];
4919 
4920  if (m_session)
4921  {
4922  std::ostringstream ss_name;
4923  ss_name << "|cffffffff|Hspell:" << (*itr)->GetId() << "|h[" << name << "]|h|r";
4924 
4925  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_AURASIMPLE, (*itr)->GetId(), (*itr)->GetEffIndex(),
4926  ss_name.str().c_str(), ((*itr)->GetHolder()->IsPassive() ? passiveStr : ""), (talent ? talentStr : ""),
4927  (*itr)->GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str());
4928  }
4929  else
4930  {
4931  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGET_AURASIMPLE, (*itr)->GetId(), (*itr)->GetEffIndex(),
4932  name, ((*itr)->GetHolder()->IsPassive() ? passiveStr : ""), (talent ? talentStr : ""),
4933  (*itr)->GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str());
4934  }
4935  }
4936  }
4937  return true;
4938 }
4939 
4940 bool ChatHandler::HandleListTalentsCommand(char* /*args*/)
4941 {
4942  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
4943  if (!player)
4944  {
4945  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
4946  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4947  return false;
4948  }
4949 
4950  SendSysMessage(LANG_LIST_TALENTS_TITLE);
4951  uint32 count = 0;
4952  uint32 cost = 0;
4953  PlayerSpellMap const& uSpells = player->GetSpellMap();
4954  for (const auto& uSpell : uSpells)
4955  {
4956  if (uSpell.second.state == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED || uSpell.second.disabled)
4957  continue;
4958 
4959  uint32 cost_itr = GetTalentSpellCost(uSpell.first);
4960 
4961  if (cost_itr == 0)
4962  continue;
4963 
4964  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(uSpell.first);
4965  if (!spellEntry)
4966  continue;
4967 
4968  ShowSpellListHelper(player, spellEntry, GetSessionDbcLocale());
4969  ++count;
4970  cost += cost_itr;
4971  }
4972  PSendSysMessage(LANG_LIST_TALENTS_COUNT, count, cost);
4973 
4974  return true;
4975 }
4976 
4977 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetAchievementsCommand(char* args)
4978 {
4979  Player* target;
4980  ObjectGuid target_guid;
4981  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid))
4982  return false;
4983 
4984  if (target)
4985  target->GetAchievementMgr().Reset();
4986  else
4987  AchievementMgr::DeleteFromDB(target_guid);
4988 
4989  return true;
4990 }
4991 
4992 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetHonorCommand(char* args)
4993 {
4994  Player* target;
4995  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target))
4996  return false;
4997 
4998  target->SetHonorPoints(0);
4999  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_KILLS, 0);
5000  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_LIFETIME_HONORABLE_KILLS, 0);
5001  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_TODAY_CONTRIBUTION, 0);
5002  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_YESTERDAY_CONTRIBUTION, 0);
5003  target->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EARN_HONORABLE_KILL);
5004 
5005  return true;
5006 }
5007 
5008 static bool HandleResetStatsOrLevelHelper(Player* player)
5009 {
5010  ChrClassesEntry const* cEntry = sChrClassesStore.LookupEntry(player->getClass());
5011  if (!cEntry)
5012  {
5013  sLog.outError("Class %u not found in DBC (Wrong DBC files?)", player->getClass());
5014  return false;
5015  }
5016 
5017  uint8 powertype = cEntry->powerType;
5018 
5019  // reset m_form if no aura
5020  if (!player->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT))
5021  player->SetShapeshiftForm(FORM_NONE);
5022 
5023  player->SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
5024  player->SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH, 1.5f);
5025 
5026  player->setFactionForRace(player->getRace());
5027 
5028  player->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE, powertype);
5029 
5030  // reset only if player not in some form;
5031  if (player->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_NONE)
5032  player->InitDisplayIds();
5033 
5034  player->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_PVP_FLAG, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_PVP);
5035 
5036  player->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
5037 
5038  //-1 is default value
5039  player->SetInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_WATCHED_FACTION_INDEX, -1);
5040 
5041  // player->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0xEEE00000 );
5042  return true;
5043 }
5044 
5045 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetLevelCommand(char* args)
5046 {
5047  Player* target;
5048  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target))
5049  return false;
5050 
5051  if (!HandleResetStatsOrLevelHelper(target))
5052  return false;
5053 
5054  // set starting level
5055  uint32 start_level = target->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT
5056  ? sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_START_PLAYER_LEVEL)
5057  : sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_START_HEROIC_PLAYER_LEVEL);
5058 
5059  target->_ApplyAllLevelScaleItemMods(false);
5060 
5061  target->SetLevel(start_level);
5062  target->InitRunes();
5063  target->InitStatsForLevel(true);
5064  target->InitTaxiNodesForLevel();
5065  target->InitGlyphsForLevel();
5066  target->InitTalentForLevel();
5067  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_XP, 0);
5068 
5069  target->_ApplyAllLevelScaleItemMods(true);
5070 
5071  // reset level for pet
5072  if (Pet* pet = target->GetPet())
5073  pet->SynchronizeLevelWithOwner();
5074 
5075  return true;
5076 }
5077 
5078 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetStatsCommand(char* args)
5079 {
5080  Player* target;
5081  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target))
5082  return false;
5083 
5084  if (!HandleResetStatsOrLevelHelper(target))
5085  return false;
5086 
5087  target->InitRunes();
5088  target->InitStatsForLevel(true);
5089  target->InitTaxiNodesForLevel();
5090  target->InitGlyphsForLevel();
5091  target->InitTalentForLevel();
5092 
5093  return true;
5094 }
5095 
5096 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetSpellsCommand(char* args)
5097 {
5098  Player* target;
5099  ObjectGuid target_guid;
5100  std::string target_name;
5101  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
5102  return false;
5103 
5104  if (target)
5105  {
5106  target->resetSpells();
5107 
5108  ChatHandler(target).SendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_SPELLS);
5109  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target)
5110  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_SPELLS_ONLINE, GetNameLink(target).c_str());
5111  }
5112  else
5113  {
5114  CharacterDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE characters SET at_login = at_login | '%u' WHERE guid = '%u'", uint32(AT_LOGIN_RESET_SPELLS), target_guid.GetCounter());
5115  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_SPELLS_OFFLINE, target_name.c_str());
5116  }
5117 
5118  return true;
5119 }
5120 
5121 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetSpecsCommand(char* args)
5122 {
5123  Player* target;
5124  ObjectGuid target_guid;
5125  std::string target_name;
5126  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
5127  return false;
5128 
5129  if (target)
5130  {
5131  target->resetTalents(true, true);
5132  target->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
5133 
5134  ChatHandler(target).SendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_TALENTS);
5135  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target)
5136  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_TALENTS_ONLINE, GetNameLink(target).c_str());
5137 
5138  Pet* pet = target->GetPet();
5139  Pet::resetTalentsForAllPetsOf(target, pet);
5140  if (pet)
5141  target->SendTalentsInfoData(true);
5142  return true;
5143  }
5144  if (target_guid)
5145  {
5146  uint32 at_flags = AT_LOGIN_RESET_TALENTS | AT_LOGIN_RESET_PET_TALENTS;
5147  CharacterDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE characters SET at_login = at_login | '%u' WHERE guid = '%u'", at_flags, target_guid.GetCounter());
5148  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
5149  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_TALENTS_OFFLINE, nameLink.c_str());
5150  return true;
5151  }
5152 
5153  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5154  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5155  return false;
5156 }
5157 
5158 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetTalentsCommand(char* args)
5159 {
5160  Player* target;
5161  std::string target_name;
5162  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, nullptr, &target_name))
5163  {
5164  // Try reset talents as Hunter Pet
5165  Creature* creature = getSelectedCreature();
5166  if (!*args && creature && creature->IsPet())
5167  {
5168  Unit* owner = creature->GetOwner();
5169  if (owner && owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Pet*)creature)->isControlled())
5170  {
5171  ((Pet*)creature)->resetTalents(true);
5172  ((Player*)owner)->SendTalentsInfoData(true);
5173 
5174  ChatHandler((Player*)owner).SendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_PET_TALENTS);
5175  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != ((Player*)owner))
5176  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_PET_TALENTS_ONLINE, GetNameLink((Player*)owner).c_str());
5177  }
5178  return true;
5179  }
5180 
5181  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5182  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5183  return false;
5184  }
5185 
5186  if (target)
5187  {
5188  target->resetTalents(true);
5189  target->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
5190  ChatHandler(target).SendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_TALENTS);
5191  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target)
5192  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESET_TALENTS_ONLINE, GetNameLink(target).c_str());
5193 
5194  Pet* pet = target->GetPet();
5195  Pet::resetTalentsForAllPetsOf(target, pet);
5196  if (pet)
5197  target->SendTalentsInfoData(true);
5198  return true;
5199  }
5200 
5201  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5202  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5203  return false;
5204 }
5205 
5206 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetTaxiNodesCommand(char* args)
5207 {
5208  Player* target;
5209  ObjectGuid target_guid;
5210  std::string target_name;
5211  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
5212  return false;
5213 
5214  if (target)
5215  {
5216  target->InitTaxiNodesForLevel();
5217 
5218  ChatHandler(target).SendSysMessage("Your taxi nodes have been reset.");
5219  if (!m_session || m_session->GetPlayer() != target)
5220  PSendSysMessage("Taxi nodes of %s have been reset.", GetNameLink(target).c_str());
5221  return true;
5222  }
5223  if (target_guid)
5224  {
5225  uint32 at_flags = AT_LOGIN_RESET_TAXINODES;
5226  CharacterDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE characters SET at_login = at_login | '%u' WHERE guid = '%u'", at_flags, target_guid.GetCounter());
5227  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
5228  PSendSysMessage("Taxi nodes of %s will be reset at next login.", nameLink.c_str());
5229  return true;
5230  }
5231 
5232  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5233  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5234  return false;
5235 }
5236 
5237 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetAllCommand(char* args)
5238 {
5239  if (!*args)
5240  return false;
5241 
5242  std::string casename = args;
5243 
5244  AtLoginFlags atLogin;
5245 
5246  // Command specially created as single command to prevent using short case names
5247  if (casename == "spells")
5248  {
5249  atLogin = AT_LOGIN_RESET_SPELLS;
5250  sWorld.SendWorldText(LANG_RESETALL_SPELLS);
5251  if (!m_session)
5252  SendSysMessage(LANG_RESETALL_SPELLS);
5253  }
5254  else if (casename == "talents")
5255  {
5256  atLogin = AtLoginFlags(AT_LOGIN_RESET_TALENTS | AT_LOGIN_RESET_PET_TALENTS);
5257  sWorld.SendWorldText(LANG_RESETALL_TALENTS);
5258  if (!m_session)
5259  SendSysMessage(LANG_RESETALL_TALENTS);
5260  }
5261  else
5262  {
5263  PSendSysMessage(LANG_RESETALL_UNKNOWN_CASE, args);
5264  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5265  return false;
5266  }
5267 
5268  CharacterDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE characters SET at_login = at_login | '%u' WHERE (at_login & '%u') = '0'", atLogin, atLogin);
5269  HashMapHolder<Player>::MapType const& plist = sObjectAccessor.GetPlayers();
5270  for (const auto& itr : plist)
5271  itr.second->SetAtLoginFlag(atLogin);
5272 
5273  return true;
5274 }
5275 
5276 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerShutDownCancelCommand(char* /*args*/)
5277 {
5278  sWorld.ShutdownCancel();
5279  return true;
5280 }
5281 
5282 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerShutDownCommand(char* args)
5283 {
5284  uint32 delay;
5285  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, delay))
5286  return false;
5287 
5288  uint32 exitcode;
5289  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, exitcode, SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE))
5290  return false;
5291 
5292  // Exit code should be in range of 0-125, 126-255 is used
5293  // in many shells for their own return codes and code > 255
5294  // is not supported in many others
5295  if (exitcode > 125)
5296  return false;
5297 
5298  sWorld.ShutdownServ(delay, 0, exitcode);
5299  return true;
5300 }
5301 
5302 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerRestartCommand(char* args)
5303 {
5304  uint32 delay;
5305  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, delay))
5306  return false;
5307 
5308  uint32 exitcode;
5309  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, exitcode, RESTART_EXIT_CODE))
5310  return false;
5311 
5312  // Exit code should be in range of 0-125, 126-255 is used
5313  // in many shells for their own return codes and code > 255
5314  // is not supported in many others
5315  if (exitcode > 125)
5316  return false;
5317 
5318  sWorld.ShutdownServ(delay, SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART, exitcode);
5319  return true;
5320 }
5321 
5322 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerIdleRestartCommand(char* args)
5323 {
5324  uint32 delay;
5325  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, delay))
5326  return false;
5327 
5328  uint32 exitcode;
5329  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, exitcode, RESTART_EXIT_CODE))
5330  return false;
5331 
5332  // Exit code should be in range of 0-125, 126-255 is used
5333  // in many shells for their own return codes and code > 255
5334  // is not supported in many others
5335  if (exitcode > 125)
5336  return false;
5337 
5338  sWorld.ShutdownServ(delay, SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART | SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, exitcode);
5339  return true;
5340 }
5341 
5342 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerIdleShutDownCommand(char* args)
5343 {
5344  uint32 delay;
5345  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, delay))
5346  return false;
5347 
5348  uint32 exitcode;
5349  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, exitcode, SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE))
5350  return false;
5351 
5352  // Exit code should be in range of 0-125, 126-255 is used
5353  // in many shells for their own return codes and code > 255
5354  // is not supported in many others
5355  if (exitcode > 125)
5356  return false;
5357 
5358  sWorld.ShutdownServ(delay, SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE, exitcode);
5359  return true;
5360 }
5361 
5362 bool ChatHandler::HandleQuestAddCommand(char* args)
5363 {
5364  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
5365  if (!player)
5366  {
5367  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5368  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5369  return false;
5370  }
5371 
5372  // .addquest #entry'
5373  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hquest:quest_id:quest_level|h[name]|h|r
5374  uint32 entry;
5375  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hquest", entry))
5376  return false;
5377 
5378  Quest const* pQuest = sObjectMgr.GetQuestTemplate(entry);
5379  if (!pQuest)
5380  {
5381  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_NOTFOUND, entry);
5382  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5383  return false;
5384  }
5385 
5386  // check item starting quest (it can work incorrectly if added without item in inventory)
5387  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sItemStorage.GetMaxEntry(); ++id)
5388  {
5389  ItemPrototype const* pProto = sItemStorage.LookupEntry<ItemPrototype>(id);
5390  if (!pProto)
5391  continue;
5392 
5393  if (pProto->StartQuest == entry)
5394  {
5395  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_STARTFROMITEM, entry, pProto->ItemId);
5396  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5397  return false;
5398  }
5399  }
5400 
5401  // ok, normal (creature/GO starting) quest
5402  if (player->CanAddQuest(pQuest, true) && !player->IsCurrentQuest(pQuest->GetQuestId()))
5403  {
5404  player->AddQuest(pQuest, nullptr);
5405 
5406  if (player->CanCompleteQuest(entry))
5407  player->CompleteQuest(entry);
5408  }
5409 
5410  return true;
5411 }
5412 
5413 bool ChatHandler::HandleQuestRemoveCommand(char* args)
5414 {
5415  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
5416  if (!player)
5417  {
5418  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5419  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5420  return false;
5421  }
5422 
5423  // .removequest #entry'
5424  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hquest:quest_id:quest_level|h[name]|h|r
5425  uint32 entry;
5426  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hquest", entry))
5427  return false;
5428 
5429  Quest const* pQuest = sObjectMgr.GetQuestTemplate(entry);
5430 
5431  if (!pQuest)
5432  {
5433  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_NOTFOUND, entry);
5434  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5435  return false;
5436  }
5437 
5438  // remove all quest entries for 'entry' from quest log
5439  for (uint8 slot = 0; slot < MAX_QUEST_LOG_SIZE; ++slot)
5440  {
5441  uint32 quest = player->GetQuestSlotQuestId(slot);
5442  if (quest == entry)
5443  {
5444  player->SetQuestSlot(slot, 0);
5445 
5446  // we ignore unequippable quest items in this case, its' still be equipped
5447  player->TakeQuestSourceItem(quest, false);
5448  }
5449  }
5450 
5451  // set quest status to not started (will updated in DB at next save)
5452  player->SetQuestStatus(entry, QUEST_STATUS_NONE);
5453 
5454  // reset rewarded for restart repeatable quest
5455  player->getQuestStatusMap()[entry].m_rewarded = false;
5456 
5457  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_REMOVED);
5458  return true;
5459 }
5460 
5461 bool ChatHandler::HandleQuestCompleteCommand(char* args)
5462 {
5463  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
5464  if (!player)
5465  {
5466  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5467  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5468  return false;
5469  }
5470 
5471  // .quest complete #entry
5472  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hquest:quest_id:quest_level|h[name]|h|r
5473  uint32 entry;
5474  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hquest", entry))
5475  return false;
5476 
5477  Quest const* pQuest = sObjectMgr.GetQuestTemplate(entry);
5478 
5479  // If player doesn't have the quest
5480  if (!pQuest || player->GetQuestStatus(entry) == QUEST_STATUS_NONE)
5481  {
5482  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_QUEST_NOTFOUND, entry);
5483  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5484  return false;
5485  }
5486 
5487  // Add quest items for quests that require items
5488  for (uint8 x = 0; x < QUEST_ITEM_OBJECTIVES_COUNT; ++x)
5489  {
5490  uint32 id = pQuest->ReqItemId[x];
5491  uint32 count = pQuest->ReqItemCount[x];
5492  if (!id || !count)
5493  continue;
5494 
5495  uint32 curItemCount = player->GetItemCount(id, true);
5496 
5497  ItemPosCountVec dest;
5498  uint8 msg = player->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, id, count - curItemCount);
5499  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK)
5500  {
5501  Item* item = player->StoreNewItem(dest, id, true);
5502  player->SendNewItem(item, count - curItemCount, true, false);
5503  }
5504  }
5505 
5506  // All creature/GO slain/casted (not required, but otherwise it will display "Creature slain 0/10")
5507  for (uint8 i = 0; i < QUEST_OBJECTIVES_COUNT; ++i)
5508  {
5509  int32 creature = pQuest->ReqCreatureOrGOId[i];
5510  uint32 creaturecount = pQuest->ReqCreatureOrGOCount[i];
5511 
5512  if (uint32 spell_id = pQuest->ReqSpell[i])
5513  {
5514  for (uint16 z = 0; z < creaturecount; ++z)
5515  player->CastedCreatureOrGO(creature, ObjectGuid((creature > 0 ? HIGHGUID_UNIT : HIGHGUID_GAMEOBJECT), uint32(std::abs(creature)), 1u), spell_id);
5516  }
5517  else if (creature > 0)
5518  {
5519  if (CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(creature))
5520  for (uint16 z = 0; z < creaturecount; ++z)
5521  player->KilledMonster(cInfo, nullptr);
5522  }
5523  else if (creature < 0)
5524  {
5525  for (uint16 z = 0; z < creaturecount; ++z)
5526  player->CastedCreatureOrGO(-creature, ObjectGuid(), 0);
5527  }
5528  }
5529 
5530  // player kills
5531  if (pQuest->HasSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_PLAYER_KILL))
5532  if (uint32 reqPlayers = pQuest->GetPlayersSlain())
5533  player->KilledPlayerCreditForQuest(reqPlayers, pQuest);
5534 
5535  // If the quest requires reputation to complete
5536  if (uint32 repFaction = pQuest->GetRepObjectiveFaction())
5537  {
5538  uint32 repValue = pQuest->GetRepObjectiveValue();
5539  uint32 curRep = player->GetReputationMgr().GetReputation(repFaction);
5540  if (curRep < repValue)
5541  if (FactionEntry const* factionEntry = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(repFaction))
5542  player->GetReputationMgr().SetReputation(factionEntry, repValue);
5543  }
5544 
5545  // If the quest requires money
5546  int32 ReqOrRewMoney = pQuest->GetRewOrReqMoney();
5547  if (ReqOrRewMoney < 0)
5548  player->ModifyMoney(-ReqOrRewMoney);
5549 
5550  player->CompleteQuest(entry);
5551  return true;
5552 }
5553 
5554 bool ChatHandler::HandleAddCharacterNoteCommand(char* args)
5555 {
5556  Player* target;
5557  ObjectGuid playerGuid;
5558  std::string target_name;
5559  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &playerGuid, &target_name))
5560  {
5561  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
5562  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5563  return false;
5564  }
5565 
5566  uint32 account_id = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(playerGuid);
5567 
5568  std::string authorName = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayerName() : "Console";
5569  const char* reason = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
5570  if (!reason)
5571  reason = "<no reason given>";
5572 
5573  sWorld.WarnAccount(account_id, authorName, reason, "NOTE");
5574 
5575  PSendSysMessage("Account #%u (character %s): a note has been added \"%s\"", account_id, target_name.c_str(), reason);
5576  return true;
5577 }
5578 
5579 bool ChatHandler::HandleWarnCharacterCommand(char* args)
5580 {
5581  Player* target;
5582  ObjectGuid playerGuid;
5583  std::string target_name;
5584  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &playerGuid, &target_name))
5585  {
5586  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
5587  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5588  return false;
5589  }
5590 
5591  uint32 account_id = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(playerGuid);
5592 
5593  std::string authorName = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayerName() : "Console";
5594  const char* reason = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
5595  if (!reason)
5596  reason = "<no reason given>";
5597 
5598  sWorld.WarnAccount(account_id, authorName, reason, "WARN");
5599 
5600  PSendSysMessage("Account #%u (character %s) has been warned for \"%s\"", account_id, target_name.c_str(), reason);
5601  return true;
5602 }
5603 
5604 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanAccountCommand(char* args)
5605 {
5606  return HandleBanHelper(BAN_ACCOUNT, args);
5607 }
5608 
5609 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanCharacterCommand(char* args)
5610 {
5611  return HandleBanHelper(BAN_CHARACTER, args);
5612 }
5613 
5614 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanIPCommand(char* args)
5615 {
5616  return HandleBanHelper(BAN_IP, args);
5617 }
5618 
5619 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanHelper(BanMode mode, char* args)
5620 {
5621  if (!*args)
5622  return false;
5623 
5624  char* cnameOrIP = ExtractArg(&args);
5625  if (!cnameOrIP)
5626  return false;
5627 
5628  std::string nameOrIP = cnameOrIP;
5629 
5630  char* duration = ExtractArg(&args); // time string
5631  if (!duration)
5632  return false;
5633 
5634  uint32 duration_secs = TimeStringToSecs(duration);
5635 
5636  char* reason = ExtractArg(&args);
5637  if (!reason)
5638  return false;
5639 
5640  switch (mode)
5641  {
5642  case BAN_ACCOUNT:
5643  if (!AccountMgr::normalizeString(nameOrIP))
5644  {
5645  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST, nameOrIP.c_str());
5646  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5647  return false;
5648  }
5649  break;
5650  case BAN_CHARACTER:
5651  if (!normalizePlayerName(nameOrIP))
5652  {
5653  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
5654  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5655  return false;
5656  }
5657  break;
5658  case BAN_IP:
5659  if (!IsIPAddress(nameOrIP.c_str()))
5660  return false;
5661  break;
5662  }
5663 
5664  switch (sWorld.BanAccount(mode, nameOrIP, duration_secs, reason, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayerName() : ""))
5665  {
5666  case BAN_SUCCESS:
5667  if (duration_secs > 0)
5668  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BAN_YOUBANNED, nameOrIP.c_str(), secsToTimeString(duration_secs, true).c_str(), reason);
5669  else
5670  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BAN_YOUPERMBANNED, nameOrIP.c_str(), reason);
5671  break;
5672  case BAN_SYNTAX_ERROR:
5673  return false;
5674  case BAN_NOTFOUND:
5675  switch (mode)
5676  {
5677  default:
5678  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BAN_NOTFOUND, "account", nameOrIP.c_str());
5679  break;
5680  case BAN_CHARACTER:
5681  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BAN_NOTFOUND, "character", nameOrIP.c_str());
5682  break;
5683  }
5684  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5685  return false;
5686  }
5687 
5688  return true;
5689 }
5690 
5691 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnBanAccountCommand(char* args)
5692 {
5693  return HandleUnBanHelper(BAN_ACCOUNT, args);
5694 }
5695 
5696 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnBanCharacterCommand(char* args)
5697 {
5698  return HandleUnBanHelper(BAN_CHARACTER, args);
5699 }
5700 
5701 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnBanIPCommand(char* args)
5702 {
5703  return HandleUnBanHelper(BAN_IP, args);
5704 }
5705 
5706 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnBanHelper(BanMode mode, char* args)
5707 {
5708  if (!*args)
5709  return false;
5710 
5711  char* cnameOrIP = ExtractArg(&args);
5712  if (!cnameOrIP)
5713  return false;
5714 
5715  std::string nameOrIP = cnameOrIP;
5716 
5717  char* message = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
5718  if (!message)
5719  return false;
5720 
5721  std::string unbanMessage(message);
5722 
5723  switch (mode)
5724  {
5725  case BAN_ACCOUNT:
5726  if (!AccountMgr::normalizeString(nameOrIP))
5727  {
5728  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST, nameOrIP.c_str());
5729  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5730  return false;
5731  }
5732  break;
5733  case BAN_CHARACTER:
5734  if (!normalizePlayerName(nameOrIP))
5735  {
5736  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
5737  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5738  return false;
5739  }
5740  break;
5741  case BAN_IP:
5742  if (!IsIPAddress(nameOrIP.c_str()))
5743  return false;
5744  break;
5745  }
5746 
5747  std::string source = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayerName() : "CONSOLE";
5748  if (sWorld.RemoveBanAccount(mode, source, unbanMessage, nameOrIP))
5749  PSendSysMessage(LANG_UNBAN_UNBANNED, nameOrIP.c_str(), unbanMessage.c_str());
5750  else
5751  PSendSysMessage(LANG_UNBAN_ERROR, nameOrIP.c_str());
5752 
5753  return true;
5754 }
5755 
5756 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanInfoAccountCommand(char* args)
5757 {
5758  if (!*args)
5759  return false;
5760 
5761  std::string account_name;
5762  uint32 accountid = ExtractAccountId(&args, &account_name);
5763  if (!accountid)
5764  return false;
5765 
5766  return HandleBanInfoHelper(accountid, account_name.c_str());
5767 }
5768 
5769 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanInfoCharacterCommand(char* args)
5770 {
5771  Player* target;
5772  ObjectGuid target_guid;
5773  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid))
5774  return false;
5775 
5776  uint32 accountid = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(target_guid);
5777 
5778  std::string accountname;
5779  if (!sAccountMgr.GetName(accountid, accountname))
5780  {
5781  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_NOCHARACTER);
5782  return true;
5783  }
5784 
5785  return HandleBanInfoHelper(accountid, accountname.c_str());
5786 }
5787 
5788 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanInfoHelper(uint32 accountid, char const* accountname)
5789 {
5790  QueryResult* result = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(banned_at),expires_at-banned_at,active,expires_at,reason,banned_by,unbanned_at,unbanned_by "
5791  "FROM account_banned WHERE account_id = '%u' ORDER BY banned_at ASC", accountid);
5792  if (!result)
5793  {
5794  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_NOACCOUNTBAN, accountname);
5795  return true;
5796  }
5797 
5798  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_BANHISTORY, accountname);
5799  do
5800  {
5801  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
5802 
5803  time_t expiresAt = time_t(fields[3].GetUInt64());
5804  bool active = false;
5805  if (fields[2].GetBool() && (fields[1].GetUInt64() == (uint64)0 || expiresAt >= time(nullptr)))
5806  active = true;
5807  bool permanent = (fields[1].GetUInt64() == (uint64)0);
5808  std::string bantime = permanent ? GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_INFINITE) : secsToTimeString(fields[1].GetUInt64(), true);
5809  std::string unbannedBy = fields[7].IsNULL() ? "" : fields[7].GetString();
5810  std::string manuallyUnbanned = "";
5811  if (unbannedBy.empty())
5812  manuallyUnbanned = GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_YES);
5813  else
5814  {
5815  manuallyUnbanned = GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_NO);
5816  manuallyUnbanned += "," + secsToTimeString(fields[6].GetUInt64());
5817  }
5818  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_HISTORYENTRY,
5819  fields[0].GetString(), bantime.c_str(), active ? GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_YES) : GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_NO), fields[4].GetString(), fields[5].GetString());
5820  }
5821  while (result->NextRow());
5822 
5823  delete result;
5824  return true;
5825 }
5826 
5827 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanInfoIPCommand(char* args)
5828 {
5829  if (!*args)
5830  return false;
5831 
5832  char* cIP = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
5833  if (!cIP)
5834  return false;
5835 
5836  if (!IsIPAddress(cIP))
5837  return false;
5838 
5839  std::string IP = cIP;
5840 
5841  LoginDatabase.escape_string(IP);
5842  QueryResult* result = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT ip, FROM_UNIXTIME(banned_at), FROM_UNIXTIME(expires_at), expires_at-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), reason,banned_by,expires_at-banned_at"
5843  "FROM ip_banned WHERE ip = '%s'", IP.c_str());
5844  if (!result)
5845  {
5846  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_NOIP);
5847  return true;
5848  }
5849 
5850  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
5851  bool permanent = !fields[6].GetUInt64();
5852  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANINFO_IPENTRY,
5853  fields[0].GetString(), fields[1].GetString(), permanent ? GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_NEVER) : fields[2].GetString(),
5854  permanent ? GetMangosString(LANG_BANINFO_INFINITE) : secsToTimeString(fields[3].GetUInt64(), true).c_str(), fields[4].GetString(), fields[5].GetString());
5855  delete result;
5856  return true;
5857 }
5858 
5859 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanListCharacterCommand(char* args)
5860 {
5861  LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE expires_at<=UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND expires_at<>banned_at");
5862 
5863  char* cFilter = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
5864  if (!cFilter)
5865  return false;
5866 
5867  std::string filter = cFilter;
5868  LoginDatabase.escape_string(filter);
5869  QueryResult* result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT account FROM characters WHERE name " _LIKE_ " " _CONCAT3_("'%%'", "'%s'", "'%%'"), filter.c_str());
5870  if (!result)
5871  {
5872  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_NOCHARACTER);
5873  return true;
5874  }
5875 
5876  return HandleBanListHelper(result);
5877 }
5878 
5879 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanListAccountCommand(char* args)
5880 {
5881  LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE expires_at<=UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND expires_at<>banned_at");
5882 
5883  char* cFilter = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
5884  std::string filter = cFilter ? cFilter : "";
5885  LoginDatabase.escape_string(filter);
5886 
5887  QueryResult* result;
5888 
5889  if (filter.empty())
5890  {
5891  result = LoginDatabase.Query("SELECT account.id, username FROM account, account_banned"
5892  " WHERE account.id = account_banned.account_id AND active = 1 GROUP BY account.id");
5893  }
5894  else
5895  {
5896  result = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT account.id, username FROM account, account_banned"
5897  " WHERE account.id = account_banned.account_id AND active = 1 AND username " _LIKE_ " " _CONCAT3_("'%%'", "'%s'", "'%%'")" GROUP BY account.id",
5898  filter.c_str());
5899  }
5900 
5901  if (!result)
5902  {
5903  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_NOACCOUNT);
5904  return true;
5905  }
5906 
5907  return HandleBanListHelper(result);
5908 }
5909 
5910 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanListHelper(QueryResult* result)
5911 {
5912  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_MATCHINGACCOUNT);
5913 
5914  // Chat short output
5915  if (m_session)
5916  {
5917  do
5918  {
5919  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
5920  uint32 accountid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
5921 
5922  QueryResult* banresult = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT account.username FROM account,account_banned WHERE account_banned.account_id='%u' AND account_banned.account_id=account.id", accountid);
5923  if (banresult)
5924  {
5925  Field* fields2 = banresult->Fetch();
5926  PSendSysMessage("%s", fields2[0].GetString());
5927  delete banresult;
5928  }
5929  }
5930  while (result->NextRow());
5931  }
5932  // Console wide output
5933  else
5934  {
5935  SendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_ACCOUNTS);
5936  SendSysMessage("===============================================================================");
5937  SendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_ACCOUNTS_HEADER);
5938  do
5939  {
5940  SendSysMessage("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
5941  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
5942  uint32 account_id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
5943 
5944  std::string account_name;
5945 
5946  // "account" case, name can be get in same query
5947  if (result->GetFieldCount() > 1)
5948  account_name = fields[1].GetCppString();
5949  // "character" case, name need extract from another DB
5950  else
5951  sAccountMgr.GetName(account_id, account_name);
5952 
5953  // No SQL injection. id is uint32.
5954  QueryResult* banInfo = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT banned_at,expires_at,banned_by,reason,unbanned_at,unbanned_by FROM account_banned WHERE account_id = %u ORDER BY expires_at", account_id);
5955  if (banInfo)
5956  {
5957  Field* fields2 = banInfo->Fetch();
5958  do
5959  {
5960  time_t t_ban = fields2[0].GetUInt64();
5961  tm* aTm_ban = localtime(&t_ban);
5962 
5963  if (fields2[0].GetUInt64() == fields2[1].GetUInt64())
5964  {
5965  PSendSysMessage("|%-15.15s|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d| permanent |%-15.15s|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|",
5966  account_name.c_str(), aTm_ban->tm_year % 100, aTm_ban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_ban->tm_mday, aTm_ban->tm_hour, aTm_ban->tm_min,
5967  fields2[2].GetString(), fields2[3].GetString(), fields2[5].GetString(), secsToTimeString(fields2[4].GetUInt64()).data());
5968  }
5969  else
5970  {
5971  time_t t_unban = fields2[1].GetUInt64();
5972  tm* aTm_unban = localtime(&t_unban);
5973  PSendSysMessage("|%-15.15s|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|",
5974  account_name.c_str(), aTm_ban->tm_year % 100, aTm_ban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_ban->tm_mday, aTm_ban->tm_hour, aTm_ban->tm_min,
5975  aTm_unban->tm_year % 100, aTm_unban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_unban->tm_mday, aTm_unban->tm_hour, aTm_unban->tm_min,
5976  fields2[2].GetString(), fields2[3].GetString(), fields2[5].GetString(), secsToTimeString(fields2[4].GetUInt64()).data());
5977  }
5978  }
5979  while (banInfo->NextRow());
5980  delete banInfo;
5981  }
5982  }
5983  while (result->NextRow());
5984  SendSysMessage("===============================================================================");
5985  }
5986 
5987  delete result;
5988  return true;
5989 }
5990 
5991 bool ChatHandler::HandleBanListIPCommand(char* args)
5992 {
5993  LoginDatabase.Execute("DELETE FROM ip_banned WHERE expires_at<=UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AND expires_at<>banned_at");
5994 
5995  char* cFilter = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
5996  std::string filter = cFilter ? cFilter : "";
5997  LoginDatabase.escape_string(filter);
5998 
5999  QueryResult* result;
6000 
6001  if (filter.empty())
6002  {
6003  result = LoginDatabase.Query("SELECT ip,banned_at,expires_at,banned_by,reason FROM ip_banned"
6004  " WHERE (banned_at=expires_at OR expires_at>UNIX_TIMESTAMP())"
6005  " ORDER BY expires_at");
6006  }
6007  else
6008  {
6009  result = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT ip,banned_at,expires_at,banned_by,reason FROM ip_banned"
6010  " WHERE (banned_at=expires_at OR expires_at>UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) AND ip " _LIKE_ " " _CONCAT3_("'%%'", "'%s'", "'%%'")
6011  " ORDER BY expires_at", filter.c_str());
6012  }
6013 
6014  if (!result)
6015  {
6016  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_NOIP);
6017  return true;
6018  }
6019 
6020  PSendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_MATCHINGIP);
6021  // Chat short output
6022  if (m_session)
6023  {
6024  do
6025  {
6026  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
6027  PSendSysMessage("%s", fields[0].GetString());
6028  }
6029  while (result->NextRow());
6030  }
6031  // Console wide output
6032  else
6033  {
6034  SendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_IPS);
6035  SendSysMessage("===============================================================================");
6036  SendSysMessage(LANG_BANLIST_IPS_HEADER);
6037  do
6038  {
6039  SendSysMessage("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
6040  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
