6041  time_t t_ban = fields[1].GetUInt64();
6042  tm* aTm_ban = localtime(&t_ban);
6043  if (fields[1].GetUInt64() == fields[2].GetUInt64())
6044  {
6045  PSendSysMessage("|%-15.15s|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d| permanent |%-15.15s|%-15.15s|",
6046  fields[0].GetString(), aTm_ban->tm_year % 100, aTm_ban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_ban->tm_mday, aTm_ban->tm_hour, aTm_ban->tm_min,
6047  fields[3].GetString(), fields[4].GetString());
6048  }
6049  else
6050  {
6051  time_t t_unban = fields[2].GetUInt64();
6052  tm* aTm_unban = localtime(&t_unban);
6053  PSendSysMessage("|%-15.15s|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d|%02d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d|%-15.15s|%-15.15s|",
6054  fields[0].GetString(), aTm_ban->tm_year % 100, aTm_ban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_ban->tm_mday, aTm_ban->tm_hour, aTm_ban->tm_min,
6055  aTm_unban->tm_year % 100, aTm_unban->tm_mon + 1, aTm_unban->tm_mday, aTm_unban->tm_hour, aTm_unban->tm_min,
6056  fields[3].GetString(), fields[4].GetString());
6057  }
6058  }
6059  while (result->NextRow());
6060  SendSysMessage("===============================================================================");
6061  }
6062 
6063  delete result;
6064  return true;
6065 }
6066 
6067 bool ChatHandler::HandleRespawnCommand(char* /*args*/)
6068 {
6069  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
6070 
6071  // accept only explicitly selected target (not implicitly self targeting case)
6072  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
6073  if (pl->GetSelectionGuid() && target)
6074  {
6075  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
6076  {
6077  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
6078  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6079  return false;
6080  }
6081 
6082  if (target->IsDead())
6083  {
6084  Creature* creature = static_cast<Creature*>(target);
6085  if (target->IsUsingNewSpawningSystem())
6086  {
6087  if (creature->GetMap()->GetMapDataContainer().GetSpawnGroupByGuid(creature->GetDbGuid(), TYPEID_UNIT))
6088  target->GetMap()->GetPersistentState()->SaveCreatureRespawnTime(target->GetDbGuid(), time(nullptr));
6089  else
6090  target->GetMap()->GetSpawnManager().RespawnCreature(target->GetDbGuid(), 0);
6091  }
6092  else
6093  creature->Respawn();
6094  }
6095  return true;
6096  }
6097 
6098  MaNGOS::RespawnDo u_do;
6099  MaNGOS::WorldObjectWorker<MaNGOS::RespawnDo> worker(pl, u_do);
6100  Cell::VisitGridObjects(pl, worker, pl->GetVisibilityData().GetVisibilityDistance());
6101 
6102  pl->GetMap()->GetSpawnManager().RespawnSpawnGroupsInVicinity(pl->GetPosition(), pl->GetVisibilityData().GetVisibilityDistance());
6103  return true;
6104 }
6105 
6106 bool ChatHandler::HandleGMFlyCommand(char* args)
6107 {
6108  bool value;
6109  if (!ExtractOnOff(&args, value))
6110  {
6111  SendSysMessage(LANG_USE_BOL);
6112  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6113  return false;
6114  }
6115 
6116  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
6117  if (!target)
6118  target = m_session->GetPlayer();
6119 
6120  target->SetCanFly(value);
6121  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_FLYMODE_STATUS, GetNameLink(target).c_str(), args);
6122  return true;
6123 }
6124 
6125 bool ChatHandler::HandlePDumpLoadCommand(char* args)
6126 {
6127  char* file = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
6128  if (!file)
6129  return false;
6130 
6131  std::string account_name;
6132  uint32 account_id = ExtractAccountId(&args, &account_name);
6133  if (!account_id)
6134  return false;
6135 
6136  char* name_str = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
6137 
6138  uint32 lowguid = 0;
6139  std::string name;
6140 
6141  if (name_str)
6142  {
6143  name = name_str;
6144  // normalize the name if specified and check if it exists
6145  if (!normalizePlayerName(name))
6146  {
6147  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_CHARACTER_NAME);
6148  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6149  return false;
6150  }
6151 
6152  if (ObjectMgr::CheckPlayerName(name, true) != CHAR_NAME_SUCCESS)
6153  {
6154  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_CHARACTER_NAME);
6155  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6156  return false;
6157  }
6158 
6159  if (*args)
6160  {
6161  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, lowguid))
6162  return false;
6163 
6164  if (!lowguid)
6165  {
6166  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_CHARACTER_GUID);
6167  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6168  return false;
6169  }
6170 
6171  ObjectGuid guid = ObjectGuid(HIGHGUID_PLAYER, lowguid);
6172 
6173  if (sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(guid))
6174  {
6175  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTER_GUID_IN_USE, lowguid);
6176  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6177  return false;
6178  }
6179  }
6180  }
6181 
6182  switch (PlayerDumpReader::LoadDump(file, account_id, name, lowguid))
6183  {
6184  case DUMP_SUCCESS:
6185  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_IMPORT_SUCCESS);
6186  break;
6187  case DUMP_FILE_OPEN_ERROR:
6188  PSendSysMessage(LANG_FILE_OPEN_FAIL, file);
6189  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6190  return false;
6191  case DUMP_FILE_BROKEN:
6192  PSendSysMessage(LANG_DUMP_BROKEN, file);
6193  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6194  return false;
6195  case DUMP_TOO_MANY_CHARS:
6196  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_CHARACTER_LIST_FULL, account_name.c_str(), account_id);
6197  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6198  return false;
6199  default:
6200  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_IMPORT_FAILED);
6201  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6202  return false;
6203  }
6204 
6205  return true;
6206 }
6207 
6208 bool ChatHandler::HandlePDumpWriteCommand(char* args)
6209 {
6210  if (!*args)
6211  return false;
6212 
6213  char* file = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args);
6214  if (!file)
6215  return false;
6216 
6217  char* p2 = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
6218 
6219  uint32 lowguid;
6220  ObjectGuid guid;
6221  // character name can't start from number
6222  if (!ExtractUInt32(&p2, lowguid))
6223  {
6224  std::string name = ExtractPlayerNameFromLink(&p2);
6225  if (name.empty())
6226  {
6227  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
6228  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6229  return false;
6230  }
6231 
6232  guid = sObjectMgr.GetPlayerGuidByName(name);
6233  if (!guid)
6234  {
6235  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
6236  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6237  return false;
6238  }
6239 
6240  lowguid = guid.GetCounter();
6241  }
6242  else
6243  guid = ObjectGuid(HIGHGUID_PLAYER, lowguid);
6244 
6245  if (!sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(guid))
6246  {
6247  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
6248  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6249  return false;
6250  }
6251 
6252  switch (PlayerDumpWriter().WriteDump(file, lowguid))
6253  {
6254  case DUMP_SUCCESS:
6255  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_EXPORT_SUCCESS);
6256  break;
6257  case DUMP_FILE_OPEN_ERROR:
6258  PSendSysMessage(LANG_FILE_OPEN_FAIL, file);
6259  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6260  return false;
6261  default:
6262  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_EXPORT_FAILED);
6263  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6264  return false;
6265  }
6266 
6267  return true;
6268 }
6269 
6270 bool ChatHandler::HandleMovegensCommand(char* /*args*/)
6271 {
6272  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
6273  if (!unit)
6274  {
6275  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6276  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6277  return false;
6278  }
6279 
6280  PSendSysMessage("%s movement generators stack:", unit->GetGuidStr().c_str());
6281 
6282  MotionMaster* mm = unit->GetMotionMaster();
6283  float x, y, z;
6284  mm->GetDestination(x, y, z);
6285  for (MotionMaster::const_iterator itr = mm->begin(); itr != mm->end(); ++itr)
6286  {
6287  switch ((*itr)->GetMovementGeneratorType())
6288  {
6289  case IDLE_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_IDLE); break;
6290  case RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_RANDOM); break;
6291  case WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_WAYPOINT); break;
6292  case CONFUSED_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CONFUSED); break;
6293 
6294  case CHASE_MOTION_TYPE:
6295  {
6296  Unit* target = nullptr;
6297  float distance = 0.f;
6298  float angle = 0.f;
6299  ChaseMovementGenerator const* movegen = static_cast<ChaseMovementGenerator const*>(*itr);
6300  target = movegen->GetCurrentTarget();
6301  distance = movegen->GetOffset();
6302  angle = movegen->GetAngle();
6303 
6304  if (!target)
6305  SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_NULL);
6306  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6307  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_PLAYER, target->GetName(), target->GetGUIDLow(), distance, angle, ChaseModes[movegen->GetCurrentMode()]);
6308  else
6309  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_CREATURE, target->GetName(), target->GetGUIDLow(), distance, angle, ChaseModes[movegen->GetCurrentMode()]);
6310  break;
6311  }
6312  case FOLLOW_MOTION_TYPE:
6313  {
6314  Unit* target = static_cast<FollowMovementGenerator const*>(*itr)->GetCurrentTarget();
6315 
6316  if (!target)
6317  SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_NULL);
6318  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6319  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_PLAYER, target->GetName(), target->GetGUIDLow());
6320  else
6321  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_CREATURE, target->GetName(), target->GetGUIDLow());
6322  break;
6323  }
6324  case HOME_MOTION_TYPE:
6325  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
6326  {
6327  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_HOME_CREATURE, x, y, z);
6328  }
6329  else
6330  SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_HOME_PLAYER);
6331  break;
6332  case TAXI_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FLIGHT); break;
6333  case POINT_MOTION_TYPE:
6334  {
6335  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_POINT, x, y, z);
6336  break;
6337  }
6338  case FLEEING_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FEAR); break;
6339  case DISTRACT_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_DISTRACT); break;
6340  case EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE: SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_EFFECT); break;
6341  case FORMATION_MOTION_TYPE:
6342  PSendSysMessage(" Formation movement, following [%s]", unit->GetFormationSlot()->GetMaster()->GetGuidStr().c_str());
6343  break;
6344  default:
6345  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_UNKNOWN, (*itr)->GetMovementGeneratorType());
6346  break;
6347  }
6348  }
6349  return true;
6350 }
6351 
6352 bool ChatHandler::HandleMovespeedShowCommand(char* /*args*/)
6353 {
6354  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
6355  if (!unit)
6356  {
6357  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6358  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6359  return false;
6360  }
6361 
6362  PSendSysMessage("%s speeds:", unit->GetName());
6363  PSendSysMessage("Walk speed %f, Run speed %f, Swim speed %f, Fly speed %f", unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_WALK), unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN), unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM), unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT));
6364 
6365  return true;
6366 }
6367 
6368 bool ChatHandler::HandleDebugMovement(char* args)
6369 {
6370  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
6371  if (!unit)
6372  {
6373  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6374  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6375  return false;
6376  }
6377 
6378  bool value;
6379  if (!ExtractOnOff(&args, value))
6380  {
6381  SendSysMessage(LANG_USE_BOL);
6382  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6383  return false;
6384  }
6385 
6386  unit->SetDebuggingMovement(value);
6387  PSendSysMessage("New value: %s", (value ? "true" : "false"));
6388  return true;
6389 }
6390 
6391 bool ChatHandler::HandlePrintMovement(char* /*args*/)
6392 {
6393  Creature* unit = getSelectedCreature();
6394  if (!unit)
6395  {
6396  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6397  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6398  return false;
6399  }
6400 
6401  MotionMaster* mm = unit->GetMotionMaster();
6402  if (mm->top()->GetMovementGeneratorType() == CHASE_MOTION_TYPE)
6403  {
6404  ChaseMovementGenerator* chaseM = static_cast<ChaseMovementGenerator*>(mm->top());
6405  auto data = chaseM->GetPrintout();
6406  PSendSysMessage("%s", data.first.data());
6407  sLog.outCustomLog("%s", data.second.data());
6408  }
6409  return true;
6410 }
6411 
6412 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerPLimitCommand(char* args)
6413 {
6414  if (*args)
6415  {
6416  char* param = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
6417  if (!param)
6418  return false;
6419 
6420  int32 val;
6421  if (param[0] =='p' || param[0] == 'P')
6422  val = -int32(SEC_PLAYER);
6423  else if (param[0] == 'm' || param[0] == 'M')
6424  val = -int32(SEC_MODERATOR);
6425  else if (param[0] == 'g' || param[0] == 'G')
6426  val = -int32(SEC_GAMEMASTER);
6427  else if (param[0] == 'a' || param[0] == 'A')
6428  val = -int32(SEC_ADMINISTRATOR);
6429  else if (param[0] == 'r' || param[0] == 'R')
6430  val = sConfig.GetIntDefault("PlayerLimit", DEFAULT_PLAYER_LIMIT);
6431  else if (ExtractInt32(&param, val))
6432  {
6433  if (val < -int32(SEC_ADMINISTRATOR))
6434  val = -int32(SEC_ADMINISTRATOR);
6435  }
6436  else
6437  return false;
6438 
6439  sWorld.SetPlayerLimit(val);
6440 
6441  // kick all low security level players
6442  if (sWorld.GetPlayerAmountLimit() > SEC_PLAYER)
6443  sWorld.KickAllLess(sWorld.GetPlayerSecurityLimit());
6444  }
6445 
6446  uint32 pLimit = sWorld.GetPlayerAmountLimit();
6447  AccountTypes allowedAccountType = sWorld.GetPlayerSecurityLimit();
6448  char const* secName;
6449  switch (allowedAccountType)
6450  {
6451  case SEC_PLAYER: secName = "Player"; break;
6452  case SEC_MODERATOR: secName = "Moderator"; break;
6453  case SEC_GAMEMASTER: secName = "Gamemaster"; break;
6454  case SEC_ADMINISTRATOR: secName = "Administrator"; break;
6455  default: secName = "<unknown>"; break;
6456  }
6457 
6458  PSendSysMessage("Player limits: amount %u, min. security level %s.", pLimit, secName);
6459 
6460  return true;
6461 }
6462 
6463 bool ChatHandler::HandleCastCommand(char* args)
6464 {
6465  if (!*args)
6466  return false;
6467 
6468  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit(false);
6469 
6470  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
6471  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
6472  if (!spell)
6473  return false;
6474 
6475  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
6476  if (!spellInfo)
6477  return false;
6478 
6479  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, m_session->GetPlayer()))
6480  {
6481  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spell);
6482  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6483  return false;
6484  }
6485 
6486  bool triggered = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "triggered") != nullptr;
6487  if (!triggered && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
6488  return false;
6489 
6490  if (spellInfo->Targets && !target)
6491  target = m_session->GetPlayer();
6492 
6493  SpellCastResult result = m_session->GetPlayer()->CastSpell(target, spell, triggered ? TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED : TRIGGERED_NONE);
6494  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6495  PSendSysMessage("Spell resulted in fail %u", uint32(result));
6496 
6497  return true;
6498 }
6499 
6500 bool ChatHandler::HandleCastBackCommand(char* args)
6501 {
6502  Creature* caster = getSelectedCreature();
6503 
6504  if (!caster)
6505  {
6506  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6507  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6508  return false;
6509  }
6510 
6511  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r
6512  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
6513  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
6514  if (!spell || !sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell))
6515  return false;
6516 
6517  bool triggered = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "triggered") != nullptr;
6518  if (!triggered && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
6519  return false;
6520 
6521  caster->SetFacingToObject(m_session->GetPlayer());
6522 
6523  SpellCastResult result = caster->CastSpell(m_session->GetPlayer(), spell, triggered ? TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED : TRIGGERED_NONE);
6524  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6525  PSendSysMessage("Spell resulted in fail %u", uint32(result));
6526 
6527  return true;
6528 }
6529 
6530 bool ChatHandler::HandleCastDistCommand(char* args)
6531 {
6532  if (!*args)
6533  return false;
6534 
6535  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
6536  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
6537  if (!spell)
6538  return false;
6539 
6540  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
6541  if (!spellInfo)
6542  return false;
6543 
6544  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, m_session->GetPlayer()))
6545  {
6546  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spell);
6547  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6548  return false;
6549  }
6550 
6551  float dist;
6552  if (!ExtractFloat(&args, dist))
6553  return false;
6554 
6555  bool triggered = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "triggered") != nullptr;
6556  if (!triggered && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
6557  return false;
6558 
6559  float x, y, z;
6560  m_session->GetPlayer()->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, dist);
6561 
6562  SpellCastResult result = m_session->GetPlayer()->CastSpell(x, y, z, spell, triggered ? TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED : TRIGGERED_NONE);
6563  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6564  PSendSysMessage("Spell resulted in fail %u", uint32(result));
6565  return true;
6566 }
6567 
6568 bool ChatHandler::HandleCastTargetCommand(char* args)
6569 {
6570  Creature* caster = getSelectedCreature();
6571 
6572  if (!caster)
6573  {
6574  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6575  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6576  return false;
6577  }
6578 
6579  if (!caster->GetVictim())
6580  {
6581  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECTED_TARGET_NOT_HAVE_VICTIM);
6582  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6583  return false;
6584  }
6585 
6586  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
6587  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
6588  if (!spell || !sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell))
6589  return false;
6590 
6591  bool triggered = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "triggered") != nullptr;
6592  if (!triggered && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
6593  return false;
6594 
6595  caster->SetFacingToObject(m_session->GetPlayer());
6596 
6597  SpellCastResult result = caster->CastSpell(caster->GetVictim(), spell, triggered ? TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED : TRIGGERED_NONE);
6598  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6599  PSendSysMessage("Spell resulted in fail %u", uint32(result));
6600 
6601  return true;
6602 }
6603 
6604 /*
6605 ComeToMe command REQUIRED for 3rd party scripting library to have access to PointMovementGenerator
6606 Without this function 3rd party scripting library will get linking errors (unresolved external)
6607 when attempting to use the PointMovementGenerator
6608 */
6609 bool ChatHandler::HandleComeToMeCommand(char* /*args*/)
6610 {
6611  Creature* caster = getSelectedCreature();
6612 
6613  if (!caster)
6614  {
6615  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
6616  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6617  return false;
6618  }
6619 
6620  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
6621 
6622  caster->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ());
6623  return true;
6624 }
6625 
6626 bool ChatHandler::HandleCastSelfCommand(char* args)
6627 {
6628  if (!*args)
6629  return false;
6630 
6631  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
6632 
6633  if (!target)
6634  {
6635  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
6636  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6637  return false;
6638  }
6639 
6640  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
6641  uint32 spell = ExtractSpellIdFromLink(&args);
6642  if (!spell)
6643  return false;
6644 
6645  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell);
6646  if (!spellInfo)
6647  return false;
6648 
6649  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, m_session->GetPlayer()))
6650  {
6651  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spell);
6652  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6653  return false;
6654  }
6655 
6656  bool triggered = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "triggered") != nullptr;
6657  if (!triggered && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
6658  return false;
6659 
6660  SpellCastResult result = target->CastSpell(target, spell, triggered ? TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED : TRIGGERED_NONE);
6661  if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6662  PSendSysMessage("Spell resulted in fail %u", uint32(result));
6663 
6664  return true;
6665 }
6666 
6667 bool ChatHandler::HandleInstanceListBindsCommand(char* /*args*/)
6668 {
6669  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
6670  if (!player) player = m_session->GetPlayer();
6671  uint32 counter = 0;
6672  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_DIFFICULTY; ++i)
6673  {
6674  Player::BoundInstancesMap& binds = player->GetBoundInstances(Difficulty(i));
6675  for (Player::BoundInstancesMap::const_iterator itr = binds.begin(); itr != binds.end(); ++itr)
6676  {
6677  DungeonPersistentState* state = itr->second.state;
6678  auto bind = itr->second;
6679  std::string timeleft = secsToTimeString(state->GetResetTime() - time(nullptr), true);
6680  if (const MapEntry* entry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(itr->first))
6681  {
6682  PSendSysMessage("map: %d (%s) inst: %d perm: %s ExtendState: %s diff: %d canReset: %s TTR: %s",
6683  itr->first, entry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], state->GetInstanceId(), itr->second.perm ? "yes" : "no", bind.extendState == EXTEND_STATE_EXPIRED ? "expired" : bind.extendState == EXTEND_STATE_EXTENDED ? "yes" : "no",
6684  state->GetDifficulty(), state->CanReset() ? "yes" : "no", timeleft.c_str());
6685  }
6686  else
6687  PSendSysMessage("bound for a nonexistent map %u", itr->first);
6688  ++counter;
6689  }
6690  }
6691  PSendSysMessage("player binds: %d", counter);
6692  counter = 0;
6693 
6694  if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
6695  {
6696  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_DIFFICULTY; ++i)
6697  {
6698  Group::BoundInstancesMap& binds = group->GetBoundInstances(Difficulty(i));
6699  for (Group::BoundInstancesMap::const_iterator itr = binds.begin(); itr != binds.end(); ++itr)
6700  {
6701  DungeonPersistentState* state = itr->second.state;
6702  std::string timeleft = secsToTimeString(state->GetResetTime() - time(nullptr), true);
6703  if (const MapEntry* entry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(itr->first))
6704  {
6705  PSendSysMessage("map: %d (%s) inst: %d perm: %s diff: %d canReset: %s TTR: %s",
6706  itr->first, entry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], state->GetInstanceId(), itr->second.perm ? "yes" : "no",
6707  state->GetDifficulty(), state->CanReset() ? "yes" : "no", timeleft.c_str());
6708  }
6709  else
6710  PSendSysMessage("bound for a nonexistent map %u", itr->first);
6711  ++counter;
6712  }
6713  }
6714  }
6715  PSendSysMessage("group binds: %d", counter);
6716 
6717  return true;
6718 }
6719 
6720 bool ChatHandler::HandleInstanceUnbindCommand(char* args)
6721 {
6722  if (!*args)
6723  return false;
6724 
6725  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
6726  if (!player)
6727  player = m_session->GetPlayer();
6728  uint32 counter = 0;
6729  uint32 mapid = 0;
6730  bool got_map = false;
6731 
6732  if (strncmp(args, "all", strlen(args)) != 0)
6733  {
6734  if (!isNumeric(args[0]))
6735  return false;
6736 
6737  got_map = true;
6738  mapid = atoi(args);
6739  }
6740 
6741  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_DIFFICULTY; ++i)
6742  {
6743  Player::BoundInstancesMap& binds = player->GetBoundInstances(Difficulty(i));
6744  for (Player::BoundInstancesMap::iterator itr = binds.begin(); itr != binds.end();)
6745  {
6746  if (got_map && mapid != itr->first)
6747  {
6748  ++itr;
6749  continue;
6750  }
6751  if (itr->first != player->GetMapId())
6752  {
6753  DungeonPersistentState* save = itr->second.state;
6754  std::string timeleft = secsToTimeString(save->GetResetTime() - time(nullptr), true);
6755 
6756  if (const MapEntry* entry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(itr->first))
6757  {
6758  PSendSysMessage("unbinding map: %d (%s) inst: %d perm: %s diff: %d canReset: %s TTR: %s",
6759  itr->first, entry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], save->GetInstanceId(), itr->second.perm ? "yes" : "no",
6760  save->GetDifficulty(), save->CanReset() ? "yes" : "no", timeleft.c_str());
6761  }
6762  else
6763  PSendSysMessage("bound for a nonexistent map %u", itr->first);
6764  player->UnbindInstance(itr, Difficulty(i));
6765  ++counter;
6766  }
6767  else
6768  ++itr;
6769  }
6770  }
6771  PSendSysMessage("instances unbound: %d", counter);
6772 
6773  return true;
6774 }
6775 
6776 bool ChatHandler::HandleInstanceStatsCommand(char* /*args*/)
6777 {
6778  PSendSysMessage("instances loaded: %d", sMapMgr.GetNumInstances());
6779  PSendSysMessage("players in instances: %d", sMapMgr.GetNumPlayersInInstances());
6780 
6781  uint32 numSaves, numBoundPlayers, numBoundGroups;
6782  sMapPersistentStateMgr.GetStatistics(numSaves, numBoundPlayers, numBoundGroups);
6783  PSendSysMessage("instance saves: %d", numSaves);
6784  PSendSysMessage("players bound: %d", numBoundPlayers);
6785  PSendSysMessage("groups bound: %d", numBoundGroups);
6786  return true;
6787 }
6788 
6789 bool ChatHandler::HandleInstanceSaveDataCommand(char* /*args*/)
6790 {
6791  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
6792 
6793  Map* map = pl->GetMap();
6794 
6795  InstanceData* iData = map->GetInstanceData();
6796  if (!iData)
6797  {
6798  PSendSysMessage("Map has no instance data.");
6799  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6800  return false;
6801  }
6802 
6803  iData->SaveToDB();
6804  return true;
6805 }
6806 
6808 bool ChatHandler::HandleGMListFullCommand(char* /*args*/)
6809 {
6811  QueryResult* result = LoginDatabase.Query("SELECT username,gmlevel FROM account WHERE gmlevel > 0");
6812  if (result)
6813  {
6814  SendSysMessage(LANG_GMLIST);
6815  SendSysMessage("========================");
6816  SendSysMessage(LANG_GMLIST_HEADER);
6817  SendSysMessage("========================");
6818 
6820  do
6821  {
6822  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
6823  PSendSysMessage("|%15s|%6s|", fields[0].GetString(), fields[1].GetString());
6824  }
6825  while (result->NextRow());
6826 
6827  PSendSysMessage("========================");
6828  delete result;
6829  }
6830  else
6831  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GMLIST_EMPTY);
6832  return true;
6833 }
6834 
6836 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerSetMotdCommand(char* args)
6837 {
6838  sWorld.SetMotd(args);
6839  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOTD_NEW, args);
6840  return true;
6841 }
6842 
6843 bool ChatHandler::ShowPlayerListHelper(QueryResult* result, uint32* limit, bool title, bool error)
6844 {
6845  if (!result)
6846  {
6847  if (error)
6848  {
6849  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_PLAYERS_FOUND);
6850  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
6851  }
6852  return false;
6853  }
6854 
6855  if (!m_session && title)
6856  {
6857  SendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_BAR);
6858  SendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_HEADER);
6859  SendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_BAR);
6860  }
6861 
6862  if (result)
6863  {
6865  do
6866  {
6867  // check limit
6868  if (limit)
6869  {
6870  if (*limit == 0)
6871  break;
6872  --*limit;
6873  }
6874 
6875  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
6876  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
6877  std::string name = fields[1].GetCppString();
6878  uint8 race = fields[2].GetUInt8();
6879  uint8 class_ = fields[3].GetUInt8();
6880  uint32 level = fields[4].GetUInt32();
6881 
6882  ChrRacesEntry const* raceEntry = sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(race);
6883  ChrClassesEntry const* classEntry = sChrClassesStore.LookupEntry(class_);
6884 
6885  char const* race_name = raceEntry ? raceEntry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<?>";
6886  char const* class_name = classEntry ? classEntry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<?>";
6887 
6888  if (!m_session)
6889  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_LINE_CONSOLE, guid, name.c_str(), race_name, class_name, level);
6890  else
6891  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_LINE_CHAT, guid, name.c_str(), name.c_str(), race_name, class_name, level);
6892  }
6893  while (result->NextRow());
6894 
6895  delete result;
6896  }
6897 
6898  if (!m_session)
6899  SendSysMessage(LANG_CHARACTERS_LIST_BAR);
6900 
6901  return true;
6902 }
6903 
6905 bool ChatHandler::HandleAccountCharactersCommand(char* args)
6906 {
6908  std::string account_name;
6909  Player* target = nullptr; // only for triggering use targeted player account
6910  uint32 account_id = ExtractAccountId(&args, &account_name, &target);
6911  if (!account_id)
6912  return false;
6913 
6915  QueryResult* result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT guid, name, race, class, level FROM characters WHERE account = %u", account_id);
6916 
6917  return ShowPlayerListHelper(result);
6918 }
6919 
6921 bool ChatHandler::HandleAccountSetAddonCommand(char* args)
6922 {
6924  char* accountStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
6925 
6926  std::string account_name;
6927  uint32 account_id = ExtractAccountId(&accountStr, &account_name);
6928  if (!account_id)
6929  return false;
6930 
6931  // Let set addon state only for lesser (strong) security level
6932  // or to self account
6933  if (GetAccountId() && GetAccountId() != account_id &&
6934  HasLowerSecurityAccount(nullptr, account_id, true))
6935  return false;
6936 
6937  uint32 lev;
6938  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, lev))
6939  return false;
6940 
6941  // No SQL injection
6942  LoginDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE account SET expansion = '%u' WHERE id = '%u'", lev, account_id);
6943  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_SETADDON, account_name.c_str(), account_id, lev);
6944  return true;
6945 }
6946 
6947 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMailHelper(MailDraft& draft, char* args)
6948 {
6949  // format: "subject text" "mail text"
6950  char* msgSubject = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
6951  if (!msgSubject)
6952  return false;
6953 
6954  char* msgText = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
6955  if (!msgText)
6956  return false;
6957 
6958  // msgSubject, msgText isn't NUL after prev. check
6959  draft.SetSubjectAndBody(msgSubject, msgText);
6960 
6961  return true;
6962 }
6963 
6964 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMassMailCommand(char* args)
6965 {
6966  // format: raceMask "subject text" "mail text"
6967  uint32 raceMask = 0;
6968  char const* name = nullptr;
6969 
6970  if (!ExtractRaceMask(&args, raceMask, &name))
6971  return false;
6972 
6973  // need dynamic object because it trasfered to mass mailer
6974  MailDraft* draft = new MailDraft;
6975 
6976  // fill mail
6977  if (!HandleSendMailHelper(*draft, args))
6978  {
6979  delete draft;
6980  return false;
6981  }
6982 
6983  // from console show nonexistent sender
6984  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid().GetCounter() : 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
6985 
6986  sMassMailMgr.AddMassMailTask(draft, sender, raceMask);
6987 
6988  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, name);
6989  return true;
6990 }
6991 
6992 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendItemsHelper(MailDraft& draft, char* args)
6993 {
6994  // format: "subject text" "mail text" item1[:count1] item2[:count2] ... item12[:count12]
6995  char* msgSubject = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
6996  if (!msgSubject)
6997  return false;
6998 
6999  char* msgText = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
7000  if (!msgText)
7001  return false;
7002 
7003  // extract items
7004  typedef std::pair<uint32, uint32> ItemPair;
7005  typedef std::list< ItemPair > ItemPairs;
7006  ItemPairs items;
7007 
7008  // get from tail next item str
7009  while (char* itemStr = ExtractArg(&args))
7010  {
7011  // parse item str
7012  uint32 item_id = 0;
7013  uint32 item_count = 1;
7014  if (sscanf(itemStr, "%u:%u", &item_id, &item_count) != 2)
7015  if (sscanf(itemStr, "%u", &item_id) != 1)
7016  return false;
7017 
7018  if (!item_id)
7019  {
7020  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
7021  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7022  return false;
7023  }
7024 
7025  ItemPrototype const* item_proto = ObjectMgr::GetItemPrototype(item_id);
7026  if (!item_proto)
7027  {
7028  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, item_id);
7029  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7030  return false;
7031  }
7032 
7033  if (item_count < 1 || (item_proto->MaxCount > 0 && item_count > uint32(item_proto->MaxCount)))
7034  {
7035  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALID_ITEM_COUNT, item_count, item_id);
7036  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7037  return false;
7038  }
7039 
7040  while (item_count > item_proto->GetMaxStackSize())
7041  {
7042  items.push_back(ItemPair(item_id, item_proto->GetMaxStackSize()));
7043  item_count -= item_proto->GetMaxStackSize();
7044  }
7045 
7046  items.push_back(ItemPair(item_id, item_count));
7047 
7048  if (items.size() > MAX_MAIL_ITEMS)
7049  {
7050  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MAIL_ITEMS_LIMIT, MAX_MAIL_ITEMS);
7051  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7052  return false;
7053  }
7054  }
7055 
7056  // fill mail
7057  draft.SetSubjectAndBody(msgSubject, msgText);
7058 
7059  for (ItemPairs::const_iterator itr = items.begin(); itr != items.end(); ++itr)
7060  {
7061  if (Item* item = Item::CreateItem(itr->first, itr->second, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr))
7062  {
7063  item->SaveToDB(); // save for prevent lost at next mail load, if send fail then item will deleted
7064  draft.AddItem(item);
7065  }
7066  }
7067 
7068  return true;
7069 }
7070 
7071 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendItemsCommand(char* args)
7072 {
7073  // format: name "subject text" "mail text" item1[:count1] item2[:count2] ... item12[:count12]
7074  Player* receiver;
7075  ObjectGuid receiver_guid;
7076  std::string receiver_name;
7077  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &receiver, &receiver_guid, &receiver_name))
7078  return false;
7079 
7080  MailDraft draft;
7081 
7082  // fill mail
7083  if (!HandleSendItemsHelper(draft, args))
7084  return false;
7085 
7086  // from console show nonexistent sender
7087  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid().GetCounter() : 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
7088 
7089  draft.SendMailTo(MailReceiver(receiver, receiver_guid), sender);
7090 
7091  std::string nameLink = playerLink(receiver_name);
7092  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, nameLink.c_str());
7093  return true;
7094 }
7095 
7096 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMassItemsCommand(char* args)
7097 {
7098  // format: racemask "subject text" "mail text" item1[:count1] item2[:count2] ... item12[:count12]
7099 
7100  uint32 raceMask = 0;
7101  char const* name = nullptr;
7102 
7103  if (!ExtractRaceMask(&args, raceMask, &name))
7104  return false;
7105 
7106  // need dynamic object because it trasfered to mass mailer
7107  MailDraft* draft = new MailDraft;
7108 
7109  // fill mail
7110  if (!HandleSendItemsHelper(*draft, args))
7111  {
7112  delete draft;
7113  return false;
7114  }
7115 
7116  // from console show nonexistent sender
7117  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid().GetCounter() : 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
7118 
7119  sMassMailMgr.AddMassMailTask(draft, sender, raceMask);
7120 
7121  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, name);
7122  return true;
7123 }
7124 
7125 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMoneyHelper(MailDraft& draft, char* args)
7126 {
7128 
7129  char* msgSubject = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
7130  if (!msgSubject)
7131  return false;
7132 
7133  char* msgText = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
7134  if (!msgText)
7135  return false;
7136 
7137  uint32 money;
7138  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, money))
7139  return false;
7140 
7141  if (money <= 0)
7142  return false;
7143 
7144  // msgSubject, msgText isn't NUL after prev. check
7145  draft.SetSubjectAndBody(msgSubject, msgText).SetMoney(money);
7146 
7147  return true;
7148 }
7149 
7150 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMoneyCommand(char* args)
7151 {
7153 
7154  Player* receiver;
7155  ObjectGuid receiver_guid;
7156  std::string receiver_name;
7157  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &receiver, &receiver_guid, &receiver_name))
7158  return false;
7159 
7160  MailDraft draft;
7161 
7162  // fill mail
7163  if (!HandleSendMoneyHelper(draft, args))
7164  return false;
7165 
7166  // from console show nonexistent sender
7167  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid().GetCounter() : 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
7168 
7169  draft.SendMailTo(MailReceiver(receiver, receiver_guid), sender);
7170 
7171  std::string nameLink = playerLink(receiver_name);
7172  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, nameLink.c_str());
7173  return true;
7174 }
7175 
7176 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMassMoneyCommand(char* args)
7177 {
7179 
7180  uint32 raceMask = 0;
7181  char const* name = nullptr;
7182 
7183  if (!ExtractRaceMask(&args, raceMask, &name))
7184  return false;
7185 
7186  // need dynamic object because it trasfered to mass mailer
7187  MailDraft* draft = new MailDraft;
7188 
7189  // fill mail
7190  if (!HandleSendMoneyHelper(*draft, args))
7191  {
7192  delete draft;
7193  return false;
7194  }
7195 
7196  // from console show nonexistent sender
7197  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer()->GetObjectGuid().GetCounter() : 0, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
7198 
7199  sMassMailMgr.AddMassMailTask(draft, sender, raceMask);
7200 
7201  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, name);
7202  return true;
7203 }
7204 
7206 bool ChatHandler::HandleSendMessageCommand(char* args)
7207 {
7209  Player* rPlayer;
7210  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &rPlayer))
7211  return false;
7212 
7214  if (!*args)
7215  return false;
7216 
7217  WorldSession* rPlayerSession = rPlayer->GetSession();
7218 
7220  if (rPlayerSession->isLogingOut())
7221  {
7222  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
7223  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7224  return false;
7225  }
7226 
7228  // Use SendAreaTriggerMessage for fastest delivery.
7229  rPlayerSession->SendAreaTriggerMessage("%s", args);
7230  rPlayerSession->SendAreaTriggerMessage("|cffff0000[Message from administrator]:|r");
7231 
7232  // Confirmation message
7233  std::string nameLink = GetNameLink(rPlayer);
7234  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SENDMESSAGE, nameLink.c_str(), args);
7235  return true;
7236 }
7237 
7238 bool ChatHandler::HandleArenaFlushPointsCommand(char* /*args*/)
7239 {
7240  sBattleGroundMgr.DistributeArenaPoints();
7241  return true;
7242 }
7243 
7244 bool ChatHandler::HandleArenaSeasonRewardsCommand(char* args)
7245 {
7246  uint32 seasonId;
7247  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, seasonId))
7248  return false;
7249 
7250  if (seasonId > 4 || seasonId == 0)
7251  return false;
7252 
7253  sBattleGroundMgr.RewardArenaSeason(seasonId);
7254  return true;
7255 }
7256 
7257 bool ChatHandler::HandleArenaDataReset(char* args)
7258 {
7259  uint32 bulgarianValue;
7260  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, bulgarianValue) || bulgarianValue != 42)
7261  {
7262  SendSysMessage("For this command to work, add 42 as a parameter. Note, this resets data for all teams on the whole realm.");
7263  return false;
7264  }
7265 
7266  PSendSysMessage("Resetting all arena data.");
7267  sBattleGroundMgr.ResetAllArenaData();
7268  return true;
7269 }
7270 
7271 bool ChatHandler::HandleArenaTeamPointSet(char* args)
7272 {
7273  char* teamName = ExtractQuotedArg(&args);
7274  if (!teamName)
7275  return false;
7276 
7277  uint32 newRating;
7278  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, newRating))
7279  return false;
7280 
7281  std::string nameString = teamName;
7282  ArenaTeam* team = sObjectMgr.GetArenaTeamByName(nameString);
7283  if (!team)
7284  {
7285  PSendSysMessage("Could not find arena team with name %s", nameString.data());
7286  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7287  return false;
7288  }
7289  team->SetRatingForAll(newRating);
7290  team->SaveToDB();
7291  return true;
7292 }
7293 
7294 bool ChatHandler::HandleModifyGenderCommand(char* args)
7295 {
7296  if (!*args)
7297  return false;
7298 
7299  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
7300 
7301  if (!player)
7302  {
7303  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
7304  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7305  return false;
7306  }
7307 
7308  PlayerInfo const* info = sObjectMgr.GetPlayerInfo(player->getRace(), player->getClass());
7309  if (!info)
7310  return false;
7311 
7312  char* gender_str = args;
7313  int gender_len = strlen(gender_str);
7314 
7315  Gender gender;
7316 
7317  if (!strncmp(gender_str, "male", gender_len)) // MALE
7318  {
7319  if (player->getGender() == GENDER_MALE)
7320  return true;
7321 
7322  gender = GENDER_MALE;
7323  }
7324  else if (!strncmp(gender_str, "female", gender_len)) // FEMALE
7325  {
7326  if (player->getGender() == GENDER_FEMALE)
7327  return true;
7328 
7329  gender = GENDER_FEMALE;
7330  }
7331  else
7332  {
7333  SendSysMessage(LANG_MUST_MALE_OR_FEMALE);
7334  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7335  return false;
7336  }
7337 
7338  // Set gender
7339  player->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_GENDER, gender);
7340  player->SetUInt16Value(PLAYER_BYTES_3, 0, uint16(gender) | (player->GetDrunkValue() & 0xFFFE));
7341 
7342  // Change display ID
7343  player->InitDisplayIds();
7344 
7345  char const* gender_full = gender ? "female" : "male";
7346 
7347  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_CHANGE_GENDER, GetNameLink(player).c_str(), gender_full);
7348 
7349  if (needReportToTarget(player))
7350  ChatHandler(player).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOUR_GENDER_CHANGED, gender_full, GetNameLink().c_str());
7351 
7352  return true;
7353 }
7354 
7355 bool ChatHandler::HandleShowGearScoreCommand(char* args)
7356 {
7357  Player* player = getSelectedPlayer();
7358 
7359  if (!player)
7360  {
7361  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
7362  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7363  return false;
7364  }
7365 
7366  uint32 withBags, withBank;
7367  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, withBags, 1))
7368  return false;
7369 
7370  if (!ExtractOptUInt32(&args, withBank, 0))
7371  return false;
7372 
7373  // always recalculate gear score for display
7374  player->ResetCachedGearScore();
7375 
7376  uint32 gearScore = player->GetEquipGearScore(withBags != 0, withBank != 0);
7377 
7378  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GEARSCORE, GetNameLink(player).c_str(), gearScore);
7379 
7380  return true;
7381 }
7382 
7383 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmap(char* args)
7384 {
7385  bool on;
7386  if (ExtractOnOff(&args, on))
7387  {
7388  if (on)
7389  {
7390  sWorld.setConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_MMAP_ENABLED, true);
7391  SendSysMessage("WORLD: mmaps are now ENABLED (individual map settings still in effect)");
7392  }
7393  else
7394  {
7395  sWorld.setConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_MMAP_ENABLED, false);
7396  SendSysMessage("WORLD: mmaps are now DISABLED");
7397  }
7398  return true;
7399  }
7400 
7401  on = sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_MMAP_ENABLED);
7402  PSendSysMessage("mmaps are %sabled", on ? "en" : "dis");
7403 
7404  return true;
7405 }
7406 
7407 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapTestArea(char* args)
7408 {
7409  float radius = 40.0f;
7410  ExtractFloat(&args, radius);
7411 
7412  CreatureList creatureList;
7413  MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck go_check(m_session->GetPlayer(), radius);
7414  MaNGOS::CreatureListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> go_search(creatureList, go_check);
7415  // Get Creatures
7416  Cell::VisitGridObjects(m_session->GetPlayer(), go_search, radius);
7417 
7418  if (!creatureList.empty())
7419  {
7420  PSendSysMessage("Found " SIZEFMTD " Creatures.", creatureList.size());
7421 
7422  uint32 paths = 0;
7423  uint32 uStartTime = WorldTimer::getMSTime();
7424 
7425  float gx, gy, gz;
7426  m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPosition(gx, gy, gz);
7427  for (auto& itr : creatureList)
7428  {
7429  PathFinder path(itr);
7430  path.calculate(gx, gy, gz);
7431  ++paths;
7432  }
7433 
7434  uint32 uPathLoadTime = WorldTimer::getMSTimeDiff(uStartTime, WorldTimer::getMSTime());
7435  PSendSysMessage("Generated %i paths in %i ms", paths, uPathLoadTime);
7436  }
7437  else
7438  {
7439  PSendSysMessage("No creatures in %f yard range.", radius);
7440  }
7441 
7442  return true;
7443 }
7444 
7445 // use ".mmap testheight 10" selecting any creature/player
7446 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapTestHeight(char* args)
7447 {
7448  float radius = 0.0f;
7449  ExtractFloat(&args, radius);
7450  if (radius > 40.0f)
7451  radius = 40.0f;
7452 
7453  Unit* unit = getSelectedUnit();
7454 
7455  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7456  if (!unit)
7457  unit = player;
7458 
7459  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7460  {
7461  if (radius < 0.1f)
7462  radius = static_cast<Creature*>(unit)->GetRespawnRadius();
7463  }
7464  else
7465  {
7466  if (unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7467  {
7468  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7469  return false;
7470  }
7471  }
7472 
7473  if (radius < 0.1f)
7474  {
7475  PSendSysMessage("Provided spawn radius for %s is too small. Using 5.0f instead.", unit->GetGuidStr().c_str());
7476  radius = 5.0f;
7477  }
7478 
7479  float gx, gy, gz;
7480  unit->GetPosition(gx, gy, gz);
7481 
7482  Creature* summoned = unit->SummonCreature(VISUAL_WAYPOINT, gx, gy, gz + 0.5f, 0, TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_DESPAWN, 20000);
7483  summoned->CastSpell(summoned, 8599, TRIGGERED_NONE);
7484  uint32 tries = 1;
7485  uint32 successes = 0;
7486  uint32 startTime = WorldTimer::getMSTime();
7487  for (; tries < 500; ++tries)
7488  {
7489  unit->GetPosition(gx, gy, gz);
7490  if (unit->GetMap()->GetReachableRandomPosition(unit, gx, gy, gz, radius))
7491  {
7492  unit->SummonCreature(VISUAL_WAYPOINT, gx, gy, gz, 0, TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_DESPAWN, 15000);
7493  ++successes;
7494  if (successes >= 100)
7495  break;
7496  }
7497  }
7498  uint32 genTime = WorldTimer::getMSTimeDiff(startTime, WorldTimer::getMSTime());
7499  PSendSysMessage("Generated %u valid points for %u try in %ums.", successes, tries, genTime);
7500  return true;
7501 }
7502 
7503 bool ChatHandler::HandleServerResetAllRaidCommand(char* /*args*/)
7504 {
7505  PSendSysMessage("Global raid instances reset, all players in raid instances will be teleported to homebind!");
7506  sMapPersistentStateMgr.GetScheduler().ResetAllRaid();
7507  return true;
7508 }
7509 
7510 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkAddCommand(char* args)
7511 {
7512  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7513 
7514  if (!player->GetSelectionGuid())
7515  {
7516  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7517  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7518  return false;
7519  }
7520 
7521  uint32 masterCounter;
7522  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, masterCounter))
7523  return false;
7524 
7525  uint32 flags;
7526  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, flags))
7527  return false;
7528 
7529  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter))
7530  {
7531  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
7532  uint32 flag = fields[0].GetUInt32();
7533  PSendSysMessage("Link already exists with flag = %u", flag);
7534  delete result;
7535  }
7536  else
7537  {
7538  WorldDatabase.PExecute("INSERT INTO creature_linking(guid,master_guid,flag) VALUES('%u','%u','%u')", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter, flags);
7539  PSendSysMessage("Created link for guid = %u , master_guid = %u and flags = %u", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter, flags);
7540  }
7541 
7542  return true;
7543 }
7544 
7545 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkRemoveCommand(char* args)
7546 {
7547  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7548 
7549  if (!player->GetSelectionGuid())
7550  {
7551  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7552  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7553  return false;
7554  }
7555 
7556  uint32 masterCounter;
7557  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, masterCounter))
7558  return false;
7559 
7560  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter))
7561  {
7562  delete result;
7563  WorldDatabase.PExecute("DELETE FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7564  PSendSysMessage("Deleted link for guid = %u and master_guid = %u", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7565  }
7566  else
7567  SendSysMessage("Link does not exist.");
7568 
7569  return true;
7570 }
7571 
7572 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkEditCommand(char* args)
7573 {
7574  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7575 
7576  if (!player->GetSelectionGuid())
7577  {
7578  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7579  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7580  return false;
7581  }
7582 
7583  uint32 masterCounter;
7584  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, masterCounter))
7585  return false;
7586 
7587  uint32 flags;
7588  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, flags))
7589  return false;
7590 
7591  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter))
7592  {
7593  delete result;
7594 
7595  if (flags)
7596  {
7597  WorldDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE creature_linking SET flags = flags | '%u' WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", flags, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7598  SendSysMessage("Flag added to link.");
7599  }
7600  else
7601  {
7602  WorldDatabase.PExecute("DELETE FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u')", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7603  SendSysMessage("Link removed.");
7604  }
7605  }
7606  else
7607  {
7608  if (flags)
7609  {
7610  WorldDatabase.PExecute("INSERT INTO creature_linking(guid,master_guid,flags) VALUES('%u','%u','%u')", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter, flags);
7611  SendSysMessage("Link did not exist. Inserted link");
7612  }
7613  else
7614  SendSysMessage("Link does not exist.");
7615  }
7616 
7617  return true;
7618 }
7619 
7620 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkToggleCommand(char* args)
7621 {
7622  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7623 
7624  if (!player->GetSelectionGuid())
7625  {
7626  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7627  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7628  return false;
7629  }
7630 
7631  uint32 masterCounter;
7632  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, masterCounter))
7633  return false;
7634 
7635  uint32 flags;
7636  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, flags))
7637  return false;
7638 
7639  uint32 toggle; // 0 add flags, 1 remove flags
7640  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, toggle))
7641  return false;
7642 
7643  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter))
7644  {
7645  delete result;
7646  if (toggle)
7647  {
7648  WorldDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE creature_linking SET flags = flags &~ '%u' WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", flags, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7649  SendSysMessage("Flag removed from link.");
7650  }
7651  else
7652  {
7653  WorldDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE creature_linking SET flags = flags | '%u' WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", flags, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter);
7654  SendSysMessage("Flag added to link.");
7655  }
7656  }
7657  else
7658  {
7659  if (toggle)
7660  SendSysMessage("Link does not exist. No changes done.");
7661  else
7662  {
7663  WorldDatabase.PExecute("INSERT INTO creature_linking(guid,master_guid,flags) VALUES('%u','%u','%u')", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter, flags);
7664  SendSysMessage("Link did not exist, added.");
7665  }
7666  }
7667 
7668  return true;
7669 }
7670 
7671 bool ChatHandler::HandleLinkCheckCommand(char* args)
7672 {
7673  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
7674 
7675  if (!player->GetSelectionGuid())
7676  {
7677  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7678  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7679  return false;
7680  }
7681 
7682  uint32 masterCounter;
7683  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, masterCounter))
7684  return false;
7685 
7686  bool found = false;
7687 
7688  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter))
7689  {
7690  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
7691  uint32 flags = fields[0].GetUInt32();
7692  PSendSysMessage("Link for guid = %u , master_guid = %u has flags = %u", player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), masterCounter, flags);
7693  delete result;
7694  found = true;
7695  }
7696 
7697  if (QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT flag FROM creature_linking WHERE guid = '%u' AND master_guid = '%u'", masterCounter, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter()))
7698  {
7699  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
7700  uint32 flags = fields[0].GetUInt32();
7701  PSendSysMessage("Link for guid = %u , master_guid = %u has flags = %u", masterCounter, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter(), flags);
7702  delete result;
7703  found = true;
7704  }
7705 
7706  if (!found)
7707  PSendSysMessage("Link for guids = %u , %u not found", masterCounter, player->GetSelectionGuid().GetCounter());
7708 
7709  return true;
7710 }
7711 
7712 bool ChatHandler::HandleVariablePrint(char* /*args*/)
7713 {
7714  Player* player = GetSession()->GetPlayer();
7715 
7716  PSendSysMessage("%s", player->GetMap()->GetVariableManager().GetVariableList().data());
7717  return true;
7718 }
7719

7726 bool ChatHandler::HandleWarEffortPhaseCommand(char* args)
7727 {
7728  uint32 param;
7729  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, param))
7730  {
7731  PSendSysMessage("%s", sWorldState.GetAQPrintout().data());
7732  return true;
7733  }
7734  sWorldState.HandleWarEffortPhaseTransition(param);
7735  return true;
7736 }
7737 
7738 bool ChatHandler::HandleWarEffortCounterCommand(char* args)
7739 {
7740  uint32 index;
7741  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, index) || index >= RESOURCE_MAX)
7742  {
7743  PSendSysMessage("Enter valid index for counter.");
7744  return true;
7745  }
7746 
7747  uint32 value;
7748  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, value))
7749  {
7750  PSendSysMessage("Enter valid value for counter.");
7751  return true;
7752  }
7753 
7754  sWorldState.AddWarEffortProgress(AQResources(index), value);
7755  return true;
7756 }

7858 bool ChatHandler::HandleSunwellGateCounterCommand(char* args)
7859 {

7861  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, index) || index >= COUNTERS_MAX_GATES)
7862  {
7863  PSendSysMessage("Enter valid index for counter.");
7864  return true;
7865  }
7866

7869  {

7877 
7878 bool ChatHandler::HandleExpansionRelease(char* args)
7879 {
7880  uint32 curExpansion = sWorldState.GetExpansion();
7881 
7882  uint32 param;
7883  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, param))
7884  {
7885  PSendSysMessage("Current Expansion: %u", curExpansion);
7886  return true;
7887  }
7888 
7889  if (param == curExpansion)
7890  {
7891  SendSysMessage("Current Expansion is same as given expansion.");
7892  return true;
7893  }
7894 
7895  if (sWorldState.SetExpansion(param))
7896  PSendSysMessage("New Expansion set to %u", param);
7897  else
7898  PSendSysMessage("Setting expansion failed. Consult manual.");
7899  return true;
7900 }
7901 
7902 enum ModSpells
7903 {
7904  // client spells
7905  SPELL_MOD_STRENGTH = 13372,
7906  SPELL_MOD_AGILITY = 13365,
7907  SPELL_MOD_STAMINA = 13370,
7908  SPELL_MOD_INTELLECT = 13366,
7909  SPELL_MOD_SPIRIT = 13368,
7910  SPELL_MOD_SPELL_POWER = 22747,
7911 
7912  // custom spells
7913  SPELL_MOD_ARMOR = 15170,
7914  SPELL_MOD_RES_HOLY = 15171,
7915  SPELL_MOD_RES_FIRE = 15172,
7916  SPELL_MOD_RES_NATURE = 15173,
7917  SPELL_MOD_RES_FROST = 15174,
7918  SPELL_MOD_RES_SHADOW = 15175,
7919  SPELL_MOD_RES_ARCANE = 15176,
7920  SPELL_MOD_MELEE_AP = 15177,
7921  SPELL_MOD_RANGE_AP = 15178,
7922  SPELL_MOD_MELEE_CRIT = 15179,
7923  SPELL_MOD_SPELL_CRIT = 15180,
7924  SPELL_MOD_MELEE_HASTE = 15181,
7925  SPELL_MOD_RANGE_HASTE = 15182,
7926  SPELL_MOD_SPELL_HASTE = 15183,
7927  SPELL_MOD_PARRY_CHANCE = 15184,
7928  SPELL_MOD_DODGE_CHANCE = 15185,
7929  SPELL_MOD_BLOCK_CHANCE = 15186,
7930 };
7931 
7932 bool ChatHandler::HandleResetModsCommand(char *args)
7933 {
7934  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
7935 
7936  if (!target)
7937  {
7938  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7939  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7940  return false;
7941  }
7942 
7943  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_STRENGTH);
7944  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_AGILITY);
7945  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_STAMINA);
7946  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_INTELLECT);
7947  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_SPIRIT);
7948  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_ARMOR);
7949  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_HOLY);
7950  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_FIRE);
7951  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_NATURE);
7952  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_FROST);
7953  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_SHADOW);
7954  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RES_ARCANE);
7955  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_MELEE_AP);
7956  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RANGE_AP);
7957  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_SPELL_POWER);
7958  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_MELEE_CRIT);
7959  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_SPELL_CRIT);
7960  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_MELEE_HASTE);
7961  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_RANGE_HASTE);
7962  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_SPELL_HASTE);
7963  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_PARRY_CHANCE);
7964  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_DODGE_CHANCE);
7965  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_MOD_BLOCK_CHANCE);
7966 
7967  PSendSysMessage("You removed all stat mods from %s.", target->GetName());
7968 
7969  return true;
7970 }
7971 
7972 bool ChatHandler::ModifyStatCommandHelper(char* args, char const* statName, uint32 spellId)
7973 {
7974  if (!*args)
7975  return false;
7976 
7977  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
7978 
7979  if (!target)
7980  {
7981  PSendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
7982  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
7983  return false;
7984  }
7985 
7986  int32 amount;
7987  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, amount))
7988  return false;
7989 
7990  if (!amount)
7991  {
7992  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
7993  return true;
7994  }
7995 
7996  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
7997  target->CastCustomSpell(target, spellId, &amount, &amount, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
7998 
7999  if (spellId == SPELL_MOD_STAMINA)
8000  target->SetHealthPercent(100);
8001  else if (spellId == SPELL_MOD_INTELLECT)
8002  target->SetPower(POWER_MANA, target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
8003 
8004  PSendSysMessage("You changed %s of %s to %i.", statName, target->GetName(), amount);
8005 
8006  return true;
8007 }
8008 
8009 bool ChatHandler::HandleModifyStrengthCommand(char *args)
8010 {
8011  return ModifyStatCommandHelper(args, "Strength", SPELL_MOD_STRENGTH);
8012 }
8013 
8014 bool ChatHandler::HandleModifyAgilityCommand(char *args)
